TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WebPartManager extends System.Web.UI.Control implements class System.Web.UI.INamingContainer, class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.IPersonalizable
Public Class WebPartManager Inherits Control Implements INamingContainer, IPersonalizable
public ref class WebPartManager : System::Web::UI::Control, System::Web::UI::INamingContainer, System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::IPersonalizable
type WebPartManager = class inherit Control interface INamingContainer interface IPersonalizable

summary.span: 用作 Web 部件控件集的中心类，管理所有 Web 部件控件、功能和网页上发生的事件。

span.span: Serves as the central class of the Web Parts control set, managing all the Web Parts controls, functionality, and events that occur on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件充当中心或控制中心的 Web 部件应用程序。The control acts as the hub or control center of a Web Parts application. 必须有一个-且只有一个-使用 Web 部件控件的每一页上的控件实例。There must be one--and only one-- control instance on every page that uses Web Parts controls. 与 Web 部件应用程序的大多数方面一样控件仅适用于身份验证的用户。As with most aspects of Web Parts applications, the control works only with authenticated users. 此外，其功能几乎完全与继承的 Web 部件区域中驻留的服务器控件的工作原理类。Further, its functionality works almost entirely with server controls that reside within Web Parts zones that inherit from the class. 驻留在这些区域之外的页的服务器控件可以具有很少的 Web 部件的功能或与的交互控件。Server controls that reside on a page outside of these zones can have very little Web Parts functionality or interaction with the control. 在页上，Web 部件功能的中心作为控件可执行的下表中所述的任务类型。As the hub for Web Parts functionality on a page, the control carries out the kinds of tasks described in the following table. |任务类别Task category|控件的作用What the control does| |-------------------|---------------------------| |跟踪 Web 部件控件Tracking Web Parts controls|跟踪的页面上提供了 Web 部件功能，包括的控件的许多不同类型控件、 连接、 区域和其他人。Keeps track of the many different kinds of controls on a page that provide Web Parts features, including controls, connections, zones, and others.| |添加和删除 Web 部件控件Adding and removing Web Parts controls|提供用于添加、 删除和关闭方法页面上的控件。Provides the methods for adding, deleting, and closing controls on a page.| |管理连接Administering connections|创建控件之间的连接并监视连接，以及添加和删除它们的进程。Creates connections between controls, and monitors the connections as well as the processes of adding and removing them.| |个性化设置控件和页面Personalizing controls and pages|使用户能够在页上，将控件移动到不同位置，并启动外观、 属性和控件的行为，用户可以编辑的视图。Enables users to move controls to different locations on a page, and launches the views in which users can edit the appearance, properties, and behavior of controls. 维护每个页面上的特定于用户的个性化设置。Maintains user-specific personalization settings on each page.| |不同的页面视图之间切换Toggling between different page views|将页的页上，不同的专用视图之间切换，以便用户可以执行某些任务，例如更改页面布局或编辑控件。Switches a page among different specialized views of the page, so that users can carry out certain tasks such as changing page layout or editing controls.| |引发 Web 部件生命周期事件Raising Web Parts life-cycle events|定义，将引发，并使开发人员能够处理的 Web 部件控件，如当控件正在添加、 移动、 已连接，或已删除的生命周期事件。Defines, raises, and enables developers to handle life-cycle events of Web Parts controls, such as when controls are being added, moved, connected, or deleted.| |启用导入和导出的控件Enabling import and export of controls|导出包含的属性的状态的 XML 流控件，并允许用户导入的文件为方便起见，在个性化其他页面或站点中的复杂控件。Exports XML streams that contain the state of the properties of controls, and allows users to import the files for convenience in personalizing complex controls in other pages or sites.| 类有大量的属性。The class has a large set of properties. 与一致跟踪其他控件的角色，它具有多个引用的 Web 部件控件或其他特殊的 Web 部件对象集合的属性。Consistent with the role of tracking other controls, it has a number of properties that reference collections of either Web Parts controls, or other special Web Parts objects. ， ， ， ， ， ， ，并且属性都是由所有集合其跟踪和其他控件管理任务。The , , , , , , , and properties are all collections used by the control for its tracking and other management tasks. 属性的另一个组包含可自定义 Web 部件应用程序中发生某些方案中应用的警告。Another group of properties contains customizable warnings that apply in certain scenarios that occur in a Web Parts application. 其中包括，则，和属性。These include the , the , and the properties. 类重写一些由很多 Web 服务器控件使用其基继承属性。The class overrides some of its base inherited properties, which are used by many Web server controls. 其中包括， ，和属性。These include the , , and properties. 最后，没有可用于访问应用程序的当前状态的一组属性。Finally, there is a group of properties useful for accessing the current state of the application. 属性指示的页是中的当前显示模式。The property indicates the current display mode that a page is in. 属性指示是否允许控件呈现客户端脚本，与其中的用户可能具有不同的功能的浏览器或者是否关闭了脚本的情况。The property indicates whether a control is allowed to render client-side script, which is relevant in situations where users might have browsers with different capabilities or have scripting turned off. 属性可用于引用包含对大量重要的可扩展性情况下使用的 Web 部件方法调用的实用工具类。The property is useful for referencing a utility class that contains the calls to a number of important Web Parts methods that are used for extensibility cases. 通过隐藏对一个单独的类中的这些方法的调用 (类)，则简化类自己的 API。By hiding the calls to these methods in a separate class (the class), the class's own API is simplified. 属性提供对存储用户的个性化设置和数据保存到永久存储的个性化设置对象的访问。The property provides access to the personalization objects that store users' personalization settings and persist that data to permanent storage. 属性指示其控件在页面上的当前选定的用户或应用程序。The property indicates which control on a page is currently selected by the user or the application. 属性指示是否在自定义个性化设置数据控制已更改。The property indicates whether custom personalization data on a control has changed. 控件包含五个内置的显示模式或网页的视图。The control contains five built-in display modes, or views of a Web page. 开发人员可以扩展此功能，如扩展类型创建自定义显示模式类或类。Developers can extend this feature, creating custom display modes by extending types such as the class or the class. 用户可切换到各种显示模式下，一个页面，前提是适当类型的对应于给定的显示模式的控件存在于页面上。Users can switch a page into the various display modes, provided that the proper kind of controls that correspond to a given display mode are present on a page. > [!NOTE] > 它是可以扩展此功能，以便用户可以切换到自定义显示模式，而无需页上的相应区域。It is possible to extend this feature so that users can switch into a custom display mode without having a corresponding zone on the page. 但是，默认行为是显示模式对应区域。However, the default behavior is that display modes correspond to zones. 标准显示模式都是公共字段类。The standard display modes are represented by public fields in the class. 下表总结了字段和其引用的显示模式。The following table summarizes the fields and the display modes they refer to. 当前显示模式的页上，如上所述，始终中引用属性，并可以在给定类型的区域在页上，存在的特定页面的显示模式集包含在属性。The current display mode of a page, as noted above, is always referenced in the property, and the set of display modes that is possible on a particular page, given the kind of zones that are present on the page, is contained in the property. |字段Field|显示模式的详细信息Display mode details| |-----------|--------------------------| ||Web 页面; 在普通用户视图默认值和最常见的显示模式。The normal user view of a Web page; the default and most common display mode.| ||用户可以重新排列或删除控件，若要更改页面布局视图。The view in which users can rearrange or delete controls to change the page layout.| ||该视图在其中编辑用户界面 (UI) 变得可见，则用户可以编辑外观、 属性和在正常浏览模式中可见的控件的行为。The view in which an editing user interface (UI) becomes visible; users can edit the appearance, properties, and behavior of the controls that are visible in the normal browse mode.| ||该视图中的目录用户界面变得可见，则用户可以从目录的可用控件，向页面添加控件。The view in which a catalog UI becomes visible; users can add controls to a page from catalogs of available controls.| ||该视图在其中连接用户界面变得可见，则用户可以连接、 管理或断开连接控件之间的连接。The view in which a connection UI becomes visible; users can connect, manage, or disconnect connections between controls.| 控件也包含在 Web 部件页面和控件的生命周期中，至关重要的事件数。The control also contains a number of events that are critical in the life cycle of Web Parts pages and controls. 这些事件提供精确控制以编程方式 Web 部件控件的行为。These events provide precise programmatic control over the behavior of Web Parts controls. 大多数方法适用于控件 (或位于其他服务器或用户控件区域，以便它们可充当控件)。Most methods pertain directly to controls (or other server or user controls that are placed in zones so that they can behave as controls). 但是，一些事件有关的页或页上的连接状态。However, a few events pertain to the state of the page or connections on the page. 下表列出了可用的事件，并总结了它们的用途。The following table lists the available events and summarizes their purposes. > [!NOTE] > 在下表中的所有情况下，"控制"一词是指控件或驻留在一个区域，并且使用封装任何服务器控件在运行时对象。In all cases in the following table, the word "control" refers to a control or any server control that resides in a zone and is wrapped with a object at run time. |事件Event|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| ||一个控件添加到页以验证对其进行授权之前发生。Occurs just before a control is added to a page to verify that it is authorized.| ||已激活页上的所有连接后发生。Occurs after all the connections on a page have been activated.| ||激活页上的所有连接的过程之前发生。Occurs just before the process of activating all the connections on a page.| ||页的当前显示模式更改之后发生。Occurs after the current display mode of a page has changed.| ||更改页面的显示模式的过程之前发生。Occurs just before the process of changing a page's display mode.| ||已取消所选控件的内容之后发生。Occurs after the selection of a control has been canceled.| ||取消选择的控件的过程之前发生。Occurs just before the process of canceling the selection of a control.| ||一个控件添加到区域之后发生。Occurs after a control has been added to a zone.| ||将控件添加到区域的过程之前发生。Occurs just before the process of adding a control to a zone.| ||控件已关闭 （从页中移除） 后发生。Occurs after a control has been closed (removed from a page).| ||恰好在关闭一个控件的过程之前发生。Occurs just before the process of closing a control.| ||永久删除动态控件 （一种以编程方式创建或添加从目录中） 的实例后发生。Occurs after an instance of a dynamic control (one that was created programmatically or added from a catalog) has been permanently deleted.| ||删除动态控件的过程之前发生。Occurs just before the process of deleting a dynamic control.| ||控件在其区域内或另一个区域已移动后发生。Occurs after a control has moved within its zone or to another zone.| ||移动控件的过程之前发生。Occurs just before the process of moving a control.| ||选择来参与连接的两个控件已建立连接之后发生。Occurs after two controls selected for participation in a connection have established the connection.| ||连接两个控件的过程之前发生。Occurs just before the process of connecting two controls.| ||已断开连接的两个控件后发生。Occurs after two connected controls have been disconnected.| ||只需在断开连接两个控件的过程之前发生。Occurs just before the process of disconnecting two controls.| 控件具有许多用于管理 Web 部件页方法。The control has numerous methods for managing Web Parts pages. 方法，但此处未列出一大组是其名称采用以下形式的方法*EventName*。A large set of the methods, not listed here, are methods whose names take the form of On*EventName*. 通常引发其关联的事件，这些方法并为事件提供类型的处理程序。These methods typically raise their associated event, and provide the event with a handler of type . 继承自开发人员可以重写这些方法中的大多数类。Most of these methods can be overridden by developers who inherit from the class. 此外，页面开发人员可以使用这些方法相关联的事件提供自定义处理程序。Also, page developers can provide custom handlers for the events associated with these methods. 例如，在中的情况下事件，可以添加页面开发人员`OnWebPartAdded`属性为``Web 页面，然后将分配自定义方法名称添加到该属性以提供自定义事件处理的标记中元素。For example, in the case of the event, a page developer could add an `OnWebPartAdded` attribute to the `` element in the markup of a Web page, and then assign a custom method name to the attribute to provide custom handling for the event. 属性对应于方法和事件处理适用于大多数 Web 部件事件和其关联的方法的此基本模式。The attribute corresponds to the method, and this basic pattern of event handling works for most Web Parts events and their associated methods. 此外，控件具有方法特定于管理的任务控件 (和服务器或用户控件用作控件)。In addition, the control has methods particular to the task of managing controls (and server or user controls used as controls). 这些方法包括， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和。These methods include , , , , , , , , , , , , , and . 方法的另一组专用于连接。Another set of methods is specialized for connections. 这包括方法，如， ， ， ， ， ， ， ， ，和。This includes methods such as , , , , , , , , , and . 最后，一些方法专注于个性化设置功能。Finally, some methods focus on personalization functionality. 其中包括， ， ， ， ， ，和。These include , , , , , , and . 有关其他详细信息方法可通过访问属性，请参阅的文档类。For more information on other methods that are accessible through the property, see the documentation for the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和以编程方式使用控件。The following code example demonstrates both declarative and programmatic use of the control. 代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 用户控件，可用于更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含两个自定义的网页可以连接的控件和一个``元素。A Web page that contains two custom controls that can be connected, and an `` element. - 源代码文件包含两个自定义控件和自定义的接口。A source code file that contains two custom controls, and a custom interface. - 在浏览器中的示例工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 用户控件具有显示可能的显示模式在页上，给定页上存在的 Web 部件控件的下拉列表控件。The user control has a drop-down list control that shows the possible display modes on a page, given the Web Parts controls that are present on the page. 在此代码示例 Web 页中，此用户控件声明正下方元素在页面的标记中，并且没有`Register`指令要注册该控件的 Web 页的顶部附近。In the Web page for this code example, this user control is declared just below the element in the page's markup, and there is a `Register` directive near the top of the Web page to register the control. 有关详细信息显示在此控件模式和对源代码的说明，请参见[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection/CS/displaymodemenucs.ascx#6)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection/VB/DisplayModeMenuVB.ascx#6)] Web 页的声明性标记包含`Register`为用户控件和自定义控件的指令。The declarative markup for the Web page contains `Register` directives for both the user control and the custom controls. 没有``元素中，``元素以包含自定义控件和一个``元素。There is an `` element, an `` element to contain the custom controls, and an `` element. 此页还包含一些处理与连接相关的事件的内联代码控制; 随着连接和断开连接的控件，可以看到此代码的作用。The page also contains some inline code that handles connection-related events for the control; you can see the effect of this code as you connect and disconnect controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection/CS/webpartmanagerConnectionCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection/VB/webpartmanagerConnectionVB.aspx#1)] 该示例的第三部分是控件的源代码。The third part of the example is the source code for the controls. 请注意，没有名为的接口`IZipCode`，并在中实现此接口`ZipCodeWebPart`类。Note that there is an interface named `IZipCode`, and this interface is implemented in the `ZipCodeWebPart` class. 此类有一个名为特殊的回调方法`ProvideIZipCode`可用作提供程序。This class has a special callback method named `ProvideIZipCode` that serves as a provider. 其他类型，名为`WeatherWebPart`，还使用名为的特殊方法实现`GetIZipCode`，这使得控件可以充当其他控件的使用者。The other type, named `WeatherWebPart`, is also implemented with a special method named `GetIZipCode`, which enables the control to act as a consumer of the other control. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例假定你具有源代码编译到程序集和`Register`指令在网页中的引用的程序集名称。This code example assumes that you have compiled the source into an assembly, and the `Register` directive in the Web page references the assembly name. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_SimpleConnection/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 已加载网页的浏览器中后，单击**显示模式**下拉列表控件，然后选择**Connect**切换页可连接模式。After you have loaded the Web page in a browser, click the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Connect** to switch the page to connect mode. 连接模式使用``元素以使您能够创建控件之间的连接。Connect mode uses the `` element to enable you to create connections between controls. 在连接模式中，单击标题栏中的向下箭头**邮政编码**控件来激活其谓词菜单，，然后单击**Connect**。In connect mode, click the downward arrow in the title bar of the **ZIP Code** control to activate its verbs menu, and then click **Connect**. 连接用户界面显示后，单击**创建连接到使用者**链接。After the connection UI appears, click the **Create a connection to a Consumer** link. 单元格将显示具有下拉列表控件。A cell appears that has a drop-down list control. 选择**天气控件**在下拉列表中，然后单击**Connect**来完成两个控件的连接。Select **Weather Control** in the drop-down list, and then click **Connect** to complete the connection of the two controls. 单击**关闭**，然后使用**显示模式**下拉列表，以将页返回到正常浏览模式。Click **Close**, and then use the **Display Mode** drop-down list to return the page to normal browse mode. 可以输入邮政编码，并将使用你输入的值更新的使用者控件。You can enter a ZIP Code, and the consumer control will be updated with the value you enter. 因为`ZipCode`属性标记有`Personalizable`属性中的源代码，此属性的值将一直保持跨浏览器会话，从而节省了由用户输入的值。Because the `ZipCode` property was marked with the `Personalizable` attribute in the source code, this property value will persist across browser sessions, thus saving the value entered by a user. 更复杂的使用者控件无法执行邮政编码信息、 查找天气信息基于代码，以及向用户显示。A more sophisticated consumer control could take the ZIP code information, look up weather information based on the code, and display it to a user.

span.para: 控件旨在进行扩展。因为它是，因此必须还扩展到 Web 部件应用程序中，你想要扩展某种特定类型或在 Web 部件控件集，在许多情况下控制中部类，因为可能有一些属性或使所需的方法 自定义类型的 Web 部件应用程序上下文中工作。Web 部件，请参阅文档 (请参阅)，讨论了如何扩展 Web 部件类型时，经常需要进行扩展的内容的提及类，或显示了如何扩展中的代码示例。

The control is designed to be extended. Because it is so central to Web Parts applications, when you want to extend some specific type or control in the Web Parts control set, in many cases you must also extend the class, because it is likely to have some property or method that is required to make your custom type work in the context of a Web Parts application. The Web Parts reference documentation (see ), when discussing how to extend a Web Parts type, frequently mentions what needs to be done to extend the class as well, or shows how to extend it in a code example.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数初始化几个重要的变量由控件。The constructor initializes several important variables used by the control. 一个直接影响所有 Web 部件页的分配是默认页面显示模式设置为浏览模式的事实 ()。One assignment that directly impacts all Web Parts pages is the fact that the default page display mode is set to browse mode ().

summary.span: 激活网页上当前所有非活动连接。

span.span: Makes active all connections on a Web page that are currently inactive.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 到页面的每个请求，以激活之间的现有连接上调用方法和驻留在其他服务器控件区域。The method is called on each request to a page to activate existing connections between and other server controls residing in zones. 在某些情况下，例如时则会发生冲突的连接被激活，此方法中依次调用方法来结束有问题的连接。In some cases, for instance if there is a conflict in the connections being activated, this method in turn calls the method to end the problematic connection. 断开连接的过程引发事件。During the disconnection process the event is raised. 通常，开发人员可以取消此事件，但在这种情况在此方法不能取消的连接之间的冲突，因为控件需要解决该冲突以完成激活连接的过程。Normally developers can cancel this event, but in the case where this is a conflict among the connections it cannot be cancelled, because the control needs to resolve the conflict in order to finish the process of activating connections. 有关详细信息，请参阅事件。For details, see event.

summary.span: 提供向网页添加 控件的标准编程方法。

span.span: Provides the standard programmatic method for adding controls to a Web page.

returns.span: 添加到页的 控件。

span.span: A control that was added to the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用方法都要添加新的动态控制到页面，并重新打开以前已关闭的页的静态或动态控件。The method is used both to add new dynamic controls to a page, and to reopen static or dynamic controls that have previously been closed on a page. 若要添加新控件，调用方法，它实际创建一份中引用的控件`webPart`参数。When the method is called to add a new control, it actually creates a copy of the control referenced in the `webPart` parameter. 新的 ID 生成的控件，复制，因此开发人员应参考从要获取新的 ID 值的方法返回控制。A new ID is generated for the copy of the control, so developers should reference the control returned from the method to get the new ID value. 若要重新打开以前关闭的控件，调用方法，它返回对所引用的控件的直接引用`webPart`参数。When the method is called to reopen a previously closed control, it returns a direct reference to the control referenced by the `webPart` parameter. > [!IMPORTANT] > 应始终使用方法，而不是方法的引用的控件的集合属性，以添加以编程方式控制到页上，因为使用方法将引发异常。You should always use the method, rather than the method of the collection of controls referenced by the property, to add controls programmatically to the page, because using the method throws an exception. 若要添加的控件不是控件 (即，将使用换行的服务器控件控件在运行时)，首先应调用方法创建控件，然后调用方法将添加控件。To add a control that is not a control (in other words, a server control that will be wrapped with a control at run time), you should first call the method to create the control, and then call the method to add the control. 此方法的演示，请参阅示例部分。For a demonstration of this approach, see the Example section. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法将服务器控件以编程方式添加到一个页面。The following code example demonstrates use of the method to add a server control programmatically to a page. 页面标记包含一个空``元素，和一个``元素。The page markup contains an empty `` element, and an `` element. 第一次**添加日历**单击按钮时，代码在事件处理程序将创建控件，并将其添加到与区域对象，调用方法。The first time the **Add Calendar** button is clicked, the code in the event handler creates a control, and adds it to a zone as a object, calling the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart/CS/wpmgDeleteWebPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart/VB/wpmgDeleteWebPartVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event AuthorizeWebPart As WebPartAuthorizationEventHandler

summary.span: 当调用 方法以确定 或服务器控件是否能够添加到页中时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the method is called to determine whether a or server control can be added to a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每当发生事件控件添加到页面。The event occurs whenever a control is being added to a page. 有多种控件此处可添加到页面的常见方案。There are a number of common scenarios where a control can be added to a page. 有关这些的完整说明，请参阅备注部分方法。For a full description of these, see the Remarks section for the method. 添加一个控件，其必须进行检查以查看是否其属性未设置，如果是这样，无论该控件是否有权添加到页面。When a control is added, it must be checked to see whether its property has been set and, if so, whether the control is authorized to be added to the page. 开发人员可以创建事件处理程序事件，以提供筛选的控件。Developers can create event handlers for the event, to provide filtering for controls. 如果控件的属性值不符合事件处理程序代码中的条件，控件不会添加到页面。If a control's property value does not meet the criteria in the event handler code, the control is not added to the page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置的自定义事件处理程序事件，会自动重写默认方法。The following code example demonstrates how to set a custom event handler for the event, which automatically overrides the default method. 中的代码`mgr1_AuthorizeWebPart`方法检查页上的控件是否具有其各自属性的值设置为`user`，如果是，则返回`true`，这意味着它们将被授权并添加到页面。The code in the `mgr1_AuthorizeWebPart` method checks whether the controls on the page have their respective property values set to `user` and, if so, returns `true`, which means that they will be authorized and added to the page. 这假定的默认方法是允许用户在用户的个性化设置范围中查看与页面的控件。This assumes the default approach is to allow users to view controls with a page in user personalization scope. 但请注意，在示例中其中一个控件的具有其属性值设置为`admin`。Notice, however, that in the example one of the controls has its property value set to `admin`. 开发人员可能会将此筛选器置于专供管理用户只能查看一个专用控件。Developers might place this filter on a specialized control that was designed for only administrative users to see. 此控件期间的授权检查将失败事件，并将不会显示。This control will fail the authorization check during the event, and will not be displayed. 请注意还; 显示不具有设置的属性的控件它们被假定不是筛选方案的一部分，因为其未设置的属性。Note that controls that do not have the property set are displayed as well; they are assumed not to be part of a filtering scenario because their properties are not set. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_AuthorizeWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_AuthorizeWebPart/CS/AuthorizeWebPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_AuthorizeWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_AuthorizeWebPart/VB/AuthorizeWebPartVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的存在，因此可以在不同阶段，为开发人员提供更好地控制连接过程完成的构成控件之间的连接过程。The method exists so that the process of forming connections between controls can be done in distinct stages, giving developers more control over the connection process. 方法不会执行一组初始检查，确保`webPart`处于可以合法地连接的状态。The method performs a set of initial checks to ensure that `webPart` is in a state where a connection can legitimately be formed. 如果`webPart`通过所有检查，然后将设置为当前所选控件 (请参阅属性)，并可以继续连接过程。If `webPart` passes all the checks, it is then set as the currently selected control (see the property), and the connecting process can continue.

span.para: 开发人员需要扩展控件可能会想要重写此方法在派生类中的。一种方法是调用基方法，然后添加一些附加的自定义处理;或者，可能想要完全自定义启动控件之间的连接的过程。例如，你可能想要验证在创建连接之前，某些数据也可用。

Developers who need to extend the control might want to override this method in a derived class. One approach would be to call the base method, and then add some additional custom handling; or you might want to completely customize the process of starting a connection between controls. For example, you might want to verify that certain data is available before creating the connection.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly BrowseDisplayMode As WebPartDisplayMode

summary.span: 表示包含 Web 部件控件的页的默认显示模式。

span.span: Represents the default display mode for pages that contain Web Parts controls.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字段引用自定义对象的创建，并通过包含控件。The field references a custom object that is created and contained by the control. 由于这是一个静态对象，您可以参考它直接通过而无需控件的实例的类。Because this is a static object, you can refer to it directly through the class without needing an instance of the control. 包含 Web 部件页在首次加载时，在（浏览模式） 默认情况下。When a page that contains Web Parts controls first loads, it is in (browse mode) by default. 当用户只需浏览就像在普通网页上时，页面保留在浏览模式。When users are simply browsing as they would on a normal Web page, the page remains in browse mode. 如果用户想要个性化页面的布局、 控件、 外观或行为，则必须为一个可通过专用的显示模式切换页面属性。If users want to personalize a page's layout, controls, appearance, or behavior, they must switch the page into one of the specialized display modes available through the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用字段以编程方式。The following code example demonstrates how to work with the field programmatically. 此代码填充的受支持的显示模式，在这种情况下是浏览和设计的下拉列表。The code populates a drop-down list with the supported display modes, which in this case are browse and design. 请注意，在`Page_PreRender`方法中，代码将检查是否当前属性设置为。Notice that, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code checks whether the current property is set to . 如果是这样，`Label1`将是可见的如果不能，`Label1`将被隐藏。If so, `Label1` will be visible, and if not, `Label1` will be hidden. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_BrowseDisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_BrowseDisplayMode/CS/wpmgrBrowseDisplayModecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_BrowseDisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_BrowseDisplayMode/VB/wpmgrBrowseDisplayModevb.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中的页面后，你就在默认情况下浏览模式中。After you load the page in a browser, you are in browse mode by default. 请注意，该值指示在浏览模式中的页上的标签。Notice the label on the page that indicates you are in browse mode. 使用下拉列表控件切换到设计模式下的页面。Use the drop-down list control to switch the page to design mode. 请注意，上述代码`Page_PreRender`方法，该标签现在处于隐藏状态。Notice that, because of the code in the `Page_PreRender` method, the label is now hidden.

summary.span: 检查将参与连接的 控件，以确定它们是否能够被连接。

span.span: Checks the controls that will be participating in a connection to determine whether they are capable of being connected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用于确定两个控件可以连接。The method is used to determine whether two controls can be connected. 该方法通常用作之前调用的条件检查方法。The method is typically used as a conditional check prior to calling the method. 方法检查的两个控件可以形成连接之前必须满足的条件数。The method checks a number of criteria that must be met before two controls can form a connection. 以下列表总结了用于建立连接的主要条件。The following list summarizes the primary criteria for making a connection. 如果满足这些条件 （再加上一些额外的内部条件），该方法返回`true`，这意味着这些控件可以连接：If all these criteria (plus some additional internal conditions) are met, the method returns `true`, meaning that the controls can be connected: - 提供程序和使用者控件不能`null`，并且它们必须由所引用的控件集合中包含属性。The provider and consumer controls cannot be `null`, and they must be contained in the collection of controls referenced by the property. - 提供程序和使用者不能为同一个控件。The provider and consumer cannot be the same control. 换而言之控件无法连接到其自身。In other words a control cannot connect to itself. - 对象 （连接点） 提供程序和使用者不能为`null`。The objects (connection points) for both the provider and consumer cannot be `null`. - 无法关闭提供程序和使用者 (两个控件的属性可以是`true`)。The provider and consumer cannot be closed (neither control's property can be `true`). - 连接点控件的属性必须与使用者和提供程序的控件的类型匹配。The property of the connection point control must match the type of the control of both consumer and provider. - 连接点必须同时启用 (其方法必须返回`true`)。The connection points must both be enabled (their methods must both return `true`). - 每个连接点必须尝试形成所指定在其自己的更多连接属性。Each connection point must not be attempting to form more connections than what is specified in its own property. - 如果，则需要连接不兼容的控件对象 （转换器），它不能为`null`。If a object (transformer) is required to connect incompatible controls, it cannot be `null`. 但是，如果控件已兼容，则转换器必须为`null`。However, if the controls are already compatible, the transformer must be `null`. - 转换器 （如果使用） 必须在中引用集合。The transformer (if used) must be referenced in the collection. - 转换器 （如果使用） 必须具有接口，以便它可以将两个控件之间的数据转换的提供程序和使用者与兼容的。The transformer (if used) must have interfaces that are compatible with the provider and the consumer so that it can transform data between the two controls. 使用者和提供程序的辅助接口还必须兼容。The secondary interfaces of the consumer and provider must also be compatible.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool CanConnectWebParts (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart provider, System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProviderConnectionPoint providerConnectionPoint, System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart consumer, System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPoint consumerConnectionPoint);

summary.span: 当使用者和提供者控件有兼容接口且不需要 对象时，请检查将参与连接的 控件，以确定它们是否能够被连接。

span.span: Checks the controls that will be participating in a connection to determine whether they are capable of being connected, when the consumer and provider controls have compatible interfaces and a object is not needed.

returns.span: 一个布尔值，指示是否能连接 和 。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether and can be connected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于连接`provider`并`consumer`时这两个控件具有兼容的连接点类型，以便对象，则不需要。This method is used to connect `provider` and `consumer` when both controls have compatible connection point types, so that a object is not needed. 您可能想要使用此方法验证两个控件，可以连接，然后再调若要创建的编程连接。You might want to use this method to verify that two controls can be connected before calling to create a programmatic connection. 此重载使用相同的实现方法的重载，唯一的例外是，此重载不需要转换器。This overload uses the same implementation as the method overload, with the only exception being that this overload does not require a transformer. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use this method. 代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 用户控件，可用于更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含两个自定义的网页可以连接的控件``元素，并创建一个连接使用一些事件处理代码方法。A Web page that contains two custom controls that can be connected, an `` element, and some event-handling code that creates a connection using the method. - 源代码文件包含两个自定义控件和自定义的接口。A source code file that contains two custom controls, and a custom interface. - 在浏览器中的示例工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 代码示例的第一个部分是用于更改显示模式的用户控件。The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes. 可以从示例部分中获取用户控件的源代码类概述。You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the class overview. 有关显示模式的用户控件的工作原理的详细信息，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). Web 页的声明性标记包含`Register`为用户控件和自定义控件的指令。The declarative markup for the Web page contains `Register` directives for both the user control and the custom controls. 没有``元素中，``元素以包含自定义控件和一个``元素。There is an `` element, an `` element to contain the custom controls, and an `` element. 请注意，在`Page_Load`方法中，代码检查是否连接可为和，是否是这样，定义一个提供程序、 使用者，以及它们各自的连接点，然后将新的连接添加到组的静态连接引用由属性。Notice that in the `Page_Load` method, the code checks whether the connection can be made and, if so, defines a provider, a consumer, and their respective connection points, and then adds a new connection to the set of static connections referenced by the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections/CS/wpmgrStaticConnectionCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections/VB/wpmgrStaticConnectionVB.aspx#1)] 该示例的第三部分是控件的源代码。The third part of the example is the source code for the controls. 它包含接口和两个自定义控件、 一个充当一个提供程序，另一个用作使用者。It contains an interface and two custom controls, one acting as a provider, and the other as a consumer. 因为它们具有兼容的连接点 (这两个文件识别`IZipCode`接口)，转换器不需要进行连接。Because they have compatible connection points (both of them recognize the `IZipCode` interface), a transformer is not needed to make the connection. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 已加载网页的浏览器中后，单击**显示模式**下拉列表控件，然后选择**Connect**切换页可连接模式。After you have loaded the Web page in a browser, click the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Connect** to switch the page to connect mode. 连接模式使用``元素以使您能够创建控件之间的连接。Connect mode uses the `` element to enable you to create connections between controls. 在连接模式中，单击标题栏中的向下箭头**邮政编码**控件来激活其谓词菜单，，然后单击**Connect**。In connect mode, click the downward arrow in the title bar of the **ZIP Code** control to activate its verbs menu, and then click **Connect**. 连接用户界面 (UI) 出现后，请注意是否已创建一个连接中包含的代码通过`Page_Load`方法。After the connection user interface (UI) appears, notice that a connection has already been created by the code contained in the `Page_Load` method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于连接`provider`并`consumer`时这两个控件具有不兼容的连接点类型，以便对象是必需的。This method is used to connect `provider` and `consumer` when both controls have incompatible connection point types, so that a object is required. 您可能想要使用此方法验证两个控件，可以连接，然后再调若要创建的编程连接。You might want to use this method to verify that two controls can be connected before calling to create a programmatic connection. 此重载使用相同的实现方法的重载，唯一的例外是此重载需要使用转换器。This overload uses the same implementation as the method overload, with the only exception being that this overload requires a transformer.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly CatalogDisplayMode As WebPartDisplayMode

summary.span: 表示用于从控件目录向网页添加服务器控件的显示模式。

span.span: Represents the display mode used for adding server controls from a catalog of controls to a Web page.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字段引用自定义对象的创建，并通过包含控件。The field references a custom object that is created and contained by the control. 由于这是一个静态对象，您可以参考它直接通过而无需控件的实例的类。Because this is a static object, you can refer to it directly through the class without needing an instance of the control. 当用户想要将控件添加到页中，如果服务器控件的目录可用时，则可以切换到页（目录模式下），并显示目录用户界面 (UI)。When users want to add controls to a page, if a catalog of server controls is available, they can switch the page to (catalog mode), and the catalog user interface (UI) appears. Web 部件目录的 UI 提供的区域控件。The UI for a Web Parts catalog is provided by a zone control. 开发人员在设计时，将此区域添加到页，然后将服务器控件添加到区域，以便用户能够在运行时将这些控件添加到其页面。Developers add this zone to the page at design time, and then add server controls to the zone, so that users will be able to add those controls to their pages at run time. 开发人员已添加这些控件后，目录模式变得在页上的受支持的显示模式，因为所需的控件有启用目录模式。After the developer has added these controls, catalog mode becomes a supported display mode on the page because the necessary controls are there to enable catalog mode. 当用户切换目录模式、 区域和已添加到变得可见，它的所有服务器控件的页面和用户可以选择目录将添加到页上，或从页中移除控件中的控件。When a user switches a page to catalog mode, the zone and all the server controls that were added to it become visible, and the user can select controls from the catalog to add to the page, or remove controls from the page. 控件已添加到页面后，它们出现在正常浏览模式并更新页面。After the controls have been added to the page, they appear in normal browse mode and the page is updated. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用字段以编程方式。The following code example demonstrates how to work with the field programmatically. 此代码填充页上，在这种情况下是浏览、 设计和目录的受支持的显示模式的下拉列表。The code populates a drop-down list with the supported display modes for the page, which in this case are browse, design, and catalog. 目录模式是由于可用``元素，并在 Web 页面及其子元素。The catalog mode is available because of the `` element and its child elements in the Web page. 请注意，在`Page_PreRender`方法中，代码将检查是否当前属性设置为。Notice that, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code checks whether the current property is set to . 如果是这样，`Label1`将是可见的如果不能，`Label1`将被隐藏。If so, `Label1` will be visible, and if not, `Label1` will be hidden. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_CatalogDisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CatalogDisplayMode/CS/wpmgrCatalogDisplayModecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_CatalogDisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CatalogDisplayMode/VB/wpmgrCatalogDisplayModevb.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中的页面后，你就在默认情况下浏览模式中。After you load the page in a browser, you are in browse mode by default. 请注意页面上的标签处于隐藏状态。Notice that the label on the page is hidden. 使用下拉列表控件以切换到目录模式的页面。Use the drop-down list control to switch the page to catalog mode. 请注意，上述代码`Page_PreRender`方法中，标签现已显示。Notice that, because of the code in the `Page_PreRender` method, the label is now visible. 可以在目录中选择的控件，并将其添加到页面上的两个区域之一。You can select the control in the catalog and add it to either of the two zones on the page.

Public Overridable Property CloseProviderWarning As String

member this.CloseProviderWarning : string with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置一个警告，用户关闭在连接中充当其他控件的提供者的控件时，会显示该警告。

span.span: Gets or sets a warning that is displayed when a user closes a control that is acting as a provider to other controls in a connection.

value.span: 一个包含警告消息的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the warning message.

value.span: 默认值是一条由 .NET Framework 提供的、特定于区域性的消息。

span.span: The default is a culture-specific message supplied by the .NET Framework.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户关闭控件，通常情况下不显示任何消息。When a user closes a control, normally no message is displayed. 这意味着若要关闭一个控件的详细信息，请参阅方法。For more information about what it means to close a control, see the method. 但是，当控件连接到另一个控件，并充当其他控件的数据提供程序，用户尝试关闭该控件时，将显示默认警告消息。However, when a control is connected to another control and is acting as a provider of data to the other control, a default warning message is displayed when a user attempts to close the control. 该消息会通知用户，提供者控件即将关闭，这意味着，用于控制连接到此提供程序，如使用者将不再有任何要使用的数据。The message tells users that a provider control is about to close, which means that controls connected to this provider as consumers will no longer have any data to consume. 属性使开发人员能够自定义向用户显示的警告消息。The property enables developers to customize the warning message that is displayed to the user. 当用户关闭时，如果页面开发人员将为空或 null 字符串值分配给此属性，将显示任何警告消息框是一个提供程序的控制。If a page developer assigns an empty or null string value to this property, no warning message box will be shown when a user closes a control that is a provider. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以向用户显示自定义警告。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display a custom warning to users. 代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 用户控件，可用于更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 源代码文件包含两个自定义控件和自定义的接口。A source code file that contains two custom controls and a custom interface. - 包含两个自定义的网页可以连接的控件和一个``元素。A Web page that contains two custom controls that can be connected and an `` element. - 在浏览器中的示例工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 下面的代码包含示例的 Web 页部分。The following code contains only the Web page portion of the example. 您还需要自定义用户控件和上面提到的自定义控件的源代码。You will also need the custom user control and the source code for the custom controls mentioned above. 从示例部分获取这两项类概述。Obtain these two items from the Example section of the class overview. 以下网页代码演示了如何将分配到自定义警告消息属性中的声明性标记中``元素。The following Web page code demonstrates how to assign a custom warning message to the property in declarative markup in the `` element. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseProviderWarning#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseProviderWarning/CS/webpartmanagerConnectionCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseProviderWarning#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CloseProviderWarning/VB/webpartmanagerConnectionVB.aspx#1)] 已加载网页的浏览器中后，单击**显示模式**下拉列表控件，然后选择**Connect**切换页可连接模式。After you have loaded the Web page in a browser, click the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Connect** to switch the page to connect mode. 连接模式使用``元素以使您能够创建控件之间的连接。Connect mode uses the `` element to enable you to create connections between controls. 在连接模式中，单击标题栏中的向下箭头**邮政编码**控件来激活其谓词菜单，，然后单击**Connect**。In connect mode, click the downward arrow in the title bar of the **ZIP Code** control to activate its verbs menu, and then click **Connect**. 连接用户界面 (UI) 出现后，单击**创建连接到使用者**链接。After the connection user interface (UI) appears, click the **Create a connection to a Consumer** link. 单元格将显示具有下拉列表控件。A cell appears that has a drop-down list control. 选择**天气控件**在下拉列表中，单击**Connect**来完成两个控件的连接。Select **Weather Control** in the drop-down list, and click **Connect** to complete the connection of the two controls. 单击**关闭**，然后使用**显示模式**下拉列表，以将页返回到正常浏览模式。Click **Close**, and then use the **Display Mode** drop-down list to return the page to normal browse mode. 最后，单击的谓词菜单**邮政编码**控件 （这是提供者控件在这种情况下），然后选择**关闭**。Finally, click the verbs menu for the **ZIP Code** control (which is the provider control in this case) and select **Close**. 自定义消息分配给显示属性。The custom message you assigned to the property is displayed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void CloseWebPart(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: webPart
param.span: 正在 中关闭的 或服务器控件。

span.span: A or server control that is being closed in a .

summary.span: 以不在网页上呈现，但可以重新打开的方式关闭 控件。

span.span: Closes a control in such a way that it is not rendered on a Web page, but can be reopened.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法移除或其他服务器控件，以使其不呈现在最初包含该网页上。The method removes a or other server control so that it is not rendered on the Web page that originally contained it. 已关闭的控件添加到对象，该维护对已关闭的控件的引用，并使控件还原到的页对象。The closed control is added to a object, which maintains a reference to the closed control and makes it possible for the control to be restored to the page. 已关闭控件仍显示在所引用的集合属性。A closed control still appears in the collection referenced by the property. 关闭一个控件是不同于删除它。Closing a control is different from deleting it. 已关闭的控件仍可用于将还原到一个页面，但已删除的控件实例永久删除，而且永远不会还原。Closed controls are still available to be restored to a page, but a deleted control instance is permanently removed and can never be restored. 无论是否或服务器控件 （在页面的标记中声明） 的静态或动态 （添加到页面以编程方式或通过用户从 Web 部件目录），它可以关闭并重新打开上一个页面。Regardless of whether a or server control is static (declared in the markup of a page) or dynamic (added to the page programmatically or by a user from a Web Parts catalog), it can be closed and reopened on a page. 通常情况下，用户可以关闭通过单击其谓词菜单并选择关闭谓词的控件。Typically, users can close a control by clicking its verbs menu and selecting the close verb. 也可以通过直接调用关闭控件方法并将其传递到引用`webPart`。A control can also be closed by directly calling the method and passing it a reference to `webPart`. 在页面上其中控件都已关闭，如果开发人员声明``元素，并在其中添加``元素，它提供了适合用户已关闭的控件还原到页上，在运行时的简单的用户界面 (UI)。On a page where controls have been closed, if a developer declares an `` element, and within it adds an `` element, it provides a simple user interface (UI) for users to restore closed controls to the page at run time. 用户可以将页切换到目录显示模式，并已关闭的控件将显示在页目录中。Users can switch the page into catalog display mode, and the closed controls will appear within the page catalog. 用户可以选择已关闭的控件并将它们添加回页面的任何位置力度，和所选的控件然后还原到页并按正常方式呈现。Users can select closed controls and add them back to the page at whatever position they desire, and then the selected controls are restored to the page and rendered as normal. 当方法调用时，它会发出多个事件： ， （如果有多个控件），和（如果有连接的控件）。When the method is called, it raises several events: , (if there are multiple controls), and (if there are connected controls). 通常情况下开发人员可以取消这些事件，但在某些情况下它不能取消它们。Normally developers can cancel these events, but in certain cases it is not possible to cancel them. 有关详细信息，请参阅的文档， ，和事件。For details, see the documentation for the , , and events. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 用户控件，可用于更改页的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change page display modes. - 自定义控件。A custom control. - 网页。A Web page. - 在浏览器中的示例工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 代码示例的第一个部分是用于更改显示模式的用户控件。The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes. 可以从示例部分中获取用户控件的源代码类概述。You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the class overview. 有关显示模式的用户控件的工作原理的详细信息，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 代码示例的第二部分是自定义控件。The second part of the code example is the custom control. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此示例使用动态编译的方法;因此没有任何`Assembly`属性中`Register`指令针对此控件在网页的顶部。This example uses the dynamic compilation approach; thus there is no `Assembly` attribute in the `Register` directive for this control at the top of the Web page. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly ConnectDisplayMode As WebPartDisplayMode

summary.span: 表示用于显示特殊用户界面 (UI) 以便用户管理 控件之间的连接的显示模式。

span.span: Represents the display mode used for displaying a special user interface (UI) for users to manage connections between controls.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字段引用自定义对象的创建，并通过包含控件。The field references a custom object that is created and contained by the control. 由于这是一个静态对象，您可以参考它直接通过而无需控件的实例的类。Because this is a static object, you can refer to it directly through the class without needing an instance of the control. 当用户想要管理之间的连接控件在网页上，如果区域已声明的页上，则可以切换到页模式。When users want to manage connections between controls on a Web page, if a zone has been declared on the page, they can switch the page into the mode. 连接显示模式显示特殊用户界面管理连接，其中包括能够连接或断开连接的控件，并编辑现有连接的详细信息。The connect display mode displays a special UI for managing connections, which includes the ability to connect or disconnect controls, and to edit the details of existing connections. 如果你想要向用户提供的功能使用由 Web 部件控件集提供的用户界面中管理连接，您必须声明``中页的标记元素。If you want to provide users with the ability to manage connections with the UI provided by the Web Parts control set, you must declare an `` element in the markup of a page. 与其他类型的元素不同区域，不需要添加此元素中的任何其他标记; 您只需将元素声明本身。Unlike the elements for the other types of zones, you do not need to add any other tags within this element; you simply declare the element by itself. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的使用情况模式。The following code example demonstrates the usage of the mode. 代码示例包含三个部分：The code example has three parts: - 包含接口和自定义的源文件可以形成连接的控件。A source file that contains an interface and custom controls that can form a connection. - 一个网页，提供连接用户界面，并演示如何使用模式。A Web page that provides a connection UI and demonstrates working with the mode. - 如何运行该示例的说明。An explanation of how to run the example. 代码示例的第一个部分是包含接口和两个自定义的源文件的设计使它们可以连接的控件。The first part of the code example is a source file that contains an interface and two custom controls that are designed so they can be connected. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译的方法。This code example uses the dynamic compilation approach. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_ConnectDisplayMode#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_ConnectDisplayMode/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_ConnectDisplayMode#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_ConnectDisplayMode/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 该示例的第二部分是托管的自定义控件的网页。The second part of the example is a Web page that hosts the custom controls. 在服务器内`

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Connections As WebPartConnectionCollection

summary.span: 获取对网页上所有当前连接的集合的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the collection of all current connections on a Web page.

value.span: 包含一组 对象的 。

span.span: A that contains a set of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供了一种方法来访问当前的页上的连接集。The property provides a way to access the current set of connections on a page. 集合本身是只读的并且想要处理集合中的特定连接开发人员应使用等方法和。The collection itself is read-only, and developers who want to manipulate a specific connection from the collection should use methods such as and . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何声明和以编程方式使用控件。The following code example demonstrates declarative and programmatic use of the control. 代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 用户控件，可用于更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含两个自定义的网页可以连接的控件和一个``元素。A Web page that contains two custom controls that can be connected, and an `` element. - 源代码文件包含两个自定义控件和自定义的接口。A source code file that contains two custom controls and a custom interface. - 在浏览器中的示例工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 下面的代码包含示例的 Web 页部分。The following code contains only the Web page portion of the example. 您还需要自定义用户控件和上面提到的自定义控件的源代码。You will also need the custom user control and the source code for the custom controls mentioned above. 从示例部分获取这两项类概述。Obtain these two items from the Example section of the class overview. 以下网页代码演示如何使用属性以编程方式在页面上获取当前连接数。The following Web page code demonstrates how to use the property programmatically to get the count of current connections on a page. 请注意，在`

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ConnectionsActivated As EventHandler

summary.span: 在页上的所有当前 Web 部件连接不仅已经连接，而且已经开始在每个连接所涉及的使用者控件和提供者控件之间共享数据之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after all the current Web Parts connections on a page are not only connected, but have also begun actively sharing data between the consumer and provider controls involved in each connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生命周期的连接，此事件发生后页面完成加载过程。In the life cycle of connections, this event occurs after a page completes its loading process. 它也会发生后事件，仅指示或特定连接中所涉及的服务器控件已成功连接。It also occurs after the event, which indicates only that the or server controls involved in a specific connection have successfully connected. 用例中有多个连接在页上，方法指示页上的所有有效 Web 部件连接现为活动状态，并且能够共享数据。In a case where there are multiple connections on a page, the method indicates that all the valid Web Parts connections on a page are now active and able to share data. 如果知道所有连接都处于活动状态，开发人员可以执行任意数量的任务，包括通知用户的所有连接的状态通知使用者控件处理并显示来自其提供程序，数据等等。Knowing that all connections are active, developers can carry out any number of tasks, including notifying users of the status of all the connections, notifying consumer controls to process and display data from their providers, and so on. 与此事件关联方法，用于引发事件并允许开发人员创建自定义事件处理程序。This event is associated with the method, which raises the event and allows developers to create custom handlers for the event. 页面开发人员可以创建自定义事件的处理程序通过添加`OnConnectionsActivated`属性为``页上，然后将自定义方法名称分配给该属性中的元素。Page developers can create a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnConnectionsActivated` attribute to the `` element in the page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ConnectionsActivating As EventHandler

summary.span: 在激活网页上所有已建立的 Web 部件连接的过程中发生。

span.span: Occurs during the process of activating all the established Web Parts connections on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 生命周期的连接，会发生此事件页之前完成其加载过程，如调用方法。In the life cycle of connections, this event occurs as a page is completing its loading process, just before the method is called. 不同于事件，这涉及到之间的特定连接或其他服务器控件。It is different from the event, which involves a particular connection between or other server controls. 事件发生时在页面上所有可能的连接已连接并且要激活。The event occurs when all the possible connections on a page have been connected and are about to be activated. 与事件关联方法，引发事件。The event is associated with the method, which raises the event. 控件开发人员想要扩展可以添加到页的连接类型可以重写受保护方法并激活其他类型的连接。Control developers who want to extend the type of connections that can be added to a page could override the protected method and activate additional types of connections. 页面开发人员可以创建自定义事件的处理程序通过添加`OnConnectionsActivating`属性为``页上，然后将自定义方法名称分配给该属性中的元素。Page developers can create a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnConnectionsActivating` attribute to the `` element in the page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

summary.span: 在 区域中的两个 控件（或其他能建立连接的服务器控件）之间创建一个连接。

span.span: Creates a connection between two controls (or other server controls capable of forming connections) that reside in a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法之间建立任何两个可以连接的控件。The method forms a connection between any two controls that can be connected. 调用此方法以创建连接之前，您可能还想要调用条件检查，以确保控件满足的要求，构成一个连接中的方法。Before calling this method to create a connection, you might also want to call the method in a conditional check to ensure that the controls meet the requirements for forming a connection. > [!NOTE] > 还有可能不是两个服务器控件之间创建连接控件。It is also possible to create a connection between two server controls that are not controls. 一般情况下，必须在两个控件进行自定义服务器控件 (例如，从继承的控件或现有的 ASP.NET 服务器控件)，以便您可以添加所需的成员。In general, the two controls would have to be custom server controls (for example, controls that inherit from or existing ASP.NET server controls) so that you could add the required members. 控件还必须满足以下要求。The controls would also have to meet the requirements specified below. 任何类型的两个控件之间的连接方案必须满足以下要求，才能将无法连接：Any type of connection scenario between two controls must meet the following requirements to be able to connect: - 每个控件位于区域 （它不会不一定是相同的区域）。Each control resides in a zone (it does not have to be the same zone). - 在 Web 部件控件集中实现时，在连接中的提供者控件实现一个接口作为公共方法用作回调到提供程序，并具有`ConnectionProvider`方法以将标识为提供程序连接上的元数据属性点。As implemented in the Web Parts control set, the provider control in a connection implements an interface as a public method that serves as a callback to the provider, and has a `ConnectionProvider` metadata attribute on the method to identify it as a provider connection point. 因为方法检索提供程序连接点是虚方法，派生控件不一定必须使用相同的元数据属性。Because the method that retrieves provider connection points is virtual, a derived control does not necessarily have to use the same metadata attribute. - 在 Web 部件控件集中实现时，在连接中的使用者控件还具有一个特殊的方法，使它能够获取对提供程序的回调方法中公开的接口的引用和使用者拥有`ConnectionConsumer`上的元数据属性该方法以将标识为使用者连接点。As implemented in the Web Parts control set, the consumer control in a connection also has a special method that enables it to get a reference to the interface that is exposed in the provider's callback method, and the consumer has a `ConnectionConsumer` metadata attribute on the method to identify it as a consumer connection point. 因为方法检索使用者连接点是虚方法，派生控件不一定必须使用相同的元数据属性。Because the method that retrieves consumer connection points is virtual, a derived control does not necessarily have to use the same metadata attribute. - 回调方法必须是兼容的提供程序的回调方法 （即，使用者和提供程序可以直接共享数据），或者开发人员提供的接口，使用者可以使用的类型必须使用对象传递给从提供程序将数据转换成使用者可以使用的窗体。The callback methods must either be compatible, in that the consumer can use the type of interface supplied in the provider's callback method (meaning that the consumer and provider can share data directly), or the developer must use a object to transform the data from the provider into a form that the consumer can use. > [!IMPORTANT] > 如果不需要转换器，使用方法重载。When you do not need a transformer, use the method overload. 当需要转换器时，使用方法重载。When you need a transformer, use the method overload.

summary.span: 只使用对控件的引用和控件所指定的 对象在两个 或 控件之间创建连接。

span.span: A that contains the various information about the provider and the consumer needed for a connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载用于连接控件，其连接点使其能够连接而不使用充分兼容时对象。This overload is used to connect controls when their connection points are sufficiently compatible that they can connect without using a object. 当调用此重载方法时，它只是将传递到其他重载版本的方法，调用并传递`null`的参数，它需要对象。When this overload of the method is called, it simply passes the call to the other overloaded version of the method, and passes `null` for the parameter that requires a object. 当您尝试以编程方式连接两个控件时，可以使用条件检查，以确定是否可以直接连接控件中的方法。When you attempt to connect two controls programmatically, you can use the method in a conditional check to determine whether the controls can be directly connected. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此方法以编程方式创建的连接。The following code example demonstrates how to use this method to create a connection programmatically. 运行该示例所需的完整代码，请参阅示例部分类概述。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 从该示例中，您需要允许您更改的页上，显示模式的用户控件的源代码和源代码的两个自定义控件。From that example, you will need the source code for the user control that allows you to change display modes on the page, and the source code for the two custom controls. 承载这两个 Web 页的代码控制如下所示。The code for the Web page that hosts the two controls follows. 页面使用`Register`顶部的指令以声明的用户控件和自定义控件。The page uses `Register` directives at the top to declare the user control and the custom controls. 然后以声明方式在引用的自定义控件``元素。The custom controls are then referenced declaratively within an `` element. 处理的代码`Button1_Click`方法创建使用控件之间的连接方法。The code that handles the `Button1_Click` method creates a connection between the controls by using the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_ConnectWebParts1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_ConnectWebParts1/CS/wpmgrConnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_ConnectWebParts1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_ConnectWebParts1/VB/wpmgrConnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中的页面后，单击**连接 web 部件控件**按钮以形成连接。After you load the page in a browser, click the **Connect WebPart Controls** button to form the connection. 然后可以在文本框中输入一些数据，并单击**输入 5 位数字的邮政编码**按钮，以演示，控件已连接，并且第一个控件中输入的数据更新在第二个。You can then enter some data in the text box, and click the **Enter 5-digit ZIP Code** button to demonstrate that the controls are connected, and that data entered in the first control is updated in the second.

summary.span: 使用对两个 或 控件的引用、它们的指定 对象和一个 对象在这两个控件之间创建连接。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此重载用于连接控件时它们的连接点不兼容。This overload is used to connect controls when their connection points are incompatible. 发生不兼容时`consumer`实现不同接口比`provider`作为连接点。The incompatibility occurs when `consumer` implements a different interface than `provider` as its connection point. 转换器将数据转换为类型可以理解的`consumer`。The transformer converts the data into a type that can be understood by `consumer`.

span.span: Connections have already been activated in .

summary.span: 获取包含在网页的 区域中并由 控件管理的所有 、服务器或用户控件的集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of all , server, or user controls that are contained in zones on a Web page and are managed by the control.

value.span: 一个 ，包含由 控件管理的所有控件。

span.span: A that contains all controls managed by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性不引用所引用的其他控件控件，如各种区域控件，或控件和其他人。The property does not reference the other controls that are referenced by the control, such as the various zone controls, or controls, and others. 此属性使用 Web 部件控件集，以及在大多数开发情况下不应在代码中调用。This property is used by the Web Parts control set, and in most development situations it is not intended to be called from your code. 出于此原因，尽管该属性是公共的但它是隐藏的智能感知。For this reason, although the property is public, it is hidden from IntelliSense. 开发人员想要访问的集合或由其他服务器控件控件应使用其属性。Developers who want to access the collection of or other server controls managed by the control should use its property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart CopyWebPart(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: 要复制的 或服务器控件。

span.span: The or server control to be copied.

summary.span: 由 Web 部件控件集用来创建 或服务器控件的副本，以向网页中添加该控件。

span.span: Used by the Web Parts control set to create a copy of a or server control for the purpose of adding the control to a Web page.

returns.span: 要添加到页中的 。

span.span: A to be added to a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不能调用在代码中直接的方法。You cannot call the method directly from your code. 在内部调用此方法控件添加新的动态的过程的一部分或到页服务器控件。This method is called internally by the control as part of the process of adding a new dynamic or server control to a page. 动态控件添加到页面以编程方式或通过 Web 部件用户界面 (UI)，例如通过将控件添加的控件，而不是直接在页的标记中声明了静态控件目录中的用户。A dynamic control is added to a page programmatically or through the Web Parts user interface (UI), for example by a user adding a control from a catalog of controls, as opposed to a static control, which is declared directly in the markup of a page. > [!NOTE] > 如果开发人员想要启用该方法以处理复制方案的更多控制，则可以在派生类中重写方法。The method can be overridden in a derived class if developers want to enable the method to handle additional control copying scenarios. 有关详细信息，请参阅对继承者部分的说明。For details, see the Notes to Inheritors section. 添加新的动态控件时，如果它是控件，方法将返回该控件的新实例。When a new dynamic control is added, if it is a control, the method returns a new instance of the control. 如果要添加的控件 （如用户控件、 自定义控件或 ASP.NET 控件） 的服务器控件的某些其他类型，已将具有与包装控件由 Web 部件控件集的对象。If the control being added is some other type of server control (such as a user control, a custom control, or an ASP.NET control), the control will already have been wrapped with a object by the Web Parts control set. 当方法遇到控件，它将返回的新实例控件包装在其中的子控件的新实例。When the method encounters a control, it returns a new instance of the control with a new instance of the child control wrapped within it. 当方法创建要返回的控件的新副本，它也会重置所有属性的值为其默认值。When the method creates a new copy of a control to return, it also resets the values of all the properties to their default values. 请注意，是否你想要保留可个性化属性的值，并将它们复制到新的控件实例，应调用也方法。Note that, if you want to preserve the values of the personalizable properties and have them copied to the new control instance, you should call the method as well. 由执行的最后一步方法是调用方法来获取该控件的新 ID。The final step carried out by the method is to call the method to obtain a new ID for the control. > [!NOTE] > 因为此方法获取复制的控件的新 ID，您应该不依赖于引用其原始 id 添加到页面的动态控件Because the method obtains a new ID for a copied control, you should not rely on referencing a dynamic control that is added to a page by its original ID. 相反，应引用该方法返回的控件的新实例。Instead, you should reference the new instance of the control returned by the method.

span.para: 该方法声明为，以便开发人员无法继承类中重写方法，并提供有关其他方案，它可以在其中创建的控件的副本。例如，该方法可能可以选择接收作为输入已序列化到 XML 文件的控件。方法无法反序列化 XML （如果存在），然后调用基方法来处理现有用例，并返回的新实例控件。

The method is declared as so that developers could inherit from the class, override the method, and provide for additional scenarios in which it could create copies of controls. For example, the method could optionally receive as input a control that has been serialized into an XML file. The method could deserialize the XML (if present), and then call the base method to handle the existing cases and to return a new instance of a control.

summary.span: 为 Web 部件应用程序创建由所有可能的显示模式组成的显示模式集。

span.span: Creates the set of all possible display modes for a Web Parts application.

returns.span: 一个 ，包含所有受支持的显示模式。

span.span: A that contains all the display modes that are supported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法创建所有可能的显示模式，而不仅仅是在特定页面上受支持的显示模式的列表。This method creates the list of all possible display modes, not just the display modes supported on a particular page. 有关受支持的显示模式的详细信息，请参阅属性。For more information about the supported display modes, see the property. 默认情况下，Web 部件控件集创建下面的一组要在 Web 部件页上使用的显示模式：By default, the Web Parts control set creates the following set of display modes to be used on Web Parts pages: - - - - - 开发人员可以创建自定义显示模式，可以使用或不附带派生的自定义区域或类。Developers can create custom display modes, either with or without accompanying custom zones that derive from the or classes. 若要创建自定义显示模式，则必须从类，并且将显示模式添加为受支持的模式页面上，您必须继承自类并重写方法。To create a custom display mode, you must inherit from the class, and to add your display mode as a supported mode on a page, you must inherit from the class and override the method. 当使用添加显示模式方法，您应将其添加你希望它们在任何用户界面 (UI) 控件中显示的顺序 (如控件)，向用户提供可能的显示模式页面上。When you add display modes by using the method, you should add them in the order that you want them to appear in any user interface (UI) controls (such as a control) that provide to users the possible display modes on a page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 代码示例包含五个部分：The code example has five parts: - 用户控件，可用于更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 承载其他控件的网页。A Web page that hosts the other controls. - 驻留在用户控制Web 页面上的区域并使您能够输入和显示在标签中的文本。A user control that resides in a zone on the Web page, and enables you to enter and display text in a label. - 包含两个控件的源的代码文件。A source code file that contains two controls. 一个是一个自定义，另一个控件，是一个自定义要添加到页面的默认显示模式对象。One is a custom control, and the other is a custom object to add to the page's default display modes. - 源代码文件包含两个自定义控件和自定义的接口。A source code file that contains two custom controls, and a custom interface. - 在浏览器中的示例工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 代码示例的第一个部分是用于更改显示模式的用户控件。The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes. 可以从示例部分中获取用户控件的源代码类概述。You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the class overview. 有关显示模式的用户控件的工作原理的详细信息，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 该示例的第二部分是 Web 页。The second part of the example is the Web page. 它包含两个控件，用户控件和自定义控件。It contains two controls, both user controls, and the custom control. 请注意`Register`在页面顶部的指令来引用用户控件和编译控件的命名空间。Notice the `Register` directives at the top of the page to reference the user controls and namespace for the compiled controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/CS/createDisplayModeCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/VB/createDisplayModeVB.aspx#1)] 该示例的第三个部分是用于输入和显示文本的用户控件。The third part of the example is the user control for entering and displaying text. 它使用控件创建 UI 的多个视图。It uses a control to create multiple views of the UI. 一个视图显示与`Button1`按钮，另一个却没有。One view appears with the `Button1` button, the other without. 请注意，在重写`OnPreRender`方法中，代码检查以查看页面当前是否在自定义显示模式下，如果是这样，将显示该用户控件，其中包括按钮的第一个视图。Notice that in the overridden `OnPreRender` method, the code checks to see whether the page is currently in the custom display mode and, if so, displays the first view of the user control, which includes the button. 如果该页不在自定义显示模式中，例如，如果页是在浏览或设计模式下，按钮处于隐藏状态。If the page is not in the custom display mode, for example if the page is in browse or design mode, the button is hidden. [!code-aspx-csharp[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/CS/TextDisplaycs.ascx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/VB/TextDisplayvb.ascx#2)] 该示例的第四个部分是两个自定义类的源文件。The fourth part of the example is the source file for the two custom classes. 请注意，自定义类将重写方法，并且它首先调用基方法，以添加所有默认显示模式，然后添加自定义显示模式。Notice that the custom class overrides the method, and that it first calls the base method to add all the default display modes, and then adds the custom display mode. 自定义显示模式类`InLineEditDisplayMode`，只需继承、 在构造函数中设置的显示模式的名称和重写的基属性来建立自定义显示的特征数。The custom display mode class, `InLineEditDisplayMode`, simply inherits from , sets the name of the display mode in the constructor, and overrides a number of the base properties to establish the characteristics of the custom display. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/CS/CustomDisplayMode.cs#3)] [!code-vb[Webparts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_CreateDisplayModes/VB/CustomDisplayMode.vb#3)] 若要运行的代码示例，请加载浏览器中的页。To run the code example, load the page in a browser. 请注意页面目前在浏览模式中，没有按钮可见。Notice that the page is currently in browse mode, and no button is visible. 使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件中，更改到的页**内联编辑显示**模式和，请注意现在`Button1`按钮是在较低的用户控件中可见。Using the **Display Mode** drop-down list control, change the page to **Inline Edit Display** mode, and notice that now the `Button1` button is visible in the lower user control. 添加一些文本，然后单击更新管理按钮。Add some text, and click the button to update the control. 请注意，页面显示返回到浏览模式，现在显示您输入的文本，按钮再次处于隐藏状态，因为页面已不再在自定义显示模式下。Notice that the page display is returned to browse mode, the text you entered is now displayed, and the button is once again hidden because the page is no longer in the custom display mode.

Developers can override this method in a derived class to change the implementation for generating a unique ID.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当控件添加到 Web 页，它们可以是静态 （这意味着在页标记中声明的控件） 或动态 （这意味着它们将以编程方式添加）。When controls are added to a Web page, they can be static (which means the control is declared in the page markup) or dynamic (which means they are added programmatically). 在任何情况下，控件创建新的动态控件将添加到页上，它将调用此方法以生成唯一 id。In any scenario where the control is creating new dynamic controls to add to the page, it calls this method to generate a unique ID. 方法是虚方法，以便开发人员可以重写它如果他们想要提供自定义实现来生成此 id。The method is virtual so that developers can override it if they want to provide a custom implementation for generating the ID.

returns.span: 插入页中以替代未能加载或创建的控件的 。

span.span: An that is inserted into a page in place of a control that failed to be loaded or created.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 时的 Web 部件控件集尝试加载或创建的动态实例调用方法或服务器控件使用，而且由于某种原因而失败。The method is called when the Web Parts control set attempts to load or create an instance of a dynamic or server control, and it fails for some reason. 该方法将创建对象，将一条错误消息分配给它，并将其返回。The method creates an object, assigns an error message to it, and returns it. 控件插入失败，在控件的位置，并且其错误消息显示在页上。The control is inserted in place of the control that failed, and its error message is displayed on the page. 不能调用在代码中直接的方法。You cannot call the method directly from your code. 但是，继承自类和扩展方法。However, you can inherit from the class and extend the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅继承者部分的说明。For details, see the Notes for Inheritors section. 最终用户可以使用控制在页面中很多类似的方式进行常规控件。End users can work with an control in a page much like they would a normal control. 若要删除的错误消息，用户可以关闭控件通过单击关闭谓词，此时该控件将添加到对象，像任何其他已关闭的控件一样。To remove the error message, they can close the control by clicking the close verb, at which point the control will be added to a object, like any other closed control. 如果最终用户删除也将从页面删除控件时，无法加载服务器控件。If an end user deletes an control, the server control that failed to load will also be deleted from the page.

span.para: 如果你想要自定义中返回的信息控件，可重写方法，调用基方法、 不同的值分配传递到基方法的参数和返回生成控件。例如，如果不希望最终用户查看值 （该值将显示一个用户控件的虚拟目录路径），调用基方法时可以传递一个空字符串 ("") 为该参数。此外可以自定义的行为控件本身，通过从其继承。例如，您可能希望重写其或属性。

If you want to customize the information that is returned in the control, you can override the method, call the base method, assign different values to the parameters passed to the base method, and then return the resulting control. For example, if you do not want end users to see the value (which would show the virtual directory path of a user control), when you call the base method you could pass an empty string ("") for that parameter. You can also customize the behavior of the control itself, by inheriting from it. For example, you might want to override its or property.

param.name: control
param.span: 一个不是 控件的服务器控件。

span.span: A server control that is not a control.

summary.span: 用 对象包装一个不是 控件的服务器控件，以使该控件能具有 Web 部件的功能。

span.span: Wraps a server control that is not a control with a object, so that the control can have Web Parts functionality.

returns.span: 一个 ，包装 并使其功能与真正的 控件一样。

span.span: A that wraps and enables it to function as a true control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是启用的不是服务器控件的主要机制控件以相同的功能对其执行控件，从而完全参与到 Web 部件应用程序。The method is the main mechanism for enabling server controls that are not controls to take on the same functionality as a control, and thus to participate fully in Web Parts applications. 通过使用此方法，开发人员都得到了显著扩展的 Web 部件应用程序，他们可以将服务器控件的数量，因为几乎任何类型的服务器控件-可以使用标准 ASP.NET 控件、 用户控件和自定义控件。By using this method, developers vastly expand the number of server controls that they can use in a Web Parts application, because virtually any type of server control--standard ASP.NET controls, user controls, and custom controls--can be used. 控件还使用此方法在两种情况下包装与服务器控件对象。The control also uses this method in two other scenarios to wrap server controls with a object. 当用户将服务器控件添加到页通过使用控制，如果导入的控件不是控件，调用方法。When users add server controls to a page by using the control, if the imported control is not a control, the method is called. 此外，当服务器控件声明中的持久性格式网页上的区域方法调用的任何控件，不是控件。Also, when server controls are declared in persistence format within a zone on a Web page, the method is called for any controls that are not controls. 时以编程方式向区域添加服务器控件，典型的方法是使用方法以使用包装控件对象，，然后调用方法将控件添加到所有的集合控件在页上，通过引用属性。When you add a server control to a zone programmatically, a typical approach is to use the method to wrap the control with a object, and then call the method to add the control to the collection of all controls on the page, which is referenced by the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用方法。The following code example demonstrates use of the method. 在`Button2_Click method`，则调用方法来包装控件，其之前将其添加到该区域的对象。In the `Button2_Click method`, the method is called to wrap a control with a object before adding it to the zone. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart/CS/wpmgDeleteWebPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart/VB/wpmgDeleteWebPartVB.aspx#1)]
