This method can be overridden to use a derived class instead of the base class provided with the Web Parts control set.

summary.span: 获取或设置一个自定义警告消息，当最终用户删除一个控件时，将显示该消息。

span.span: Gets or sets a custom warning message displayed to end users when they delete a control.

value.span: 包含警告消息文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that contains the text of the warning message.

value.span: 默认值是经本地化的警告消息。

span.span: The default value is a localized warning message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户删除控件，通常显示默认警告消息。When a user deletes a control, normally a default warning message is displayed. 它会警告用户删除控件的此实例时，删除是永久性。It warns the user that when this instance of a control is deleted, the deletion is permanent. 页面开发人员可以向用户提供一种方法将控件的新实例添加到页面 (如通过目录的控件，或通过某些编程的方式)，但永久移除已删除的控件的当前实例。The page developer might provide users with a way to add a new instance of the control to the page (such as through a catalog of controls, or through some programmatic means), but the current instance of a control that is deleted is permanently removed. 如果需要，将显示警告对话框中包括用户以取消删除，一个按钮。The dialog box that displays the warning includes a button for the user to cancel the deletion, if desired. 属性使开发人员能够设置向用户显示的警告消息。The property enables developers to set the warning message that is displayed to the user. 如果页面开发人员分配一个空字符串 ("") 将显示任何警告消息对话框中的此属性的值，当用户删除控件。If a page developer assigns an empty string ("") value to this property, no warning message dialog box will be shown when a user deletes a control. > [!NOTE] > 属性未显示在静态的情况下控件和服务器控件。The property is not displayed in the case of static controls and server controls. 服务器控件中声明静态控件在 Web 页的标记中的区域。Static controls are server controls that are declared within a zone in the markup of a Web page. 此类控件是静态的因为它们不能删除，因此永远不会在这种情况下显示删除警告消息。Because such controls are static, they cannot be deleted, so the delete warning message is never displayed in that case. 静态控件可以关闭用户，但已关闭的控件添加到页目录中，从中可以由添加它返回到页用户，而永远无法恢复已删除的控件。Static controls can be closed by a user, but a closed control is added to the page catalog, from which it can be added back to the page by a user, whereas a deleted control can never be recovered. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性以声明方式和以编程方式。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property declaratively and programmatically. 有四个部分的代码示例：There are four parts to the code example: - 用户控件，可用于更改页的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change page display modes. - 自定义控件。A custom control. - 网页。A Web page. - 在浏览器中的示例工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 代码示例的第一个部分是用于更改显示模式的用户控件。The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes. 可以从示例部分中获取用户控件的源代码类概述。You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the class overview. 有关显示模式的用户控件的工作原理的详细信息，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 代码示例的第二部分是自定义控件。The second part of the code example is the custom control. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此示例使用动态编译的方法;因此没有任何`Assembly`属性中`Register`指令针对此控件在网页的顶部。This example uses the dynamic compilation approach; thus there is no `Assembly` attribute in the `Register` directive for this control at the top of the Web page. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWarning#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWarning/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWarning#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWarning/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#3)] 代码示例的第三部分是 Web 页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 该页面包含区域，使用的自定义控件，以便用户可以将其添加到页在运行时在该区域中声明。The page contains a zone, with the custom control declared in the zone, so that a user can add it to the page at run time. 请注意，可以从页面删除仅动态控件 （以编程方式或从与此类似的目录添加到页的控件）。Note that only dynamic controls (controls that are added to a page programmatically or from a catalog like this one) can be deleted from a page. 静态控件 (中声明的控件区域在页面的标记中) 可以关闭，但不会被删除。Static controls (controls that are declared within a zone in the markup of a page) can be closed, but never deleted. ``元素声明的自定义值属性使用`DeleteWarning`属性。The `` element declares a custom value for the property by using the `DeleteWarning` attribute. `Button1_Click`方法将分配到另一个自定义值属性。The `Button1_Click` method assigns another custom value to the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWarning#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWarning/CS/deleteWarningCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWarning#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWarning/VB/deleteWarningVB.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中的页面后，需要将添加到页面的控件。After you load the page in a browser, you need to add the control to the page. 使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件中，选择目录模式。Using the **Display Mode** drop-down list control, select catalog mode. 出现目录后，选择自定义控件旁边的复选框，单击**外**以将其添加到页上，然后单击**关闭**返回页后，可以浏览模式。When the catalog appears, select the check box next to the custom control, click **Add** to add it to the page, and then click **Close** to return the page to browse mode. 现在，控件可见，则可以将其删除。Now that the control is visible, you can delete it. 使用**显示模式**再次控件，将页切换到设计模式 （页在浏览模式中时不能删除控件）。Using the **Display Mode** control again, switch the page into design mode (you cannot delete controls while the page is in browse mode). 单击的标头中的谓词菜单 （箭头符号）控件，并选择**删除**。Click the verbs menu (the arrow symbol) in the header of the control, and select **Delete**. 对其设置的警告`DeleteWarning`属性将会显示。The warning that you set on the `DeleteWarning` attribute appears. 单击**取消**。Click **Cancel**. 现在，单击标记为按钮**更改删除警告**，这将以编程方式更改的属性值。Now click the button labeled **Change Delete Warning**, which changes the property value programmatically. 在控件上的谓词菜单中，选择**删除**同样，请注意，此时会出现其他警告消息。From the verbs menu on the control, select **Delete** again, and notice that this time the other warning message appears.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void DeleteWebPart(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: webPart
param.span: 要删除的服务器控件。

span.span: The server control to be deleted.

summary.span: 永久地从网页中移除 控件的动态实例。

span.span: Permanently removes a dynamic instance of a control from a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法永久移除所表示的控件`webPart`参数从一个页面。The method permanently removes the control represented by the `webPart` parameter from a page. 与关闭的控件，它将添加到控制和可重新添加到页上，可以永远不会将已删除的控件实例添加回页面。Unlike a closed control, which is added to the control and can be added back to the page, a deleted control instance can never be added back to the page. > [!NOTE] > 由 Web 部件控件实现的设置，用户若要删除动态的能力控件取决于用户和控件添加到页面中的个性化设置范围。As implemented by the Web Parts control set, the ability for users to delete a dynamic control depends on the user and the personalization scope in which the control was added to a page. 如果控件 （由具有权限的用户） 共享作用域中页面时添加，则该控件不能删除由各个用户页面时用户作用域中。If the control is added when the page is in shared scope (by a user who has permissions), then the control cannot be deleted by individual users when the page is in user scope. 可以删除仅动态控件。Only dynamic controls can be deleted. 以编程方式或通过用户从目录中添加控件动态控件添加到一个页面。Dynamic controls are added to a page programmatically or by users adding controls from a catalog. 静态控件添加到以声明方式中的标记或持久性格式的页。Static controls are added to a page declaratively in the markup or persistence format. 由于声明性标记都永久存在的标记中，可以永远不会删除静态控件，但可以关闭并重新打开。Because the declarative tags are permanently present in the markup, static controls can never be deleted, but they can be closed and reopened. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 第一次**添加日历**单击按钮时，代码在事件处理程序将创建控件，并将其添加到与区域对象。The first time the **Add Calendar** button is clicked, the code in the event handler creates a control, and adds it to a zone as a object. 以编程方式添加了控件，因为它是一个动态控件，并因此被删除。Because the control is added programmatically, it is a dynamic control, and therefore it can be deleted. 当用户单击**删除日历**按钮，该代码可确保控件存在，并且删除通过调用方法。When a user clicks the **Delete Calendar** button, the code ensures that the control exists, and then deletes it by calling the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart/CS/wpmgDeleteWebPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DeleteWebPart/VB/wpmgDeleteWebPartVB.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly DesignDisplayMode As WebPartDisplayMode

summary.span: 表示用于更改包含 Web 部件控件的网页布局的显示模式。

span.span: Represents the display mode used for changing the layout of Web pages that contain Web Parts controls.

summary.span: 此字段为只读。

span.span: This field is read-only.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字段引用自定义对象的创建，并通过包含控件。The field references a custom object that is created and contained by the control. 由于这是一个静态对象，您可以参考它直接通过而无需控件的实例的类。Because this is a static object, you can refer to it directly through the class without needing an instance of the control. 包含 Web 部件页在首次加载时，在（浏览模式） 默认情况下。When a page that contains Web Parts controls first loads, it is in (browse mode) by default. 当用户想要通过将控件移到不同区域或在当前区域内更改页的布局时，则必须先切换到页（设计模式下）。When users want to change the layout of the page by moving controls to different zones or within the current zones, they must first switch the page to (design mode). 在设计模式下显示各区域的用户界面 (UI)，并且用户可以拖动控件来更改布局。In design mode, the user interface (UI) for the various zones appears, and users can then drag controls to change the layout. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用字段以编程方式。The following code example demonstrates how to work with the field programmatically. 此代码填充页上，在这种情况下是浏览和设计的受支持的显示模式的下拉列表。The code populates a drop-down list with the supported display modes for the page, which in this case are browse and design. 请注意，在`Page_PreRender`方法中，代码将检查是否当前属性设置为。Notice that, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code checks whether the current property is set to . 如果是这样，`Label1`将是可见的如果不能，`Label1`将被隐藏。If so, `Label1` will be visible, and if not, `Label1` will be hidden. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_DesignDisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DesignDisplayMode/CS/wpmgrDesignDisplayModecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_DesignDisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DesignDisplayMode/VB/wpmgrDesignDisplayModevb.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中的页面后，你就在默认情况下浏览模式中。After you load the page in a browser, you are in browse mode by default. 请注意页面上的标签处于隐藏状态。Notice that the label on the page is hidden. 使用下拉列表控件切换到设计模式下的页面。Use the drop-down list control to switch the page to design mode. 请注意，上述代码`Page_PreRender`方法中，标签现已显示。Notice that, because of the code in the `Page_PreRender` method, the label is now visible.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void DisconnectWebPart(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed
abstract member DisconnectWebPart : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart -> unit override this.DisconnectWebPart : System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart -> unit

param.name: webPart
param.span: 要断开连接的 控件。

span.span: A control that is to be disconnected.

summary.span: 移除要关闭或要从其所参与的连接中删除的 或服务器控件。

span.span: Removes a or server control that is being closed or deleted from any connections it is participating in.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法会在内部调用的 Web 部件控件集时在页上关闭或从页中删除控件。The method is called internally by the Web Parts control set when a control is either closed on a page or deleted from a page. 在此类方案中，方法被调用来删除该控件从任何连接它涉及作为使用者或提供程序。In such a scenario, the method is called to remove the control from any connections where it is involved as a consumer or provider. 如果控件已从任何连接，此方法还会调用方法来结束的任何连接`webPart`曾参与过。If the control is removed from any connection, this method also calls the method to end any connections in which `webPart` was involved. 当方法调用时，它会发出事件。When the method is called, it raises the event. 通常情况下可以取消此事件，但不是能取消两种情况下。Normally this event can be cancelled, but in two cases it cannot be cancelled. 页上，在请求期间发生一个用例时调用方法。One case occurs during requests to the page, when the method is called. 如果在现有的连接之间冲突将调用方法以关闭一个相互冲突的连接，并在这种情况事件不能被取消，因为必须解决该冲突。If there is a conflict among existing connections, the method will be invoked to close one of the conflicting connections, and in this instance the event cannot be cancelled, because the conflict must be resolved. 另一种情况时或关闭或删除当前连接的服务器控件。The other case occurs when a or server control that is currently connected is either closed or deleted. 在这种情况下，由于该控件正在从删除页上，也会终止，因此不能取消的设计及其连接需要事件中断结束连接的过程。In this case, because of the control is being removed from the page, its connection needs to be terminated as well, therefore by design it is not possible to cancel the event to interrupt the process of ending a connection. 有关详细信息，请参阅 事件。For more information, see the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 使用两个自定义控件，Web 页使你可以通过单击一个按钮，而另一个按钮，可断开的控件的控件之间创建连接。Using two custom controls, the Web page enables you to create a connection between the controls by clicking a button, while another button enables you to disconnect the controls. 如果该页是在浏览模式中，并且控件已连接时，会关闭其中一个控件的重写方法断开连接已关闭的控件、 结束连接，并显示一条消息。If you close one of the controls while the page is in browse mode and the controls are connected, an override of the method disconnects the closed control, ends the connection, and displays a message. 代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 一个用于更改显示模式的用户控件。A user control for changing display modes. - 包含自定义的源文件控件。A source file containing custom controls. - 若要承载控件网页。A Web page to host the controls. - 在浏览器中的示例工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 代码示例的第一个部分是用于更改显示模式的用户控件。The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes. 可以从示例部分中获取用户控件的源代码类概述。You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the class overview. 有关显示模式的用户控件的工作原理的详细信息，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 第二部分是包含两个自定义的源代码的文件将连接的控件和自定义控件。The second part is the file containing the source code for the two custom controls that will be connected, and a custom control. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此示例使用动态编译，因此`Register`指令，它引用这些组件在 Web 页中的声明相应地在 Web 页的顶部。This example uses dynamic compilation, so the `Register` directive that references these components in the Web page is declared accordingly at the top of the Web page. 有关演示编译选项的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates compiling options, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 中的源代码，请注意，继承的控件`MyWebPartManager`重写方法。In the source code, notice the inherited control `MyWebPartManager` that overrides the method. 此方法检查页以查看被关闭的控件是否参与连接，如果是这样，调用中的每个连接方法来结束连接。This method checks each connection in a page to see whether the control being closed participates in the connection and, if so, calls the method to end the connection. 这等同于中的方法的基实现控件。This is identical to the base implementation of the method in the control. 重写的方法并自定义通过将消息写入到页的基实现。The overridden method then customizes the base implementation by writing a message to the page. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 代码示例的第三部分是 Web 页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 请注意顶部附近，它包含`Register`指令来注册该用户控件，并具有动态编译的程序集控件。Notice that near the top, it contains `Register` directives to register the user control, and the dynamically compiled assembly with the controls. 页都有两种主要方法。The page has two primary methods. `Button1_Click`方法创建控件之间的连接时`Button2_Click`方法则断开控件。The `Button1_Click` method creates a connection between the controls, while the `Button2_Click` method disconnects the controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts/CS/wpmgrDisconnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts/VB/wpmgrDisconnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 加载页面后，单击**Connect**按钮，以连接控件。After you load the page, click the **Connect** button to connect the controls. 然后单击其中一个控件 （该控件的标头中的向下箭头），谓词菜单并选择**关闭**谓词菜单中。Then click the verbs menu in one of the controls (the downward arrow in the header of the control), and select **Close** from the verbs menu. 当您尝试关闭该控件时，重写的方法调用、 连接结束，和消息写入到页。When you try to close the control, the overridden method is called, the connection is ended, and the message is written to the page. 如果你想要重置页后，可以还原已关闭的控件并尝试使用其他选项，请单击**重置用户状态**链接中删除个性化设置数据和还原在页的原始状态。If you want to reset the page to restore the closed control and experiment with other options, click the **Reset User State** link to remove personalization data and restore the page's original state.

span.span: Carries out the process of disconnecting server controls that are connected on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法执行结束之间的连接的完整过程或服务器控件时，将其传递`connection`参数。The method carries out the complete process of ending a connection between or server controls, when you pass it the `connection` parameter. 此方法用于在将断开连接控件``网页，以提供用于管理连接的用户界面 (UI) 中的元素。This method is used to disconnect controls when you place an `` element in a Web page, to provide a user interface (UI) for managing connections. 当页面已在连接显示模式 ()，且当前连接存在，则用户可以单击一个按钮来调用方法来结束连接。When a page is in connect display mode (), and a current connection exists, users can click a button that calls the method to end the connection. 您还可以调用方法直接从代码中，如果你想要断开连接控件以编程方式，而无需添加``到页面的元素。You can also call the method directly from your code, if you want to disconnect controls programmatically and without having to add an `` element to a page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 使用两个自定义控件，Web 页使你可以通过单击一个按钮，而另一个按钮，可断开的控件的控件之间创建连接。Using two custom controls, the Web page enables you to create a connection between the controls by clicking a button, while another button enables you to disconnect the controls. 代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 一个用于更改显示模式的用户控件。A user control for changing display modes. - 包含自定义的源文件控件。A source file containing custom controls. - 若要承载控件网页。A Web page to host the controls. - 在浏览器中的示例工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 代码示例的第一个部分是用于更改显示模式的用户控件。The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes. 可以从示例部分中获取用户控件的源代码类概述。You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the class overview. 有关显示模式的用户控件的工作原理的详细信息，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 第二部分是一个包含两个自定义的源代码文件将连接的控件。The second part is a file containing the source code for the two custom controls that will be connected. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此示例使用动态编译，因此`Register`指令，它引用这些组件在 Web 页中的声明相应地在 Web 页的顶部。This example uses dynamic compilation, so the `Register` directive that references these components in the Web page is declared accordingly at the top of the Web page. 有关演示编译选项的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates compiling options, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 代码示例的第三部分是 Web 页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 请注意顶部附近，它包含`Register`指令来注册用户控件和动态编译的程序集与控件。Notice that near the top, it contains `Register` directives to register the user control and the dynamically compiled assembly with the controls. 页都有两种主要方法。The page has two primary methods. `Button1_Click`方法创建控件之间的连接和`Button2_Click`方法则断开控件。The `Button1_Click` method creates a connection between the controls, and the `Button2_Click` method disconnects the controls. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts/CS/wpmgrDisconnectWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DisconnectWebParts/VB/wpmgrDisconnectWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 加载页面后，可以单击**Connect**按钮，以连接控件。After you load the page, you can click the **Connect** button to connect the controls. 如果在文本框控件中，输入一些文本，然后单击**Enter**按钮，文本将显示在连接的控件 （它将不显示如果控件已断开连接）。If you enter some text in the text box control, and then click the **Enter** button, the text will be displayed in the connected control (it would not be displayed if the controls were disconnected). 如果单击**断开连接**按钮时，控件将断开连接。If you click the **Disconnect** button, the controls will be disconnected. 可以使用验证控件的连接状态**显示模式**要切换到页的下拉列表控件**Connect**模式。You can verify the connection status of the controls by using the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page into **Connect** mode. 之后，单击其中一个控件的标题栏中 （由一个箭头表示） 的谓词菜单，然后选择**Connect**项。After doing that, click the verbs menu (represented by an arrow) in the title bar of one of the controls, and select the **Connect** item. 显示连接用户界面;它是可用的因为没有``页面中声明的元素。The connection UI is displayed; it is available because there is an `` element declared in the page. 您还可以连接和断开此 UI 的控件。You can also connect and disconnect the controls from this UI.

span.para: 您可以重写方法，如果你想要更改正在断开连接的默认实现控件。如果你重写方法，并且只是想要将某些实现添加到现有的方法，可以调用基方法，然后执行你自己的代码。

You can override the method if you want to change the default implementation for disconnecting controls. If you do override the method, and you simply want to add some implementation to the existing method, you can call the base method prior to executing your own code.

summary.span: 获取或设置包含 Web 部件控件的网页的活动显示模式。

span.span: Gets or sets the active display mode for a Web page that contains Web Parts controls.

value.span: 确定页显示模式的 。

span.span: A that determines a page's display mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含 Web 部件控件的页面始终是多个可能的显示模式之一。A page that contains Web Parts controls is always in one of several possible display modes. 有关显示模式的详细信息，请参阅[Web 部件页显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc106284-82dc-4770-98cb-673dbc4ed4c4)。For details about display modes, see [Web Parts Page Display Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc106284-82dc-4770-98cb-673dbc4ed4c4). 类创建网页的显示模式。The class creates the display modes for a Web page. 使用基类，控件创建可以用在包含 Web 部件控件的页的多个标准显示模式对象。Using the base class, the control creates several standard display mode objects that can be used on pages that contain Web Parts controls. 这些标准的显示模式进行了介绍类概述。These standard display modes are described in the class overview. 控件还管理使用 Web 部件控件的页的显示模式。The control also manages the display modes for pages that use Web Parts controls. 使用属性，控件在页面上将保留对当前显示模式下的引用。Using the property, the control keeps a reference to the current display mode on a page. 此外可以使用属性页切换到不同的显示模式。You can also use the property to switch a page into different display modes. 更改使用 Web 部件控件的页面上的显示模式的示例，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For an example of changing display modes on a page that uses Web Parts controls, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 为管理显示模式的一部分控件还提供事件和事件处理程序与相关显示模式，如方法和方法。As part of managing the display mode, the control also provides events and event handlers relating to display modes, such as the method and the method. 这些方法提供了一种机制，用于自定义页面的行为，以及甚至将添加自定义显示模式。These methods provide a mechanism for customizing a page's behavior, and even for adding a custom display mode. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 加载后在浏览器中的页，可以使用页面底部附近的按钮以切换显示模式。After loading the page in a browser, you can use the buttons near the bottom of the page to switch display modes. 页是在默认情况下浏览模式中加载时。The page is in browse mode by default when it loads. 如果您切换到设计模式下，可以将服务器控件从一个区域拖到另一个，或安排在一个区域中的两个控件。If you switch to design mode, you can drag the server controls from one zone to another, or arrange two controls within one zone. 如果切换到编辑模式，则可以单击任何一个服务器控件，选择的标头中的谓词菜单**编辑**，和编辑使用提供的编辑用户界面 (UI) 控件。If you switch to edit mode, you can click the verbs menu in the header of either of the server controls, select **Edit**, and edit the control using the provided editing user interface (UI). > [!NOTE] > 在 Web 部件应用程序中的显示模式之间切换是很常见，并且可能想要提供包含 Web 部件控件的所有页面上执行此操作的一致、 可重复使用方法。Switching among display modes in a Web Parts application is very common, and you might want to provide a consistent, reusable way to do this on all your pages that contain Web Parts controls. 有关在很多页上，可以重用更改显示模式和用户控件的示例，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For an example of a user control that changes display modes and that can be reused on many pages, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_DisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DisplayMode/CS/wpmgrDisplayModecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_DisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DisplayMode/VB/wpmgrDisplayModevb.aspx#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event DisplayModeChanged As WebPartDisplayModeEventHandler

summary.span: 当 Web 部件页上的当前显示模式更改之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after the current display mode on a Web Parts page has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示模式是 Web 部件应用程序的重要组成部分。Display modes are an integral part of Web Parts applications. 当用户切换到不同的显示模式在网页上时，页面通常会采用非常不同的外观，具体取决于新的显示模式的用途。When users switch to a different display mode on a Web page, the page will often take on a very different appearance, depending on the purpose of the new display mode. 一种显示模式已更改后，您可能想要在用户界面 (UI) 中进行某些更改如隐藏或显示某些控件中，更改所选的 UI 元素的外观等。After a display mode has changed, you might want to make certain changes in the user interface (UI), such as hiding or showing certain controls, changing the appearance of selected UI elements, and so on. > [!NOTE] > 显示模式的详细信息，请参阅[Web 部件页显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc106284-82dc-4770-98cb-673dbc4ed4c4)。For more information on display modes, see [Web Parts Page Display Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc106284-82dc-4770-98cb-673dbc4ed4c4). 使用事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 使用 Web 窗体应用程序中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information on consuming events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md).

summary.span: 当用户单击网页上的谓词以启动不同显示模式之间的更改过程之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after a user clicks a verb on a Web page that begins the process of changing to a different display mode.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 显示模式是 Web 部件应用程序的重要组成部分。Display modes are an integral part of Web Parts applications. 当用户切换到不同的显示模式在网页上时，页面通常会采用非常不同的外观，具体取决于新的显示模式的用途。When users switch to a different display mode on a Web page, the page will often take on a very different appearance, depending on the purpose of the new display mode. 用户启动通过单击谓词更改为新的显示模式的过程后，你可能想要通过用户界面 (UI) 中进行某些更改属性来确定新的显示模式将为，然后更改各种用户界面元素相应地。After a user initiates the process of changing to a new display mode by clicking a verb, you might want to make certain changes in the user interface (UI) by using the property to determine what the new display mode will be, and then changing various UI elements accordingly. 执行此操作的有用方法是重写方法以自定义 UI。A useful way to do this is to override the method to customize the UI. > [!NOTE] > 显示模式的详细信息，请参阅[Web 部件页显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc106284-82dc-4770-98cb-673dbc4ed4c4)。For more information on display modes, see [Web Parts Page Display Modes](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/cc106284-82dc-4770-98cb-673dbc4ed4c4). 使用事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 使用 Web 窗体应用程序中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information on consuming events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md).

value.span: 一个 ，包含一组 控件关联的 对象。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性引用关联的所有显示模式，相较于属性，引用是可用 （支持） 当前页上的显示模式。The property references all associated display modes, in contrast with the property, which references only the display modes that are available (supported) on the current page. 提供的显示模式、 浏览和设计，其中两个始终支持在页面上。Two of the provided display modes, browse and design, are always supported on a page. 其他三个显示模式、 编辑、 目录和连接支持仅当页具有特定显示模式工作所需的区域的相应类型。The other three display modes, edit, catalog, and connections, are supported only when a page has the corresponding type of zone necessary for a particular display mode to work. 例如，如果您的页面不包含区域中，编辑显示模式会显示在所引用的集合属性，但不是会显示在所引用的集合中属性。For example, if you page does not contain an zone, the edit display mode would appear in the collection referenced by the property, but would not appear in the collection referenced by the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用属性。The following code example shows the programmatic use of the property. 代码使用此属性可在 Web 部件控件集中的所有显示模式列表中填充，甚至包括那些不支持在当前页上。The code uses this property to populate the list with all the display modes available in the Web Parts control set, even those that are not supported on the current page. 在这种情况下，该目录并连接的显示模式不支持，因为所需的相应区域不在页面上。In this case, the catalog and connect display modes are not supported, because their corresponding required zones are not on the page. 其他三个显示模式--浏览、 设计和编辑--支持在页面上。The other three display modes--browse, design, and edit--are supported on the page. 编辑支持模式，因为该页面包含区域，而浏览和设计模式始终受支持。Edit mode is supported because the page contains an zone, while browse and design modes are always supported. 加载浏览器中的页面后，可以使用下拉列表控件切换到设计模式下，浏览模式的页面，然后编辑模式。After you load the page in a browser, you can use the drop-down list control to switch the page from browse mode to design mode, and then to edit mode. 在编辑模式下，您可以单击其中一个服务器控件的标头中的下拉谓词菜单并选择**编辑**编辑该控件。In edit mode, you can click the drop-down verbs menu in the header of one of the server controls, and select **Edit** to edit the control. 请注意，如果您选择**目录**或**Connect**在下拉列表中，生成一个错误页。Note that if you select **Catalog** or **Connect** in the drop-down list, an error page is generated. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_DisplayModes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DisplayModes/CS/wpmgrDisplayModescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_DisplayModes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_DisplayModes/VB/wpmgrDisplayModesvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 获取网页上当前存在的所有动态连接的集合。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 动态连接都是以编程方式，而不是以静态方式创建的连接。Dynamic connections are connections that are created programmatically, as opposed to statically. 在 Web 窗体页的标记中声明创建静态连接。Static connections are created by declaring them in the markup of a Web Forms page. 以编程方式，或使用连接用户界面 (UI) 创建连接用户形成动态连接。Dynamic connections are formed either programmatically, or by a user creating a connection using the connection user interface (UI). 集合，但它是只读的不能更改其内容，将提供以编程方式访问每个动态连接对象。The collection, though it is read-only and you cannot change its contents, does provide programmatic access to each dynamic connection object. > [!NOTE] > 若要执行常见操作，如连接或断开控件，开发人员应使用的公共方法，在类，如和，而无需尝试直接修改连接中的对象集合。To perform common operations such as connecting or disconnecting controls, developers should use the public methods on the class, such as and , rather than trying to directly modify connection objects in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字段引用自定义对象的创建，并通过包含控件。The field references a custom object that is created and contained by the control. 由于这是一个静态对象，您可以参考它直接通过而无需控件的实例的类。Because this is a static object, you can refer to it directly through the class without needing an instance of the control. 包含 Web 部件页在首次加载时，在（浏览模式） 默认情况下。When a page that contains Web Parts controls first loads, it is in (browse mode) by default. 当用户想要编辑或修改服务器控件时，则必须先切换到页（编辑模式下）。When users want to edit or modify a server control, they must first switch the page to (edit mode). 第二，他们必须选择特定的服务器控件进行编辑，通过单击该控件的标头中的谓词菜单上的编辑谓词。Second, they must select a specific server control to edit, by clicking the edit verb on the verbs menu in that control's header. 该控件处于编辑模式后，编辑用户界面 (UI) 会显示用于编辑选定的控件。After the control is in edit mode, the editing user interface (UI) appears for editing the selected control. 若要启用页面上的编辑模式下，页必须包含至少一个区域包含一个或多个所提供的编辑控件，如控件或自定义编辑控件。To enable edit mode on a page, the page must contain at least one zone that includes one or more of the provided editing controls, such as the control, or custom editing controls. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用字段以编程方式。The following code example demonstrates how to work with the field programmatically. 此代码填充页上，在这种情况下是浏览、 设计和编辑的受支持的显示模式的下拉列表。The code populates a drop-down list with the supported display modes for the page, which in this case are browse, design, and edit. 若要支持编辑，``元素是在页中。To support editing, an `` element is in the page. 请注意，在`Page_PreRender`方法中，代码将检查是否当前属性设置为。Notice that, in the `Page_PreRender` method, the code checks whether the current property is set to . 如果是这样，`Label1`将是可见的如果不能，`Label1`将被隐藏。If so, `Label1` will be visible, and if not, `Label1` will be hidden. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_EditDisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_EditDisplayMode/CS/wpmgrEditDisplayModecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_EditDisplayMode#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_EditDisplayMode/VB/wpmgrEditDisplayModevb.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中的页面后，你就在默认情况下浏览模式中。After you load the page in a browser, you are in browse mode by default. 请注意页面上的标签处于隐藏状态。Notice the label on the page is hidden. 使用下拉列表控件切换到编辑模式的页。Use the drop-down list control to switch the page to edit mode. 请注意，上述代码`Page_PreRender`方法中，标签现已显示。Notice that, because of the code in the `Page_PreRender` method, the label is now visible. 单击**编辑**上一个控件，以启用该特定控件的编辑的谓词菜单中的谓词。Click the **Edit** verb in the verbs menu on one of the controls, to enable editing of that specific control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供了一种方法为开发人员若要禁用客户端脚本。The property provides a way for developers to disable client scripts. 您可能希望禁用客户端脚本出于安全目的，或以确保对页的所有用户将都具有类似的用户体验，即使它们使用不同的浏览器。You might want to disable client scripting for security purposes, or to ensure that all users of a page will have a similar user experience, even if they use different browsers. 您可以禁用客户端脚本通过添加`EnableClientScript`属性为元素在网页上，如下面的声明性代码行中所示：You can disable client scripting by adding an `EnableClientScript` attribute to the element on a Web page, as in the following line of declarative code: `` 此外，开发人员可以消除此属性，通过继承自类和设置默认值设为`false`。Also, developers could eliminate this property by inheriting from the class and setting the default value to `false`. Web 部件控件集使用的客户端脚本提供了一些客户端用户界面 (UI) 和个性化功能。The Web Parts control set uses client scripting to provide some of the client user interface (UI) and personalization features. 如果禁用客户端脚本、 Web 部件控件仍然起作用，但某些功能将被禁用。If you disable client scripting, Web Parts controls still work, but some features are disabled. 若要将控件拖到不同区域的功能已禁用，以及呈现控件的标题栏 （谓词改为显示为控件的标题栏中的链接） 中的下拉谓词菜单中的谓词的功能。The ability to drag controls into different zones is disabled, along with the ability to render verbs in a drop-down verbs menu in a control's title bar (the verbs are instead displayed as links in the control's title bar).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件重写基属性以确保它始终返回值为`true`。The control overrides the base property to ensure that it always returns a value of `true`. 这是因为 Web 部件控件集要求使用主题呈现 Web 部件控件的子控件控制且形成 Web 页的用户界面 (UI)。This is done because the Web Parts control set requires the use of themes to render the Web Parts controls that are child controls of the control and that form the user interface (UI) of a Web page. 例如，使用主题呈现的各种区域，并位于区域，其中包括各种类型的控件部件控件 (从继承的控件类)，用户控件、 ASP.NET 服务器控件和自定义服务器控件。For example, themes are used to render the various zones, and the controls that reside in the zones, including the various types of part controls (controls that inherit from the class), user controls, ASP.NET server controls, and custom server controls. 尽管重写属性实现为读/写属性根据其基属性，无法设置属性，因为设计它必须始终返回值为`true`。Although the overridden property is implemented as a read/write property in accordance with its base property, you cannot set the property, because by design it must always return a value of `true`. 如果您尝试设置属性，引发异常。If you attempt to set the property, a exception is thrown.

span.span: An attempt was made to set the property value.

summary.span: 完成将 控件连接到另一个控件的过程。

span.span: Completes the process of connecting a control to another control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法完成连接的过程到另一个控件的控件。The method finishes the process of connecting a control to another control. 它是到对应方法。It is the counterpart to the method. 方法可确保引用的个性化设置对象属性是不可修改，这是必要的因为建立连接本身是一种类型的个性化设置。The method ensures that the personalization object referenced by the property is modifiable, which is necessary because forming a connection is itself a type of personalization. 然后该方法确保对象不是`null`，最后调用方法。The method then ensures that the object is not `null`, and finally calls the method.

span.span: The control referenced by the property is .

span.para: 开发人员需要扩展控件可能会想要重写此方法在派生类中的。一种方法是调用基方法，然后添加一些附加的自定义处理，或者你可能想要完全自定义完成控件之间的连接的整个过程。

Developers who need to extend the control might want to override this method in a derived class. One approach would be to call the base method and then add some additional custom handling, or you might want to completely customize the entire process of completing a connection between controls.

summary.span: 完成编辑 控件的过程。

span.span: Completes the process of editing a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法完成编辑过程控件。The method finishes the process of editing a control. 它是到对应方法。It is the counterpart to the method. 方法可确保引用的个性化设置对象属性是不可修改，这是必要的因为控件编辑这一过程需要的个性化设置更改。The method ensures that the personalization object referenced by the property is modifiable, which is necessary because editing a control is a process that requires personalization changes. 然后该方法确保对象不是`null`，以便当前所选可以更改控制，并且最后调用方法。The method then ensures that the object is not `null`, so that the currently selected control can change, and finally it calls the method.

span.span: The control referenced by the property is .

span.para: 开发人员需要扩展控件可能会想要重写此方法在派生类中的。一种方法是调用基方法，然后添加一些附加的自定义处理，或者你可能想要完全自定义完成编辑控件的整个过程。例如，在重写方法中，无法首先，调用基方法，然后添加一些代码来确定进行了哪些编辑更改，并显示更改的列表返回给最终用户作为一条确认消息。

Developers who need to extend the control might want to override this method in a derived class. One approach would be to call the base method and then add some additional custom handling, or you might want to completely customize the entire process of completing the editing of a control. For example, in the override method, you could call the base method first, and then add some code that determines what editing changes were made, and displays the list of changes back to the end user as a confirmation.

value.span: 默认消息是由 .NET Framework 提供的、特定于区域性的值。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当用户尝试导出敏感状态数据从控件，如果任何要导出的数据来自已标记为敏感的源代码中的成员时，向在一个消息框，告知他们的用户显示一条警告消息正在导出敏感数据并提供一个机会，若要取消导出。When a user attempts to export sensitive state data from a control, if any of the data being exported comes from a member that was marked as sensitive in the source code, a warning message is displayed to the user in a message box, telling them that sensitive data is being exported and providing an opportunity to cancel the export. 开发人员可以通过设置标记为敏感的特定成员的数据`isSensitive`的参数`[Personalizable]`属性为`true`成员上。Developers can mark a specific member's data as sensitive by setting the `isSensitive` parameter of the `[Personalizable]` attribute to `true` on the member. 有关此属性和参数的详细信息，请参阅类。For more information about this attribute and parameter, see the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 当您使用 Web 部件的导出功能时，敏感数据可能潜在将导出到未经授权的用户。When you use the export feature of Web Parts, sensitive data could potentially be exported to unauthorized users. 有关如何保护用户免受此威胁的详细信息，请参阅[保护的 Web 部件页面](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ada6210-ed00-4157-b3e9-a7e87e77caa2)。For details on how to protect against this threat, see [Securing Web Parts Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ada6210-ed00-4157-b3e9-a7e87e77caa2). 每当用户尝试导出时，会显示默认消息。The default message is displayed whenever users attempt to export. 但是，通过将分配到的值属性，可以提供自定义的警告消息。However, by assigning a value to the property, you can provide a custom warning message. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将声明性的属性。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property. 以下 Web 页面的代码使用一种标准控制并将其放在某个区域中。The code for the following Web page uses a standard control and places it in a zone. 将与包装控件控件在运行时，使其能够充当真正控件。The control will be wrapped with a control at run time, which enables it to act as a true control. 若要使控件可导出，`ExportMode`属性添加到``元素，元素和属性值设置为，可以导出这意味着该敏感和非敏感数据。To make the control exportable, an `ExportMode` attribute is added to the `` element, and the attribute value is set to , which means that both sensitive and non-sensitive data can be exported. 此外请注意，在``元素，`ExportSensitiveDataWarning`属性分配自定义值。Note also that in the `` element, the `ExportSensitiveDataWarning` attribute is assigned a custom value. 请注意，对于代码示例正常工作，必须在 Web.config 文件，以使导出 Web 部件说明文件中添加的设置。Note that for the code example to work, there is a setting you must add in the Web.config file to enable exporting Web Parts description files. 确保您有 Web 页所在的目录中为此代码示例的 Web.config 文件。Ensure that you have a Web.config file in the same directory as the Web page for this code example. 内``部分中，请确保有``具有元素`enableExport`属性设置为`true`，如以下标记。Within the `` section, make sure there is a `` element with an `enableExport` attribute set to `true`, as in the following markup. `` `...` `` [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_ExportSensitiveData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_ExportSensitiveData/CS/wpmgrExportSensitiveWarningCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_ExportSensitiveData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_ExportSensitiveData/VB/wpmgrExportSensitiveWarningVB.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中的页面后，单击 （向下箭头表示） 的谓词菜单中包含的链接控件的标题栏。After you load the page in a browser, click the verbs menu (represented by a downward arrow) in the title bar of the control that contains the links. 在谓词菜单中，选择**导出**，请注意，与该自定义警告出现一个消息框。In the verbs menu, select **Export**, and notice that a message box appears with the custom warning. 如果你想要继续导出，请单击**确定**，这将允许你保存的 XML 说明文件的本地副本的有关控件的所有数据。If you want to continue with the export, click **OK**, which will allow you to save a local copy of an XML description file with all the data about the control.

summary.span: 创建包含服务器控件的状态和属性数据的 XML 说明文件。

span.span: Creates an XML description file that contains state and property data for a server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将从各种状态和属性的数据组合`webPart`到一个 XML 文件。The method assembles various state and property data from `webPart` into an XML file. 数据包括有关控件本身，包括其程序集、 状态数据和属性数据的信息。The data includes information about the control itself, including its assembly, state data, and property data. 启动导出的用户可以将 XML 文件保存到磁盘中，在本地计算机或网络上。The user who initiates the export can save the XML file to disk on the local computer or the network. 其他用户可以描述文件导入到另一个页面或网站，并应用到其他实例的状态和属性数据`webPart`。Other users can then import the description file to a different page or Web site, and apply the state and property data to a different instance of `webPart`. 这提供了用户可以共享和重复使用的设置，服务器控件的快速而方便机制，它还为开发人员提供了一种控制外观和行为的导出和导入控件。This provides a fast and convenient mechanism for users to share and reuse their settings on server controls, and it also provides developers with a means to control the appearance and behavior of exported and imported controls. 上的属性`webPart`默认情况下不导出。Properties on `webPart` are not exported by default. 若要启用的属性的导出，必须将其与标记`[Personalizable]`的源代码中的属性。To enable export of a property, you must mark it with the `[Personalizable]` attribute in the source code. 可以选择性地将标记为包含敏感数据，通过设置一个可导出属性`isSensitive`的参数`[Personalizable]`属性为`true`。You can also optionally mark an exportable property as containing sensitive data, by setting the `isSensitive` parameter of the `[Personalizable]` attribute to `true`. 默认情况下`isSensitive`是`false`。By default, `isSensitive` is `false`. 开发人员可以将参数设置为`true`以指示数据为敏感。Developers can set the parameter to `true` to indicate that the data is sensitive. 若要启用`webPart`要导出，开发人员设置其属性值设置为任一（包括所有可个性化和敏感属性） 或，导出除敏感属性.To enable `webPart` to be exported, a developer sets its property value to either (which includes all personalizable and sensitive properties), or to , which exports everything except for sensitive properties. > [!IMPORTANT] > 允许用户从控件，导出数据并将数据导入其他控件，需要某些安全风险。Allowing users to export data from controls, and to import data into other controls, entails some security risks. 开发人员应使用以保护敏感数据，上文所述的方法，如果用户想要避免公开所有数据的风险，不应该在启用导出`webPart`根本。Developers should use the approach discussed above to protect sensitive data, and if they want to avoid the risk of exposing data altogether, they should not enable export on `webPart` at all. 有关 Web 部件的安全问题的详细信息，请参阅[保护的 Web 部件页面](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ada6210-ed00-4157-b3e9-a7e87e77caa2)。For details on Web Parts security issues, see [Securing Web Parts Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ada6210-ed00-4157-b3e9-a7e87e77caa2).

summary.span: 被重写以防止将焦点设置在 控件上，因为该控件没有用户界面 (UI)。

span.span: Overridden to prevent focus from ever being set on the control, because it has no user interface (UI).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法重写基方法，并引发异常，如果调用方调用方法。The method overrides the base method, and throws an exception if a caller calls the method. 因为控件没有用户界面，并且是永远不会对用户可见，但永远不会导致在本身上设置焦点。Because the control has no UI and is never visible to users, it can never allow focus to be set on itself.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ConsumerConnectionPointCollection GetConsumerConnectionPoints(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: 作为连接中的使用者的服务器控件。

span.span: A server control that is acting as a consumer in a connection.

summary.span: 检索 对象的集合，这些对象可以作为来自如下服务器控件的连接点：该服务器控件正在作为 Web 部件连接中的使用者。

span.span: Retrieves the collection of objects that can act as connection points from a server control that is acting as a consumer within a Web Parts connection.

returns.span: 包含使用者中的所有连接点的 。

span.span: A that contains all connection points in the consumer.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件连接中始终涉及两个控件，其中一个作为数据，另一个充当数据的使用者提供者。A Web Parts connection always involves exactly two controls, one acting as the provider of data, the other acting as the consumer of data. 每个控件必须具有一个或多个被定义为连接点的方法。Each control must have one or more methods that are defined as connection points. 对于使用者控件，其连接点为对象。In the case of a consumer control, its connection points are objects. 检索使用者连接点是在建立 Web 部件连接中的必要步骤。Retrieving the consumer connection points is a necessary step in forming a Web Parts connection. 使用者必须始终具有至少一个连接点，以便能够建立的连接。A consumer must always have at least one connection point to be able to establish a connection. 方法检查使用者控件，并检索其所有连接点的集合。The method checks a consumer control and retrieves a collection of all its connection points. 如果控件具有没有连接点，则方法返回一个空集合。If a control has no connection points, the method returns an empty collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 用户控件，可用于更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含两个自定义的网页可以连接的控件和一个``元素。A Web page that contains two custom controls that can be connected, and an `` element. - 源代码文件包含两个自定义控件和自定义的接口。A source code file that contains two custom controls and a custom interface. - 在浏览器中的示例工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 代码示例的第一个部分是用于更改显示模式的用户控件。The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes. 可以从示例部分中获取用户控件的源代码类概述。You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the class overview. 有关显示模式的用户控件的工作原理的详细信息，请参阅主题[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see the topic [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). Web 页的声明性标记包含`Register`为用户控件和自定义控件的指令。The declarative markup for the Web page contains `Register` directives for both the user control and the custom controls. 没有``元素中，``元素以包含自定义控件和一个``元素。There is an `` element, an `` element to contain the custom controls, and an `` element. 请注意，在`Page_Load`方法中，代码会检查以查看是否连接已存在，如果没有，请定义一个提供程序、 使用者和其各自的连接点，然后将新的连接添加到所引用的静态连接集属性。Notice that in the `Page_Load` method, the code checks to see whether a connection already exists and, if not, defines a provider, a consumer, and their respective connection points, and then adds a new connection to the set of static connections referenced by the property. 请注意，通过使用检索的对象方法然后传递给方法，以确定是否可以创建两个控件之间的连接。Note that the object that is retrieved by using the method is then passed to the method to determine whether a connection between the two controls can be created. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections/CS/wpmgrStaticConnectionCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections/VB/wpmgrStaticConnectionVB.aspx#1)] 该示例的第三部分是控件的源代码。The third part of the example is the source code for the controls. 此代码，以及用于编译该示例中所述的说明可以获取类概述。You can obtain this code, and instructions for compiling it, from the Example section of the class overview. 已加载网页的浏览器中后，单击**显示模式**下拉列表控件，然后选择**Connect**切换页可连接模式。After you have loaded the Web page in a browser, click the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Connect** to switch the page to connect mode. 连接模式使用``元素以使您能够创建控件之间的连接。Connect mode uses the `` element to enable you to create connections between controls. 在连接模式中，单击标题栏中的向下箭头**邮政编码**控件来激活其谓词菜单，，然后单击**Connect**。In connect mode, click the downward arrow in the title bar of the **ZIP Code** control to activate its verbs menu, and then click **Connect**. 连接用户界面 (UI) 出现后，请注意是否已创建一个连接中包含的代码通过`Page_Load`方法。After the connection user interface (UI) appears, notice that a connection has already been created by the code contained in the `Page_Load` method. 如果在更高版本浏览器会话中返回到此页，此静态连接已建立，并将不需要重新创建每次加载页面。If you return to this page in a later browser session, this static connection will already be established and will not need to be recreated each time the page loads.

param.span: 包含 的实例的网页。

span.span: The Web page that contains an instance of the .

summary.span: 检索对页上的 控件的当前实例的引用。

span.span: Retrieves a reference to the current instance of the control on a page.

returns.span: 一个 ，引用该控件在页上的当前实例。

span.span: A that references the current instance of the control on a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法可在上下文中你想要检索对当前的引用控件。The method is useful in contexts where you want to retrieve a reference to the current control. 出现这种常见情况是如果您正在编写自定义控件，在开发过程的 ID 不能知道将在其页面上的控件。A common scenario where this would occur is if you are writing a custom control that cannot know during development what the ID of the control on its page will be. > [!NOTE] > 方法是静态的因此不需要的实例而直接调用它控件。The method is static, so you can call it directly without needing an instance of a control. Web 部件中的某些控件的控制设置，如控件，具有属性可检索对当前的引用控件。Some controls in the Web Parts control set, such as controls, have a property that can retrieve a reference to the current control. 因此，当处理此类控件，您应使用此属性来检索的引用。Hence, when working with such controls, you should use this property to retrieve a reference. 如果您知道的 ID 的上下文中编写控件，如编写内联代码在网页中的，它是最简单且最有效的方法来直接引用控件中的使用其 id。If you are coding in a context where you know the ID of the control, such as writing code inline within a Web page, it is simplest and most efficient to refer directly to the control by using its ID. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 该示例由两部分组成： 一个自定义服务器控件和承载控件的网页。The example has two parts: a custom server control, and a Web page that hosts the control. 自定义控件使用方法来检索其中的 ID控件上的当前页上，然后显示该 id。The custom control uses the method to retrieve the ID of the control on the current page, and then displays the ID. [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_GetCurrentWebPartManager#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_GetCurrentWebPartManager/CS/MyManagerIDLabel.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_GetCurrentWebPartManager#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_GetCurrentWebPartManager/VB/MyManagerIDLabel.vb#2)] 下面的代码示例提供程序中承载控件的 Web 页区域。The following code example provides the Web page that hosts the control in a zone. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_GetCurrentWebPartManager#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_GetCurrentWebPartManager/CS/getCurrentWPManagerCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_GetCurrentWebPartManager#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_GetCurrentWebPartManager/VB/getcurrentWPManagervb.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中的页面后，请注意，当前的 ID控件显示在自定义控件。After you load the page in a browser, notice that the ID of the current control is displayed within the custom control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 获取计算的值属性`webPart`。Gets the calculated value of the property for `webPart`. 当开发人员不将值赋给属性的控件，此方法生成要显示为标题的值。When developers do not assign a value to the property of a control, this method produces the value to display as the title. 无标题控件的计算的值包含，该值指示在当前区域内的控件的序列号为一个字符串，追加一个编号。The calculated value for untitled controls consists of a number appended to a string, with the number indicating a control's sequence within the current zone.

span.span: Gets the relative virtual path and the query string that are part of the request when a user attempts to export a control.

span.span: A string that contains the relative virtual path and the query string that together form the request to export a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的值方法是包含该控件的页的服务器位置的相对虚拟路径加上追加的查询字符串值的窗体导出请求提交到服务器。The value returned by the method is a relative virtual path to the server location of the page that contains the control, plus the appended query string value that forms the export request submitted to the server. 方法将字符串编码之前允许该请求提交，以防止恶意脚本攻击。The method encodes the string before allowing the request to be submitted, to protect against malicious script attacks. > [!NOTE] > 有关保护 Web 部件应用程序的详细信息，请参阅[保护的 Web 部件页面](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ada6210-ed00-4157-b3e9-a7e87e77caa2)。For more information about securing Web Parts applications, see [Securing Web Parts Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ada6210-ed00-4157-b3e9-a7e87e77caa2).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.GenericWebPart GetGenericWebPart(class System.Web.UI.Control control) cil managed

param.name: control
param.span: 一个服务器控件，它存在于 中，并在运行时被包装为 的子控件。

span.span: A server control that exists in a and is wrapped as a child control of a at run time.

summary.span: 获取对 控件的实例的引用，该实例包含一个服务器控件。

span.span: Gets a reference to the instance of the control that contains a server control.

returns.span: 一个 ，将 包装为子控件。

span.span: A that wraps as a child control.

returns.span: 如果 未包含在 中，则此方法返回 。

span.span: The method returns if is not contained in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般情况下，有两种类别的控件的开发人员将放入区域中参与 Web 部件应用程序：控件，它们继承自基本类和其他服务器控件，可以是标准ASP.NET 控件、 自定义控件或用户控件。In general, there are two categories of controls that developers place in zones to participate in Web Parts applications: controls, which inherit from the base class, and other server controls, which can be standard ASP.NET controls, custom controls, or user controls. 当其中的任何控件置于区域，所需的功能控件。When any of these controls is placed in a zone, it takes on the functionality of a control. 一个控件本质上是，具有此功能，但其他类型的服务器控件不这样做。A control has this functionality inherently, but the other kinds of server controls do not. 若要启用其他服务器控件，使其作为控制当中放置区域中，ASP.NET 将它们封装与控件。To enable the other server controls to act as controls when they are placed in a zone, ASP.NET wraps them with a control. 因为直接从控件继承类，它提供给它的子控件，则返回 true Web 部件功能。Because the control inherits directly from the class, it provides its child controls with true Web Parts features. 通常在运行时，页面开发人员可能想要获取对引用包含一个区域中的服务器控件的控件。Often at run time, page developers might want to get a reference to the control that contains one of the server controls in a zone. 方法使他们能够检索到的引用控件。The method enables them to retrieve a reference to the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将方法。The following code example demonstrates the use of the method. 代码示例包含控件中声明区域。The code example contains a control declared within a zone. `Button1_Click`方法首先将该 ID 的输出为一个标签，然后使用控件方法来检索到的引用包装日历的控件。The `Button1_Click` method first prints the ID of the control to a label, and then uses the method to retrieve a reference to the control that wraps the calendar. ID控件，且其子控件的 ID (即控件)，将打印到第二个标签。The ID of the control, and the ID of its child control (which is the control), are both printed to a second label. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_GetGenericWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_GetGenericWebPart/CS/getGenericWebPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_GetGenericWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_GetGenericWebPart/VB/getGenericWebPartVB.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件连接中始终涉及两个控件，其中一个作为数据，另一个充当数据的使用者提供者。A Web Parts connection always involves exactly two controls, one acting as the provider of data, the other acting as the consumer of data. 每个控件必须具有一个或多个被定义为连接点的方法。Each control must have one or more methods that are defined as connection points. 对于提供程序控件，其连接点为对象。In the case of a provider control, its connection points are objects. 一个提供程序必须始终具有至少一个连接点，以便能够建立的连接。A provider must always have at least one connection point to be able to establish a connection. 方法检查提供程序控件，并检索其所有连接点的集合。The method checks a provider control and retrieves a collection of all its connection points. 检索提供程序连接点是在建立 Web 部件连接中的必要步骤。Retrieving the provider connection points is a necessary step in forming a Web Parts connection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 该示例包含四个部分：The example has four parts: - 用户控件，可用于更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 包含两个自定义的网页可以连接的控件和一个``元素。A Web page that contains two custom controls that can be connected, and an `` element. - 源代码文件包含两个自定义控件和自定义的接口。A source code file that contains two custom controls and a custom interface. - 在浏览器中的示例工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 代码示例的第一个部分是用于更改显示模式的用户控件。The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes. 可以从示例部分中获取用户控件的源代码类概述。You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the class overview. 有关显示模式的用户控件的工作原理的详细信息，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). Web 页的声明性标记包含`Register`为用户控件和自定义控件的指令。The declarative markup for the Web page contains `Register` directives for both the user control and the custom controls. 没有``元素中，``元素以包含自定义控件和一个``元素。There is an `` element, an `` element to contain the custom controls, and an `` element. 请注意，在`Page_Load`方法中，代码会检查以查看是否连接已存在，如果没有，请定义一个提供程序、 使用者和其各自的连接点，然后将新的连接添加到所引用的静态连接集属性。Notice that in the `Page_Load` method, the code checks to see whether a connection already exists and, if not, defines a provider, a consumer, and their respective connection points, and then adds a new connection to the set of static connections referenced by the property. 请注意，通过使用检索的对象方法然后传递给方法，以确定是否可以创建两个控件之间的连接。Note that the object that is retrieved by using the method is then passed to the method to determine whether a connection between the two controls can be created. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections/CS/wpmgrStaticConnectionCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections/VB/wpmgrStaticConnectionVB.aspx#1)] 该示例的第三部分是控件的源代码。The third part of the example is the source code for the controls. 此代码，以及用于编译该示例中所述的说明可以获取类概述。You can obtain this code, and instructions for compiling it, from the Example section of the class overview. 已加载网页的浏览器中后，单击**显示模式**下拉列表控件，然后选择**Connect**切换页可连接模式。After you have loaded the Web page in a browser, click the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Connect** to switch the page to connect mode. 连接模式使用``元素以使您能够创建控件之间的连接。Connect mode uses the `` element to enable you to create connections between controls. 在连接模式中，单击标题栏中的向下箭头**邮政编码**控件来激活其谓词菜单，，然后单击**Connect**。In connect mode, click the downward arrow in the title bar of the **ZIP Code** control to activate its verbs menu, and then click **Connect**. 连接用户界面 (UI) 出现后，请注意是否已创建一个连接中包含的代码通过`Page_Load`方法。After the connection user interface (UI) appears, notice that a connection has already been created by the code contained in the `Page_Load` method. 如果在更高版本浏览器会话中返回到此页，此静态连接已建立，并将不需要重新创建每次加载页面。If you return to this page in a later browser session, this static connection will already be established and will not need to be recreated each time the page loads.

summary.span: 导入包含 控件的状态和属性数据的 XML 说明文件，并将这些数据应用于控件。

span.span: Imports an XML description file that contains state and property data for a control, and applies the data to the control.

returns.span: 在导入的 XML 说明文件中引用的 （或由 包装并因此被视为 的服务器控件）。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法导入创建的 XML 说明文件服务器控件的方法。The method imports an XML description file that was created by the method for a server control. 它不是导入，则实际的服务器控件，但仅包含有关控件的状态和属性数据的说明文件。It is not the actual server control that is imported, but only the description file containing state and property data about the control. 控件和说明文件中引用的程序集已在用户尝试导入说明文件服务器上可用。The control and assembly referenced in the description file must already be available on the server where a user attempts to import the description file. 若要启用导入一个控件，开发人员需要添加启用导入页上的控件。To enable importing a control, a developer needs to add a control on the page where import will be enabled. 该区域内必须添加控件。Within the zone, an control must be added. 此控件提供了文件对话框中，用户可以浏览并找到要导入的说明文件。This control provides a file dialog box that allows users to browse and locate the description file to import. 用户找到说明文件，并开始导入后，通过阅读说明文件方法。After a user finds a description file and begins the import, the description file is read by the method. 如果没有任何错误，并且如果找到的程序集和控件，将服务器控件添加到目录中控制和说明文件中指定的各种属性和状态数据应用于控件。If there are no errors and if the assembly and control are found, the server control is added to the catalog within the control, and the various property and state data specified in the description file are applied to the control. 然后，用户可以选择的控件，并将其添加到页面。The user can then select the control and add it to the page. > [!IMPORTANT] > 像方法，方法有一些潜在的安全风险。Like the method, the method has some potential for security risks. 因为它涉及到将数据导入网站，恶意用户可能尝试插入描述文件导入错误数据或者甚至脚本代码。Because it involves importing data into a Web site, a malicious user could try to insert bad data or even script code into the description file that is imported. 然后将错误数据可能会显示在页面上，或在数据库中，或插入的脚本无法运行。Then the bad data could appear on a page, or in a database, or the inserted script could run. 与导入说明文件，以及避免这些风险的方法相关的潜在风险的概述，请参阅[保护的 Web 部件页面](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ada6210-ed00-4157-b3e9-a7e87e77caa2)。For an overview of the potential risks associated with importing description files, and ways of avoiding those risks, see [Securing Web Parts Pages](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8ada6210-ed00-4157-b3e9-a7e87e77caa2).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性公开的 Api 调用为一系列主要是在可扩展性的情况下使用的方法。The property exposes the APIs to call into a set of methods that are used mostly in extensibility cases. 若要使用这些内部方法的设计的方法是访问是通过属性。The designed way to use these internal methods is to access them through the property. 由于属性受到保护，仅可以对其进行访问并调用实例中的方法类继承自类。Because the property is protected, you can only access it and call the methods within an instance of the class by inheriting from the class. > [!NOTE] > 此属性隐藏的中的 IntelliSense [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]。This property is hidden from IntelliSense in [!INCLUDE[vsprvsext](~/includes/vsprvsext-md.md)]. 但是，在派生类，你仍可以访问的属性和其各种成员。However, in a derived class, you can still access the property and its various members.

summary.span: 确定能否将 或其他服务器控件添加到页中。

span.span: Determines whether a or other server control can be added to a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件功能的一部分是灵活性的能够在运行时将服务器控件添加到网页。Part of the flexibility of the Web Parts feature is the ability to add server controls to Web pages at run time. 有多种常见方案中的服务器控件 (可以是自定义控件、 自定义服务器控件、 用户控件或 ASP.NET 控件) 可以添加。There are a number of common scenarios in which a server control (which can be a custom control, a custom server control, a user control, or an ASP.NET control) can be added. 在以下常见方案中，Web 部件控件集尝试将服务器控件添加到页上，和调用方法对它们进行授权：In the following common scenarios, the Web Parts control set attempts to add server controls to a page, and the method is called to authorize them: - 通过声明的标记中的 Web 页面中添加的服务器控件时区域。When a server control is added by declaring it in the markup of a Web page within a zone. - 当服务器控件是以编程方式添加到区域。When a server control is added programmatically to a zone. - 当用户导入到 Web 部件控件目录中的服务器控件。When a user imports a server control into a Web Parts catalog of controls. - 如果现有服务器控件从个性化设置数据存储区中加载。When an existing server control is loaded from the personalization data store. - 当服务器控件添加到控件以使其在服务器控件的目录中可用。When a server control is added to a control to make it available in a catalog of server controls. 在其中添加控件，每个方案调用方法以确保具有已满足所有授权条件以允许要添加的控件。In each scenario where controls are added, the method is called to ensure that all authorization criteria have been met to allow a control to be added. 当控件已经过授权时，将其添加通常因为它将是否存在任何筛选方案。When a control is authorized, it is added normally as it would be if there was no filtering scenario. 当控件未获得授权时，可以在几个方面，具体取决于上下文响应 Web 部件控件集。When a control is not authorized, the Web Parts control set can respond in several ways, depending on the context. 可以以无提示方式失败控件集 （如果不需要通知用户） 添加一个未经授权的部分，它可以显示错误消息，或者它可以添加的实例类作为一个占位符。The control set can silently fail to add an unauthorized part (if there is no need to inform the user), it can display an error message, or it can add an instance of the class as a placeholder. 此占位符对象是不可见的页上，但会显示在页的源代码以指示未经授权的控件已被排除。This placeholder object is not visible on the page, but is visible in the page source code to indicate that an unauthorized control was excluded. 是否获得授权控件的决定因素是授权筛选器。The determinant of whether a control is authorized is the authorization filter. 授权筛选器是 Web 部件控件集，开发人员可从一个页面中排除任何不符合指定的条件的控件中的功能。An authorization filter is a feature in the Web Parts control set that enables developers to exclude from a page any controls that do not meet the specified criteria. 若要创建筛选方案，开发人员必须做两件事。To create a filtering scenario, developers must do two things. 首先，他们必须将分配到一个字符串值 （值可以是任意）每个属性他们计划在此方案中使用的控件。First, they must assign a string value (the value can be arbitrary) to the property of each control they plan to use in the scenario. 它们还可以将值分配给此属性对于其他类型的服务器控件不控件，因为如果将它们放在区域，此类控件使用包装控件在运行时，而该控件继承属性。They can also assign a value to this property for other types of server controls that are not controls, because if they are placed in zones, such controls are wrapped with a control at run time, and this control inherits the property. 创建筛选方案的第二个必要步骤是重写方法，或创建的事件处理程序事件。The second necessary step for creating a filtering scenario is to either override the method, or to create an event handler for the event. 在这些方法，开发人员可以检查属性，并且如果该值指示不应授权控件，开发人员需确保方法返回的值`false`。In these methods, a developer can check the property, and if the value indicates that the control should not be authorized, the developer ensures that the method returns a value of `false`. > [!NOTE] > 有关代码示例和说明如何设置自定义的筛选方案中使用方法，请参阅该方法的重载的主题。For code examples and a description of how to set up a customized filtering scenario using the method, see the topics for the overloads of the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool IsAuthorized(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: 正在接受授权检查的 或其他服务器控件。

span.span: A or other server control being checked for authorization.

summary.span: 执行确定控件是否被授权添加到页中的初始步骤。

span.span: Carries out the initial steps in determining whether a control is authorized to be added to a page.

returns.span: 一个布尔值，指示能否将 添加到页中。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether can be added to a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是调用的 Web 部件控件集用来检查授权的初始方法控件。The method is the initial method called by the Web Parts control set to check authorization for a control. 它接受`webPart`作为参数，并开始最终确定控件是否将添加到页面的过程。It accepts `webPart` as a parameter, and begins a process that ultimately determines whether the control will be added to a page. 直接调用此方法从您的代码时需要确定是否授权给定的控件。Call this method from your code directly when you need to determine whether a given control is authorized. 此方法将执行确定控件是否继承自的初始任务类或者是否控制，并包含如果是这样，哪种类型的子对其进行控制。This method carries out the initial tasks of determining whether the control inherits from the class or is a control and, if so, what type of child control it contains. 若要完成该任务的授权，它将调用重载方法。To finish the task of authorization, it calls the overload method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用从您的代码以确定控件是否有权添加到页的方法。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method from your code to determine whether a control is authorized to be added to a page. 代码示例包含三个部分：The code example has three parts: - 自定义重写控件方法。A custom control that overrides the method. - 创建的筛选器的网页控件。A Web page that creates a filter for a control. - 如何运行该代码示例的说明。An explanation of how to run the code example. 此代码示例使用自定义控件重写重载方法，以提供自定义处理属性。This code example uses a custom control that overrides the overload method to provide custom handling of the property. 此控件的属性值的检查`admin`和的值存在时，如果对该控件的授权。This control checks for a property value of `admin` and, if the value is present, authorizes the control. 如果控件具有不同的值，未授权;控件的属性值不授予的权限，因为它们可能不为筛选方案的一部分。If a control has a different value, it is not authorized; controls without the property value are authorized as well, as they are presumed not to be part of the filtering scenario. 若要运行此代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For this code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译方法。This code example uses the dynamic compile method. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized/CS/MyManagerAuthorize.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized/VB/MyManagerAuthorize.vb#2)] 代码示例的第二部分创建筛选器可能排除控件。The second part of the code example creates a filter that can potentially exclude a control. 以下网页包含三个 ASP.NET 服务器控件中的``元素。The following Web page contains three ASP.NET server controls in an `` element. 请注意，第一个和第二个控件都具有其属性设置为不同的值和第三个未分配给属性。Notice that the first and second controls have their properties set to different values, and the third does not assign the property. 可以在运行时，检查此授权值和该控件可以添加到页上，如果在筛选器匹配由开发人员设置的条件。This authorization value can be checked at run time, and the control can be added to the page if the filter matches criteria set by the developer. 此外请注意，在`Page_Load`方法，该代码调用方法以确定是否每个控件已获得授权，以及如果是，则设置每个控件的属性。Notice also that in the `Page_Load` method, the code calls the method to determine whether each of the controls is authorized, and if so, it sets each control's property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized/CS/IsAuthorizedCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized/VB/IsAuthorizedVB.aspx#1)] 请注意，若要运行代码示例，必须添加的设置在 Web.config 文件，以使导出 Web 部件说明文件中。Note that for the code example to work, you must add a setting in the Web.config file to enable exporting Web Parts description files. 确保您有 Web 页所在的目录中为此代码示例的 Web.config 文件。Ensure that you have a Web.config file in the same directory as the Web page for this code example. 内``部分中，请确保有``具有元素`enableExport`属性设置为`true`，如以下标记。Within the `` section, make sure there is a `` element with an `enableExport` attribute set to `true`, as in the following markup. `` `...` `` 加载浏览器中的页面后，请注意，显示的第一个控件，因为它与重写方法中的条件相匹配。After you load the page in a browser, note that the first control is displayed, because it matches the criteria in the overridden method. 第二个控件不添加到页上，因为筛选器排除。The second control is not added to the page, because it is excluded by the filter. 此外添加了第三个控件，因为它不具有其属性集。The third control is also added, because it does not have its property set. 请注意，如果单击任一控件的标题栏中的谓词菜单图标，它们均可导出，因为它们各自都分配了属性值。Notice that if you click the verbs menu icon in the title bar of either control, they can both be exported because their respective property values were assigned.

This method is called directly from your code. If you want to gain greater programmatic control over the authorization process, you can override the overload method.
