summary.span: 执行确定控件是否已经过授权可添加至页的最后步骤。

span.span: Carries out the final steps in determining whether a control is authorized to be added to a page.

returns.span: 一个布尔值，指示控件是否已经过授权可添加至页中。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether a control is authorized to be added to a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重载方法执行确定控件是否有权添加到页的最后一个步骤。The overload method carries out the final steps in determining whether a control is authorized to be added to a page. 该方法可确保`type`是有效的类型，而`path`被检查的控件是用户控制时，才会包含一个值。The method ensures that `type` is a valid type, and that `path` has a value only if the control being checked is a user control. 然后，它调用的关键方法，将引发事件。Then it calls the critical method, which raises the event. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法，以确定控件是否有权添加到页。The following code example demonstrates how to override the method to determine whether a control is authorized to be added to a page. 第一步是创建筛选器可能排除控件。The first step is to create a filter that can potentially exclude a control. 以下网页包含三个 ASP.NET 服务器控件中的``元素。The following Web page contains three ASP.NET server controls in an `` element. 请注意，第一个和第二个控件都具有其属性设置为不同的值和第三个未分配给属性。Notice that the first and second controls have their properties set to different values, and the third does not assign the property. 可以在运行时，检查此授权值和该控件可以添加到页上，如果在筛选器匹配由开发人员设置的条件。This authorization value can be checked at run time, and the control can be added to the page if the filter matches criteria set by the developer. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized/CS/IsAuthorizedCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized/VB/IsAuthorizedVB.aspx#1)] 第二步是重写方法，并创建自定义授权筛选器处理。The second step is to override the method, and create custom handling for authorization filters. 请注意，代码首先检查属性是否具有一个值，以便任何控制，不会分配属性将自动添加。Note that the code first checks whether the property has a value, so that any control that does not assign the property will be added automatically. 如果控件具有筛选器，代码将返回`true`仅当筛选器值等于`admin`。If a control has a filter, the code returns `true` only if the filter value is equal to `admin`. 此示例演示一个简单的机制可用于向某些用户，具体取决于其角色显示某些控件。This demonstrates a simple mechanism you can use for displaying certain controls to certain users, depending on their role. 尽管本主题的范围超出了使用角色的完整示例，您可以使用相同的逻辑作为在此代码示例中，重写的方法，只不过无法检查当前用户是否属于与授权筛选器值匹配的角色然后添加仅针对该用户控件。While a full example using roles is beyond the scope of this topic, you could use the same logic as the overridden method in this code example, except that you could check whether the current user is in a role that matches the authorization filter value, and then add the control only for that user. 这样便可以创建其中某些用户将看到所有控件和其他用户将只能都看到所选的控件的页面。This would enable you to create pages where some users would see all the controls, and other users would see only selected controls. 这是如果你已用角色检查筛选器的逻辑可能显示方式：This is how the logic that checks the filter might look if you used roles: ```vb If Roles.IsUserInRole(Page.User.Identity.Name, authorizationFilter) Then return True Else return False End If ``` ```csharp if(Roles.IsUserInRole(Page.User.Identity.Name, authorizationFilter)) return true; else return false; ``` 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译方法。This code example uses the dynamic compile method. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized/CS/MyManagerAuthorize.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsAuthorized/VB/MyManagerAuthorize.vb#2)] 加载浏览器中的页面后，请注意，显示的第一个控件，因为它与重写方法中的条件相匹配。After you load the page in a browser, note that the first control is displayed, because it matches the criteria in the overridden method. 第二个控件不添加到页上，因为排除其筛选器值。The second control is not added to the page, because its filter value is excluded. 添加第三个控件，因为它不具有其属性集。The third control is added, because it does not have its property set. 如果更改上要匹配的第一个控件，然后重新运行页面的第二个控件的属性值，以及添加第二个控件。If you change the property value on the second control to match that of the first control, and then run the page again, the second control is added as well.

span.para: 可以重写此方法通过继承类，如果你想要签入授权时提供附加的处理。你可能想要重写方法，以检查的某些值参数，并基于值，返回一个布尔值，确定是否会将控件添加到页面。页面开发人员还想要检查的授权筛选器，并提供自定义处理，对于没有执行此内联在.aspx 页中，或在代码隐藏文件中，而无需从任何类继承的选项。您可以声明中的页的备用事件处理程序方法的控件。有关更多详细信息和示例，请参阅方法。

This method can be overridden by inheriting from the class, if you want to provide additional handling when checking authorization. You might want to override the method to check for certain values in the parameter, and based on the value, return a Boolean value that determines whether the control will be added to a page. For page developers who also want to check for authorization filters and provide custom handling, there is an option for doing this inline in an .aspx page, or in a code-behind file, without having to inherit from any classes. You can declare an alternate event handler in the page for the method of the control. For more details and an example, see the method.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否已进行了个性化设置更改，这些更改影响 控件所控制的页级别个性化设置详细信息。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether personalization changes have been made that affect page-level personalization details controlled by the control.

value.span: 一个布尔值，指示是否已进行了个性化设置更改。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether personalization changes have been made.

value.span: 默认值为 。

span.span: The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用属性在内部以跟踪是否有任何它所管理的页级别个性化设置数据已更改。The control uses the property internally to track whether any of the page-level personalization data that it manages has changed. 当用户执行各种个性化设置操作，在页面级别，如添加或删除时将个性化设置数据更改控件、 连接或断开连接控件，通过移动控件和其他操作更改页面的布局。The personalization data changes when users carry out various personalization actions at the page level, such as adding or removing controls, connecting or disconnecting controls, changing the page's layout by moving controls, and other actions. > [!NOTE] > 用户还可以执行在控制级别，这意味着它们到特定的控件进行个性化修改，个性化设置和所做的更改仅影响该控件。Users can also perform personalization at the control level, which means that they make personalization changes to a specific control, and the changes affect only that control. 示例将编辑控件，并更改其标题文本或它的背景色。An example would be editing the control and changing its title text, or its background color. 控制级别个性化设置不会影响所跟踪的页级别个性化设置数据控件，因此属性值不会更改为`true`控件级别个性化设置发生时。Control-level personalization does not affect the page-level personalization data tracked by the control, and so the property value is not changed to `true` when control-level personalization occurs. 虽然该方法受保护，并且不能由调用方，直接访问直接由调用方，可以访问属性，则返回此属性的值。Although the method is protected and cannot be accessed directly by a caller, the property can be accessed directly by callers, and it returns the value of this property.

summary.span: 将 或服务器控件从一个 区域移动到另一个区域，或移动到相同区域中的新位置。

span.span: Moves a or server control from one zone to another, or to a new position within the same zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件使用方法来移动`webPart`到在同一区域中，或在不同区域中的新位置。The control uses the method to move `webPart` to a new location in the same zone, or in a different zone. 您可以直接从代码中，调用此方法，也会调用时用户将一个控件移动到 Web 部件用户界面 (UI) 中使用不同选项的新位置。You can call this method directly from code, and it is also invoked when a user moves a control to a new position using various options in the Web Parts user interface (UI). 多个条件必须满足`webPart`可以移动，以及其中的大多数指示由本主题的异常部分中列出的项。A number of conditions must be met before `webPart` can be moved, and most of these are indicated by items listed in the Exceptions section of this topic. 如果`webPart`未包含在区域开始时，不能移动的区域中。If `webPart` was not contained in a zone to begin with, it cannot be moved into a zone. 在满足的条件后，以下操作序列发生移动`webPart`:After the conditions have been met, the following sequence of actions occurs to move `webPart`: 1. 方法引发 事件。The method raises the event. 2. `webPart` 已从其当前区域 （如有必要），并添加到其新的区域或其当前的区域中的新位置。`webPart` is removed from its current zone (if necessary), and added to its new zone or new position within its current zone. 3. 方法引发 事件。The method raises the event. 4. `zoneIndex`的每个源和目标区域中的控件重置以反映移动的控件。The `zoneIndex` of every control in both the origin and destination zones is reset to reflect the moved control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用直接从代码移动方法到另一个控件从一个区域。The following code example demonstrates how to call the method directly from code to move a control from one zone to another. 代码示例包含三个部分：The code example has three parts: - 一个用于更改显示模式的用户控件。A user control for changing display modes. - 若要承载控件网页。A Web page to host the controls. - 如何运行该代码示例的说明。An explanation of how to run the code example. 代码示例的第一个部分是用于更改显示模式的用户控件。The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes. 可以从示例部分中获取用户控件的源代码类概述。You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the class overview. 有关显示模式的用户控件的工作原理的详细信息，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For more information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 该示例的第二部分是包含两个区域，其中每个包含两个服务器控件的 Web 页面。The second part of the example is a Web page that contains two zones, each of which contains two server controls. 当用户单击**移动 web 部件**页中的代码上按钮`Button1_Click`方法将第一个区域中一个控件移动到第二个区域中的新位置。When a user clicks the **Move WebPart** button on the page, the code in the `Button1_Click` method moves a control from the first zone to a new position in the second zone. 请注意，代码必须先调用方法来检索包装的对象`list1`控件。Notice that the code first must call the method to retrieve the object that wraps the `list1` control. 这是必需的因为的第一个参数方法要求控件，而`list1`是 ASP.NET 服务器控件。This is required because the first parameter of the method requires a control, whereas `list1` is an ASP.NET server control. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_MoveWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_MoveWebPart/CS/MoveWebPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_MoveWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_MoveWebPart/VB/MoveWebPartVB.aspx#1)] 在页面加载后，单击**移动 web 部件**按钮，并请注意，包含链接的控件将移到第二个区域中的中间位置。After the page loads, click the **Move WebPart** button, and note that the control that contains the links moves into the middle position in the second zone. 通过调用以编程方式完成此移动控件方法。This movement of the control is accomplished programmatically by calling the method. 此外可以使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件以将页切换到设计模式，并在设计模式下，可以将控件拖到不同区域或其区域内的不同位置。You can also use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page to design mode, and in design mode, you can drag the controls to different zones or different positions within their zones. 还会调用方法控件来处理此类用户启动移动。The method is also called by the control to handle such user-initiated moves.

summary.span: 引发 事件并调用该事件的处理程序（如果存在）。

span.span: Raises the event and invokes a handler for the event, if one exists.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用方法方法，当控件被检查授权添加到页。The method is called by the method, when a control is being checked for authorization to be added to a page. 当方法调用时，它会发出事件，并且如果没有为事件处理程序方法，它将调用处理程序。When the method is called, it raises the event, and if there is a handler method for the event, it invokes the handler. 授权的过程控件是一项重要的 Web 部件功能。The process of authorizing controls is an important Web Parts feature. 每个或服务器控件添加到由区域控件就可以执行授权过程以确定是否可以添加控件。Every or server control that is added to a zone by the control goes through an authorization process to determine whether the control can be added. 默认情况下，Web 部件控件集不提供任何筛选条件，以防止控件添加到区域。By default, the Web Parts control set does not provide any filtering criteria to prevent controls from being added to a zone. 但控件集提供了开发人员能够创建他们自己的筛选条件所需的机制。But the control set does provide the mechanisms necessary for developers to create their own filtering criteria. 通过使用这些机制，可以创建自定义筛选方案。By using these mechanisms, you can create custom filtering scenarios. 例如，可以创建筛选器，以便如果用户是管理员角色中，将添加到区域的某些控件时呈现页面时，如果用户是在用户角色中，将不会添加这些控件。For example, you could create a filter so that, if a user is in an administrator role, certain controls would be added to a zone when the page is rendered, and if the user is in a user role, those controls would not be added. 这种机制用于在授权过程中筛选控件上的属性控件，和方法，并上的事件控件。The mechanisms for filtering controls during the authorization process are the property on controls, the and methods, and the event on the control. 若要创建筛选方案，有实质上是两个任务。To create a filtering scenario, there are essentially two tasks. 首先，将字符串转换为的分配每个属性你想要筛选的控件。First, you assign strings to the property of each control you want to filter. 这些字符串值可以是任意的但它们应包含你想要筛选的条件。These string values can be arbitrary, but they should contain the criteria you want to filter on. 例如，如果您希望某一给定的控件以管理员身份添加到区域仅当用户正在查看页上，则可以分配的字符串值`admin`到的属性。For example, if you wanted a given control to be added to a zone only if an administrator user is viewing the page, then you might assign a string value of `admin` to the property. 然后可以使用 ASP.NET 角色功能，并将你的站点的所有用户都添加到如管理员、 管理员和用户的各种角色。Then you could use the ASP.NET roles feature, and add all users of your site to various roles such as administrator, manager, and user. 筛选代码时加载页面时，将检查用户的何种角色为，其与要检查的控件上的授权筛选器值进行比较，如果用户的管理员角色的是 （例如） 和你设置控件的的值`admin`，无法添加控件。When a page is loading, your filtering code would check what role a user is in, compare it to the authorization filter value on a control being checked, and if (for example) the user is in an administrator role and you had set the control's value to `admin`, the control could be added. 创建筛选方案的第二步是编写代码以检查属性值上控件，并确定每个控件是否被授权添加到其区域之前。The second step in creating a filtering scenario is to write code to check the property values on controls, and determine whether each control is authorized before it is added to its zone. 有两个用于此筛选代码的放置位置选项。There are two options for where to place this filtering code. 第一个选项是页面开发人员的首的选项。The first option is the preferred option for page developers. 可以创建一个方法来处理直接在网页上的服务器脚本代码，或在代码分离文件中的事件。You can create a method to handle the event directly in the Web page server script code, or in a code separation file. 将你的方法与事件相关联通过添加`OnAuthorizeWebPart`属性的标记为控制在页中，如下面的示例标记代码中所示。Associate your method with the event by adding the `OnAuthorizeWebPart` attribute to the tag for the control in the page, as shown in the following sample markup code. ``` ``` 自定义方法只需为每个复选控制是否满足筛选条件并根据结果，然后，将布尔值赋给的属性对象，以指示是否控件可以是添加。All your custom method has to do is check each control for the filtering criteria and then, based on the results, assign a Boolean value to the property of the object to indicate whether the control can be added. 示例部分中的代码演示如何执行此操作。The code in the Example section demonstrates how to do this. 有关在何处放置筛选代码的第二个选项是继承自类，并重写一个方法以检查筛选器条件。The second option for where to place your filtering code is to inherit from the class, and override a method to check the filter criteria. 可以重写以执行此操作的两种方法方法或方法。The two methods you can override to do this are the method or the method. 尽管这两种方法会起作用，但在大多数情况下最好是重写方法，因为它提供了更好地以编程方式控制整个授权过程中，而方法执行只有一项特定任务这是引发的事件和检查处理程序。Although either method would work, in most cases it is preferable to override the method, because it provides you with greater programmatic control over the whole authorization process, whereas the method does only one specific task, which is to raise the event and check for a handler. 有关自定义的代码示例类，并重写方法，请参阅方法的重载。For a code example of a custom class that overrides the method, see the overload of the method. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何设置的自定义事件处理程序事件，以便该处理程序可以提供用于自定义筛选代码方法。The following code example demonstrates how to set a custom event handler for the event, so that the handler can provide custom filtering code for the method. 此示例是页面开发人员提供筛选方案和授权的典型方式控件添加到页。This example would be a typical way for a page developer to provide a filtering scenario and authorization of controls to be added to a page. 在网页上，注意``元素具有`OnAuthorizeWebPart`具有分配给它的事件处理程序名称属性。In the Web page, notice that the `` element has the `OnAuthorizeWebPart` attribute with the name of the event handler assigned to it. 该方法检查页上的控件是否具有其各自属性的值设置为`admin`，如果是，则返回`true`，这意味着它们将被授权并添加到页面。The method checks whether the controls on the page have their respective property values set to `admin` and, if so, returns `true`, which means that they will be authorized and added to the page. > [!NOTE] > 请注意，控件不具有分配给任何值属性还将添加，因为它们被假定不是筛选方案的一部分。Note that controls that do not have any value assigned to the property are added as well, because they are assumed not to be part of a filtering scenario. 这将是筛选方案中的常见方法： 将筛选一些控件，并且其他人不会因为它们都假定为可供所有用户。This would be a common approach in a filtering scenario: some controls would be filtered, and others would not be, because they are presumed to be available for all users. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_AuthorizeWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_AuthorizeWebPart/CS/AuthorizeWebPartCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_AuthorizeWebPart#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_AuthorizeWebPart/VB/AuthorizeWebPartVB.aspx#1)] 设置角色的用户不在本主题的范围内，因为此代码示例不会检查用户角色中的筛选操作。Because setting up users in roles is beyond the scope of this topic, this code example does not check user roles in the filtering. 但是，筛选控件根据用户角色的方案是，可能需要此筛选功能的最常见用途之一。However, the scenario of filtering controls according to user roles is likely to be one of the most common uses of this filtering feature. 如果角色对你的站点，并且你想要检查此方法筛选器控件中的用户角色，该方法将类似于下面的代码块 （而不是更简单的方法，在前面的代码示例不使用角色）。If you have roles on your site, and you want to check user roles in this method to filter controls, the method would resemble the following code block (versus the simpler approach in the preceding code example, which does not use roles). ```vb Protected Sub WebPartManager1_AuthorizeWebPart(ByVal sender _ As Object, ByVal e As WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs) If String.IsNullOrEmpty(e.AuthorizationFilter) Then If Roles.IsUserInRole(Page.User.Identity.Name, _ e.AuthorizationFilter) Then e.IsAuthorized = True Else e.IsAuthorized = False End If End If End Sub ``` ```csharp protected void mgr1_AuthorizeWebPart(object sender, WebPartAuthorizationEventArgs e) { if (!String.IsNullOrEmpty(e.AuthorizationFilter)) { if(Roles.IsUserInRole(Page.User.Identity.Name, e.authorizationFilter)) e.IsAuthorized = true; else e.IsAuthorized = false; } } ```

param.name: e
param.span: 一个 ，包含与更改后的显示模式相关联的事件数据。

span.span: A that contains event data associated with a changed display mode.

summary.span: 引发 事件，以指示 控件在网页上已完成从一种显示模式切换到另一种显示模式的过程。

span.span: Raises the event to indicate that the control has completed the process of switching from one display mode to another on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的基窗体只是引发事件。The method in its base form simply raises the event.

span.para: 您可以重写方法。例如，显示模式的更改后您可能想要更改某些内容中的用户界面 (UI)，具体取决于哪些显示模式包含在外观属性。或者，可能想要隐藏某些内容，或显示某个控件。时重写该方法，您应通常调用基方法重写方法的最后一个步骤，以便自定义代码在运行第一个，并最后，引发该事件指示模式更改已完成。

You can override the method. For example, after a change of display mode, you might want to change something in the appearance of the user interface (UI), depending on which display mode is contained in the property. Or you might want to hide certain content, or display a certain control. When you override the method, you should normally call the base method as the last step of the overridden method, so that your custom code runs first, and the event is raised last, indicating that the mode change is complete.

param.name: e
param.span: 一个 ，包含与正在更改的显示模式相关联的事件数据。

span.span: An that contains event data associated with a changing display mode.

summary.span: 引发 事件，以指示 控件在网页上正处于从一种显示模式切换到另一种显示模式的过程中。

span.span: Raises the event to indicate that the control is in the process of switching from one display mode to another on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法的基窗体只是引发事件。The method in its base form simply raises the event.

span.para: 您可以重写方法。例如，当更改显示模式，您可能想要检查新的显示模式将是 (通过使用属性) 和更改基于新的显示模式将是用户界面 (UI) 中的某些内容。如果您有自定义显示模式下，可能想要使某些控件在自定义模式将新的显示模式的情况下可见。当重写此方法时，您应通常调用基方法重写方法的第一步，以便在引发事件以指示正在启动显示模式更改。然后，自定义代码可以进行更改用户界面 (UI) 中实际显示新的显示模式之前。

You can override the method. For example, as a display mode is changing, you might want to check what the new display mode will be (by using the property) and change something in the user interface (UI) based on what the new display mode will be. If you had a custom display mode, you might want to make certain controls visible if the custom mode is going to be the new display mode. When you override this method, you should normally call the base method as the first step of the overridden method, so that the event is raised to indicate a display mode is starting to change. Then, your custom code can make changes in the user interface (UI) before the new display mode is actually displayed.

summary.span: 引发 事件，该事件在新选择了某个 控件或清除对它的选择之后发生。

span.span: Raises the event, which occurs after a control has either been newly selected or had its selection cleared.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将引发事件，这通常是一名开发人员可能想要更改的用户界面 (UI) 的外观的时间点。The method raises the event, which is typically a point in time where a developer might want to change the appearance of the user interface (UI). 例如，当新控件处于选中状态，Web 部件控件集更改新选择的控件的呈现。For example, when a new control is selected, the Web Parts control set changes the rendering of the newly selected control. 清除控件的选择后，呈现正常返回。After a control's selection is cleared, the rendering is returned to normal. 在用户选择特定控件进行编辑，调用方法。After a user selects a particular control for editing, the method is called. 当用户完成编辑控件，并关闭它，从而导致清除控件的选择，再次调用方法。When the user finishes editing the control and closes it, with the result that the control's selection is cleared, the method is called again.

span.para: 有几个选项与相关事件，以允许开发人员自定义更改所选的控件之后发生的呈现。在声明性代码中，在元素，无法设置属性，并为其分配自定义方法的名称。在自定义的方法中，您可以在事件发生时修改所选控件的呈现。另一个选项是继承自类并重写此方法。第三个选项是自定义呈现在区域级别;例如，可以继承自类，并重写其方法，以自定义控件在选中和清除在编辑过程中的呈现。

There are several options related to the event, to allow developers to customize the rendering that occurs after the selected control has changed. In declarative code, within the element you could set the attribute, and assign to it the name of a custom method. In the custom method, you could modify the rendering of the selected controls when the event occurs. Another option is to inherit from the class and override the method. A third option is to customize the rendering at the zone level; for example, you can inherit from the class, and override its method, to customize the rendering of controls selected and cleared during the editing process.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将引发事件，更改其中的过程中发生当前选定控件。The method raises the event, which occurs during the process of changing which control is currently selected. 控件使用此方法，而且关联的事件，以提供取消进程在其中更改所选的控件的机会。The control uses this method, and the associated event, to provide an opportunity to cancel a process in which the selected control is changing. 例如，在调用方法方法，并且也在方法，以提供一种方法，将取消该过程。For example, the method is called within the method, and also within the method, to provide a way to cancel the process. 如果用户单击要编辑的控件上的取消谓词，该控件不再处于选中状态和未保存编辑的任何更改，因为方法，可以取消的编辑更改。If a user clicks the cancel verb on a control that is being edited, the control is no longer selected and any editing changes are not saved, because the method makes it possible to cancel the editing changes. > [!NOTE] > 同样的方法的开始和结束连接的过程期间调用该方法控件到另一个控件，以便取消该过程。The method is similarly called during the methods that begin and end the process of connecting a control to another control, to enable canceling that process. 页面开发人员可以创建自定义处理程序通过添加事件`OnSelectedWebPartChanging`属性为``元素中声明性页标记中，并为属性指定自定义方法的名称。Page developers can create a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnSelectedWebPartChanging` attribute to the `` element in declarative page markup, and assigning to the attribute the name of a custom method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法将引发事件以指示控件 （或其他服务器或用户控件） 已成功关闭上一个页面。The method raises the event to indicate that a control (or other server or user control) has been successfully closed on a page. 若要关闭控件意味着若要删除从页面以便不呈现，并且还将其放在一个特殊持有对象调用页目录。To close a control means to remove it from a page so that it is not rendered, and also to place it in a special holding object called a page catalog. 对应于一个页目录控件中，会保留对已关闭的引用为每个页面的控件。A page catalog, which corresponds to the control, maintains references to closed controls for each page. 如果控件中的页面上声明区域，用户可以将页切换到目录显示模式，并添加回页面之前关闭任何控件。If a control is declared on a page within a zone, users can switch the page into catalog display mode, and add back to the page any controls that were previously closed. 方法使开发人员能够创建自定义处理程序有机会事件。The method provides an opportunity for developers to create a custom handler for the event. 页面开发人员可以通过添加添加事件的自定义处理程序`OnWebPartClosed`属性为``页上，然后将自定义方法名称分配给该属性中的元素。Page developers can add a custom handler for the event by adding an `OnWebPartClosed` attribute to the `` element in a page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute. 一个有用的任务可能会执行开发人员，在这种方法是显示在已关闭的控件的位置的占位符，请使用工具提示会告知用户完成如何将控件添加到页面。One useful task a developer might carry out in this method is to display a placeholder in place of the closed control, complete with a ToolTip that would inform users how to add the control back to the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅动态可以删除控件，并删除一个控件时，控件实例从页中永久删除，无法还原。Only dynamic controls can be deleted, and when a control is deleted, the control instance is permanently removed from a page and cannot be restored. 动态控件是那些以编程方式添加或从 Web 部件目录，而不是静态控件中声明的 Web 页的标记。Dynamic controls are those that are added programmatically, or from a Web Parts catalog, as opposed to static controls that are declared in the markup of a Web page. 方法将引发事件以指示控件已被永久删除从其区域。The method raises the event to indicate that a control is being permanently deleted from its zone. 该方法还提供了取消删除进程的机会。The method also provides the opportunity to cancel the deleting process. 如果控件已成功从页中，删除事件遵循。If the control is successfully deleted from the page, the event follows. 页面开发人员可以通过添加为关联的事件提供自定义处理程序`OnWebPartDeleting`属性为``上一个网页，以及然后向该属性分配自定义方法名称的元素。Page developers can provide a custom handler for the associated event by adding the `OnWebPartDeleting` attribute to the `` element on a Web page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Personalization As WebPartPersonalization

summary.span: 获取对包含网页个性化设置数据的对象的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to an object that contains personalization data for a Web page.

value.span: 包含个性化设置数据的 。

span.span: A that contains personalization data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供了一种访问方法与通过页相关联的对象控件。The property provides a way to access the object that is associated with a page through the control. 使用此属性，可以访问的个性化设置对象的各种成员。Using this property, you can access the various members of the personalization object. 例如，可以使用方法才能切换页面的个性化设置范围从共享到用户作用域，反之亦然。For example, you can use the method to switch the page's personalization scope from shared to user scope, or vice versa. 您还可以查找出当前个性化设置范围的页上，是否启用了个性化设置甚至在页上，哪个提供程序用于个性化设置数据等。You can also find out the current personalization scope of the page, whether personalization is even enabled on the page, which provider is being used for the personalization data, and more. 请注意，通过引用数据属性是仅由跟踪的页级别个性化设置数据控件。Note that the data referenced by the property is only the page-level personalization data that is tracked by the control. 特定于控件的个性化设置数据，如可个性化设置的属性的值控制，不是属于属性。Control-specific personalization data, such as the values of personalizable properties on controls, is not part of the property. > [!NOTE] > Web 部件个性化设置的详细信息，请参阅[Web 部件个性化设置概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320)。For more information on Web Parts personalization, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/7dc34f74-52aa-4082-b98d-2bcf9e07e320). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property programmatically. 以下 Web 页面，用户可以进入编辑模式，若要编辑的某些方面控件。The following Web page allows a user to enter edit mode to edit certain aspects of the control. **切换范围**按钮切换到用户或共享个性化设置范围的页面。The **Toggle Scope** button switches the page to user or shared personalization scope. **编辑模式**并**浏览模式**按钮每个页切换到适当的显示模式。The **Edit Mode** and **Browse Mode** buttons each switch the page into the appropriate display mode. 请注意，在`

span.span: Saves custom personalization state data maintained by the control, so that this data can be reloaded whenever the page is reloaded.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法非常重要个性化设置的过程中，因为它使存储为将来的浏览器会话的个性化的用户设置和页访问。The method is critical in the process of personalization, because it enables personalized user settings to be stored for future browser sessions and visits to a page. 该方法保存自定义个性化设置状态数据，其中包括以下各项： 动态或已添加到页或从一个页面; 被移动页面; 的控件和动态连接的已删除的服务器控件已创建或删除。The method saves custom personalization state data, which includes items such as the following: dynamic or server controls that have been added to a page or deleted from a page; controls that have been moved on a page; and dynamic connections that have been created or deleted. 您不能在代码中直接调用此方法。You cannot call this method directly from your code. 但是，可以调用方法，后者自身调用此方法以保存个性化设置数据。You can, however, call the method, which itself calls this method to save personalization data.

span.para: 开发人员可以重写此方法在派生类自定义保存个性化设置数据的过程。
Developers can override this method in a derived class to customize the process of saving personalization data.

value.span: 当前选择的用于编辑或建立连接的 控件。

span.span: A control that is currently selected for editing or forming a connection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回的引用或其他服务器控件的当前选定进行编辑或创建与另一个控件的连接。The property returns a reference to a or other server control that is currently selected for editing or for creating a connection with another control. 控件提供了几个有用的方法和事件用于处理选择一个控件的过程。The control provides several useful methods and events for handling the process of selecting a control. 但只需选择控件后，进行任何更改之前发生的事件。The event occurs just after a control is selected, but before any changes are made. 若要选择它后执行控件上的某些操作，请重写方法。To carry out some actions on the control after it is selected, override the method. 例如，你可能想要更改的控件处于选中状态但未更改，若要以可视方式强调所选控件的外观。For example, you might want to change the appearance of a control that is selected but has not changed yet, to emphasize visually which control is selected. 事件发生后所选的控件已更改。The event occurs just after the selected control has been changed. 若要更改后对其执行某些控件上的操作，重写方法。To carry out some actions on the control after it has changed, override the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SelectedWebPartChanged As WebPartEventHandler

summary.span: 在对一个 控件的选择已经发生更改并被移动到网页上的另一个控件之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after the selection of one control has changed and moved to another control on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以结合使用此事件方法，以更改所选控件的用户界面 (UI)。This event can be used in conjunction with the method to change the user interface (UI) of a selected control. 例如，如果用户切换到设计模式下的页 ()，然后选择控件将其拖到新位置的意图，很常见，若要更改所选控件的呈现，例如通过更改的颜色其边框或背景处于选定状态时。For example, if the user switches the page to design mode (), and then selects a control with the intent of dragging it to a new position, it is common to change the rendering of the selected control, for example by changing the color of its border or background while it is selected. > [!NOTE] > 使用事件的详细信息，请参阅[如何： 使用 Web 窗体应用程序中的事件](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md)。For more information on consuming events, see [How to: Consume Events in a Web Forms Application](~/docs/standard/events/how-to-consume-events-in-a-web-forms-application.md).

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event SelectedWebPartChanging As WebPartCancelEventHandler

summary.span: 在更改网页上 或服务器控件当前的选定状态的过程中发生。

span.span: Occurs during the process of changing which or server control is currently selected on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以结合使用此事件方法。This event can be used in conjunction with the method. 页面开发人员可以通过添加在其代码中创建一个事件处理程序`OnSelectedWebPartChanging`属性为``页上，并将该属性的值设置为自定义方法的名称中的元素将处理的事件。Page developers can create an event handler in their code by adding the `OnSelectedWebPartChanging` attribute to the `` element in a page, and setting the value of the attribute to the name of a custom method that will handle the event. 在开始或结束以及时开始和结束的编辑控件的控件之间的连接的过程中引发此事件。This event is raised during the process of beginning or ending a connection between controls, and when beginning and ending an edit of a control. 有关详细信息，请参阅方法。For details, see the method. 通常情况下，当作为更改所选的控件的用户的操作的直接结果引发事件，可以取消该事件。Normally, when the event is raised as a direct result of a user's action that changes the selected control, the event can be cancelled. 但是，是不能在其中取消该事件的方案。However, there is a scenario in which the event cannot be cancelled. 如果控件中删除，它包含的控件必须全部关闭，否则它们将成为孤立。If a control is deleted, the controls it contains must all be closed, otherwise they would be orphaned. 在这种情况下控制关闭控件、 不用户，它必须确定当前所选控件以及何时更改而无需中断，任何可能的选择，以便它可以完成的清理过程所有控件。In this case the control closes the controls, not the user, and it must determine which control is currently selected and when to change the selection without any chance of interruption, so that it can complete the process of cleaning up all the controls. 因此，根据设计不能在此情况下取消方法。Therefore, by design the method cannot be cancelled in this scenario. 可以取消的相关事件，请参阅事件。For a related event that can be cancelled, see the event.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void SetPersonalizationDirty() cil managed

summary.span: 设置一个标志，该标志指示 控件的自定义个性化设置数据已更改。

span.span: Sets a flag indicating that custom personalization data for the control has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法设置最终在 Web 部件控件集用来保存已更新的个性化设置数据将导致个性化设置组件的标志。The method sets a flag that ultimately causes the personalization components in the Web Parts control set to save the updated personalization data. 有关详细信息可能会导致更改跟踪的个性化设置数据的方案控件，请参阅属性。For more information on the scenarios that can cause changes to the personalization data tracked by the control, see the property. 方法不能在代码中直接调用，并不能重写，因为它在内部由 Web 部件控件集作为 Web 部件个性化设置功能的一部分。The method cannot be called directly from your code, and cannot be overridden, because it is used internally by the Web Parts control set as part of the Web Parts personalization feature.

span.para: 可以调用该方法由派生类。这会非常有用，如果你想要自定义个性化设置组件的 Web 部件控件的设置，并因此需要控制设置个性化设置数据的标志的过程。

The method can be called by a derived class. This would be useful if you want to customize the personalization components of the Web Parts control set, and thus need to control the process of setting flags for personalization data.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig instance void SetSelectedWebPart(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

param.name: webPart
param.span: 已被选择的 或服务器控件。

span.span: A or server control that has been selected.

summary.span: 将 属性值设置为等于当前选定的 或服务器控件。

span.span: Sets the property value equal to the currently selected or server control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法调用的开始或结束编辑指定的控件的过程`webPart`参数，和的开头或结尾的连接，包括那些`webPart`。The method is called during the processes that begin or end editing of the control specified by the `webPart` parameter, and those that begin or end a connection that includes `webPart`. 编辑并连接进程的开始处`webPart`是已被选择要编辑或输入连接的控件。At the beginning of the edit and connection processes, `webPart` is the control that has been selected to be edited or to enter a connection. 编辑和连接过程中，末尾`null`传递给方法，这会导致不能再选择当前所选控件。At the end of the edit and connection processes, `null` is passed to the method, which results in the currently selected control no longer being selected.

MemberSignature.Value: public override string SkinID { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property SkinID As String
public: virtual property System::String ^ SkinID { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.SkinID : string with get, set

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置一个空字符串 ("")，使 控件不能应用任何外观。

span.span: Gets or sets an empty string ("") so that no skin can be applied to the control.

value.span: 一个空字符串，该字符串防止 控件使用指定给它的外观。

span.span: An empty string that prevents the control from having a skin assigned to it.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性重写继承属性，以阻止控件，这是不可见的控件中，从使用外观。The property overrides the inherited property to prevent the control, which is an invisible control, from using skins. 实现属性可以防止通过始终返回空字符串从指定外观`get`访问器，并且始终引发异常，如果尝试设置一个值`set`访问器。The implementation of the property prevents a skin from being assigned by always returning an empty string from the `get` accessor, and always throwing an exception if there is an attempt to set a value in the `set` accessor.

span.span: An attempt was made to set the property value.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property StaticConnections As WebPartConnectionCollection

summary.span: 获取对网页上所有定义为静态连接的 对象的集合的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to the collection of all objects on a Web page that are defined as static connections.

value.span: 一个 ，包含页上的所有静态连接。

span.span: A that contains all the static connections on the page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性由控件来跟踪和管理页上的所有静态连接。The property is used by the control to track and manage all static connections on a page. 静态连接，而相比之下，动态连接，不必每次呈现页面时添加到一个页面。A static connection, in contrast with a dynamic connection, does not need to be added to a page every time the page is rendered. 此属性所引用的集合包含在页上，存在，无论它们是以编程方式创建，还是使用指定的所有静态连接``中页面的标记元素。The collection referenced by this property contains all the static connections that exist on the page, whether they are created programmatically or specified with an `` element in the page's markup. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用属性。The following code example demonstrates programmatic use of the property. 代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 用户控件，可用于更改 Web 部件页上的显示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 源代码文件包含两个自定义控件和自定义的接口。A source code file that contains two custom controls and a custom interface. - 包含两个自定义的网页可以连接的控件和一个``元素。A Web page that contains two custom controls that can be connected, and an `` element. - 在浏览器中的示例工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the example works in a browser. 下面的代码包含示例的 Web 页部分。The following code contains only the Web page portion of the example. 您还需要获取示例中所述的例子-自定义用户控件和自定义控件和接口的源代码的前两个部分类概述。You will also need to obtain the first two parts of the example--the custom user control and the source code for the custom controls and interface--from the Example section of the class overview. 该主题还介绍了用于编译选项控件。That topic also explains your options for compiling the controls. 代码示例的第三部分是 Web 页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 页的声明性标记包含`Register`为用户控件和自定义控件的指令。The declarative markup for the page contains `Register` directives for both the user control and the custom controls. 没有``元素中，``元素以包含自定义控件和一个``元素。There is an `` element, an `` element to contain the custom controls, and an `` element. 请注意，在`Page_Load`方法中，代码会检查以查看是否连接已存在，如果没有，请定义一个提供程序、 使用者和其各自的连接点，然后将新的连接添加到所引用的静态连接集属性。Notice that in the `Page_Load` method, the code checks to see whether a connection already exists and, if not, defines a provider, a consumer, and their respective connection points, and then adds a new connection to the set of static connections referenced by the property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections/CS/wpmgrStaticConnectionCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_StaticConnections/VB/wpmgrStaticConnectionVB.aspx#1)] 已加载网页的浏览器中后，单击**显示模式**下拉列表控件，然后选择**Connect**切换页可连接模式。After you have loaded the Web page in a browser, click the **Display Mode** drop-down list control and select **Connect** to switch the page to connect mode. 连接模式使用``元素以使您能够创建控件之间的连接。Connect mode uses the `` element to enable you to create connections between controls. 在连接模式中，单击标题栏中的向下箭头**邮政编码**控件来激活其谓词菜单，，然后单击**Connect**。In connect mode, click the downward arrow in the title bar of the **ZIP Code** control to activate its verbs menu, and then click **Connect**. 连接用户界面 (UI) 出现后，请注意是否已创建一个连接中包含的代码通过`Page_Load`方法。After the connection user interface (UI) appears, notice that a connection has already been created by the code contained in the `Page_Load` method. 如果在更高版本浏览器会话中返回到此页，此静态连接已建立，并将不需要重新创建每次加载页面。If you return to this page in a later browser session, this static connection will already be established and will not need to be recreated each time the page loads.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property SupportedDisplayModes As WebPartDisplayModeCollection

summary.span: 获取特定网页上所有可用显示模式的只读集合。

span.span: Gets a read-only collection of all display modes that are available on a particular Web page.

value.span: 一个 ，包含特定网页上的可用 对象集。

span.span: A that contains the set of objects available on a specific Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性包含实际可用在页上，给定类型的页面上存在的区域控件的显示模式。The property contains only the display modes that are actually available on a page, given the kinds of zone controls present on the page. > [!NOTE] > 可以禁用显示模式，并禁用后一种显示模式，未添加到集合，即使该显示模式支持的区域的相应类型的页上存在。Display modes can be disabled, and when a display mode is disabled, it is not added to the collection, even when the corresponding type of zone that supports that display mode is present on the page. 浏览模式和设计模式始终是受支持。Browse mode and design mode are always supported. 而异的显示模式是编辑、 目录和连接模式。The display modes that can vary are the edit, catalog, and connect modes. 每种显示模式是与特定类型的关联控件。Each of these display modes is associated with a particular type of control. 它是该特定类型的区域会导致某种显示模式要添加到所引用的集合的网页上是否存在属性。It is the presence of that specially typed zone on a Web page that causes a particular display mode to be added to the collection referenced by the property. 例如，如果网页包含但不是区域区域，然后编辑显示模式是在该页面上，支持的模式之一，但不是支持目录显示模式。For example, if a Web page contains an zone but not a zone, then the edit display mode is one of the supported modes on that page, but the catalog display mode is not supported. > [!NOTE] > 属性不同于属性，引用的集合包含与当前可用的显示模式控制，甚至那些不支持特定页面上。The property differs from the property, which references a collection containing all the display modes that are available to the current control, even those that are not supported on a particular page. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何以编程方式使用属性。The following code example shows the programmatic use of the property. 代码使用此属性以填充该列表仅显示可用的模式中，当前网页。The code uses this property to populate the list with only the display modes available in the current Web page. 有三种受支持的此页上显示模式： 浏览、 设计和编辑。There are three supported display modes on this page: browse, design, and edit. 前两个始终可用，以及编辑模式是可用此代码示例中，因为该页面包含控件。The first two are always available, and the edit mode is available in this code example because the page contains an control. 目录和连接模式不在显示时，显示，因为它们的相应区域不在此页上。The catalog and connect display modes are not shown, because their corresponding zones are not on this page. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_SupportedDisplayModes#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_SupportedDisplayModes/CS/wpmgrSuppDisplayModescs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_SupportedDisplayModes#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_SupportedDisplayModes/VB/wpmgrSuppDisplayModesvb.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中的页面后，可以使用下拉列表控件切换到设计模式下，浏览模式的页面，然后编辑模式。After you load the page in a browser, you can use the drop-down list control to switch the page from browse mode to design mode, and then to edit mode. 在编辑模式下，您可以单击其中一个服务器控件的标头中的下拉谓词菜单并选择**编辑**编辑该控件。In edit mode, you can click the drop-down verbs menu in the header of one of the server controls, and select **Edit** to edit the control.

MemberSignature.Value: ReadOnly Property IsDirty As Boolean Implements IPersonalizable.IsDirty

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 控件管理的自定义个性化设置状态数据是否已在网页上更改。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether custom personalization state data managed by the control has changed on a Web page.

value.span: 一个布尔值，指示个性化设置状态数据是否已更改。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the personalization state data has changed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性提供了一种方法的调用方以确定是否个性化设置状态数据由管理控制已更改。The property provides a way for callers to determine whether personalization state data that is managed by the control has changed. 当用户进行个性化设置页面级别的详细信息，例如通过更改页面布局、 创建或删除连接，并通过添加或删除控件，管理个性化设置数据控件发生更改。When users personalize page-level details, for example by changing page layout, creating or deleting connections, and adding or deleting controls, the personalization data managed by the control changes. 这是保护项的值返回给调用方传递方法属性，它不能由调用方直接访问。This is a pass-through method that returns to callers the value of the protected property, which cannot be directly accessed by callers. > [!NOTE] > 属性不指示是否可个性化属性值或会影响个人外观的各个属性控件，已更改。The property does not indicate whether personalizable property values, or individual properties that affect the appearance of individual controls, have changed. 控制级别个性化设置单独跟踪每个控件。Control-level personalization is tracked for each control individually. 属性指示仅个性化设置数据的页级别由控制已更改。The property indicates only whether personalization data that is at the page level and is managed by the control has changed. 以下列表描述了个性化设置会导致某些常见情况属性返回的值`true`，以指示的控件具有某些更改的个性化设置数据：The following list describes some common instances of personalization that would cause the property to return a value of `true`, indicating that the control has some changed personalization data: - 关闭静态控件 （或服务器或用户控件） 页面上。Closing a static control (or server or user control) on a page. - 还原已关闭的静态页目录中返回到页的控件。Restoring a closed static control from a page catalog back to a page. - 将在其区域内或向另一个区域移动任何控件。Moving any control within its zone or to another zone. - 从目录中添加控件或服务器控件，或以编程方式添加控件。Adding a control from a catalog of or server controls, or adding a control programmatically. - 创建两个连接控制，以编程方式或通过使用连接用户界面 (UI)。Creating a connection between two controls, either programmatically or by using the connection user interface (UI). - 正在删除连接两个控制，以编程方式或通过使用连接用户界面。Deleting a connection between two controls, either programmatically or by using the connection UI. 若要访问此属性的值，必须强制转换控件实例与接口; 你可以然后读取属性值。To access this property value, you must cast the control instance to the interface; you can then read the property value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示的简单用法属性，以指示某些常见的页面个性化设置实例的原因控件的个性化设置数据更改。The following code example demonstrates a simple usage of the property, to indicate some common page personalization instances that cause a control's personalization data to change. 代码示例包含四个部分：The code example has four parts: - 用户控件，您可以更改包含 Web 部件控件的页面上的显示模式。A user control that allows you to change display modes on a page that contains Web Parts controls. - 包含两个自定义代码的源文件可以连接的控件和一个接口。A source file that contains the code for two custom controls that can be connected, and an interface. - 承载的所有控件的网页。A Web page that hosts all the controls. - 代码示例的工作原理的说明。An explanation of how the code example works. 代码示例的第一个部分是用于更改显示模式的用户控件。The first part of the code example is the user control for changing display modes. 可以从示例部分中获取用户控件的源代码类概述。You can obtain the source code for the user control from the Example section of the class overview. 有关显示模式的用户控件的工作原理的信息，请参阅[演练： 在 Web 部件页上更改显示模式](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For information about display modes and how the user control works, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). 该示例的第二部分是使用自定义控件和接口的源文件。The second part of the example is the source file with the custom controls and the interface. 请注意，`IZipCode`接口公开一个方法，并在自定义实现此方法作为`ZipCodeWebPart`控件作为回调方法，以使`ZipCodeWebPart`充当连接方案中的提供程序。Notice that the `IZipCode` interface exposes one method, and that this method as implemented in the custom `ZipCodeWebPart` control serves as a callback method to enable `ZipCodeWebPart` to act as a provider in a connection scenario. 另一个控件`WeatherWebPart`，在连接中充当使用者控件; 它可以使用提供的特定接口`ZipCodeWebPart`。The other control, `WeatherWebPart`, acts as the consumer control in a connection; it can consume the particular interface provided by `ZipCodeWebPart`. 在实际的应用程序，`WeatherWebPart`无法使用个性化的邮政编码值从提供程序，并向用户提供图形天气信息。In a real application, `WeatherWebPart` could consume a personalized ZIP Code value from the provider, and then provide graphical weather information to users. 若要运行的代码示例，必须编译此源代码。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 可以显式对其进行编译，并将生成的程序集放在网站的 Bin 文件夹或全局程序集缓存中。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以将源代码放在你网站的 App_Code 文件夹中，其中它将被动态编译在运行时。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 此代码示例使用动态编译;因此，请注意，`Register`此组件在 Web 页面顶部的指令只包含`TagPrefix`并`Namespace`属性，而不`Assembly`属性。This code example uses dynamic compilation; therefore, notice that the `Register` directive for this component at the top of the Web page contains only `TagPrefix` and `Namespace` attributes, without an `Assembly` attribute. 有关演示如何编译的演练，请参阅[演练： 开发和使用自定义 Web 服务器控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates how to compile, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). [!code-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsDirty#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsDirty/CS/ZipCodeComponent.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsDirty#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsDirty/VB/ZipCodeComponent.vb#2)] 代码示例的第三部分是 Web 页。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 请注意，它包含两个区域，其中包含两个自定义第一个控件。Notice that it contains two zones, with the first one containing the two custom controls. 此外，还有区域，其中包含一种标准用户可添加到页面的控件。There is also a zone, which contains a standard control that users can add to the page. ``元素提供一个连接的用户控件之间创建连接的用户界面。The `` element provides a connection UI for users to create connections between controls. 在中`Page_PreRender`方法，请注意，它会检查是否已更改的个性化设置数据，如果是这样，更新的文本`Label1`。In the `Page_PreRender` method, notice that it checks to see whether the personalization data has changed and, if so, updates the text of `Label1`. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsDirty#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsDirty/CS/wpmgrIsDirtyCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_IsDirty#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_IsDirty/VB/wpmgrIsDirtyVB.aspx#1)] 加载浏览器中的页面后，尝试创建的一些方案将更改个性化设置数据本主题的备注部分中列出。After you load the page in a browser, try to create some of the scenarios listed in the Remarks section of this topic that will change the personalization data. 如果某个更改涉及的跟踪的个性化设置方案之一进行各种更改，控制的文本`Label1`控件将显示指示个性化数据已更改。As you make various changes, when a change involves one of the personalization scenarios tracked by the control, the text of the `Label1` control is displayed to indicate that personalization data has changed. 例如，你可以：For example, you can: - 通过单击控件之间创建连接**连接 web 部件控件**按钮。Create a connection between controls by clicking the **Connect WebPart Controls** button. - 使用**显示模式**下拉列表控件以将页切换到目录模式，并添加**我的日历**第二个控件区域。Use the **Display Mode** drop-down list control to switch the page to catalog mode, and add the **My Calendar** control to the second zone. - 更改后翻页以浏览模式下，单击谓词菜单 （显示在标题栏中的箭头符号） 的**我的日历**控件，并选择**关闭**关闭它，并将其添加到页目录。Change the page back to browse mode, click on the verbs menu (shown with an arrow symbol in the title bar) for the **My Calendar** control, and select **Close** to close it and add it to the page catalog. - 将页返回到目录模式下，并添加**我的日历**回页面的控件。Return the page to catalog mode, and add the **My Calendar** control back to the page. - 使用**显示模式**控件将页切换到设计模式，并重新排列控件的布局，通过将一个或多个其拖到另一个区域或相同区域中的其他位置。Use the **Display Mode** control to switch the page to design mode, and rearrange the layout of the controls by dragging one or more of them to another zone, or to a different position in the same zone.

Sub Load (state As PersonalizationDictionary) Implements IPersonalizable.Load

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.span: 一个 ，它包含要加载的状态数据。

summary.span: 返回先前保存的需要加载到 控件的自定义个性化状态数据。

span.span: Returns previously saved custom personalization state data that needs to be loaded to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法是实现方法，为 Web 部件控件集直接访问受保护提供了一种方法方法。This method is an implementation of the method, which provides a way for the Web Parts control set to directly access the protected method. 调用此方法时，它将存储由管理的自定义个性化的数据控件，并且以前保存稍后在初始化过程中使用的永久性的数据存储区中。When this method is called, it stores the custom personalized data that is managed by the control, and that was previously saved in the permanent data store for use later in the initialization process. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，页面和控件开发人员代码不必调用此方法，因为它主要由 Web 部件控件集用作检索个性化设置数据的机制。In most cases, page and control developer code does not need to call this method, because it is primarily used by the Web Parts control set as its mechanism for retrieving personalization data.

span.para: 开发人员会在其中使用此方法的一种情况是如果他们正在开发一个自定义个性化设置框架来代替一个提供由 Web 部件控件集。在这种情况下，开发人员可以继承自类并重写方法返回的自定义实现对象。自定义对象将调用的实现方法在加载自定义个性化设置数据的适当时间。

One scenario in which developers would use this method is if they are developing a custom personalization framework to use in place of the one provided by the Web Parts control set. In such cases, developers could inherit from the class and override the method to return a custom implementation of a object. The custom object would call the implementation of the method at the proper time to load custom personalization data.

span.span: Saves custom personalization state data that is managed by the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法是实现方法，为 Web 部件控件集直接访问受保护提供了一种方法方法。The method is an implementation of the method, which provides a way for the Web Parts control set to directly access the protected method. 调用此方法时，它将由管理的所有个人的数据保存为 Web 部件应用程序配置的永久性的数据存储到的控件。When this method is called, it saves all personalized data that is managed by the control to the permanent data store configured for a Web Parts application. > [!NOTE] > 在大多数情况下，页面和控件开发人员代码不必调用此方法，因为它主要由 Web 部件控件集用作用于保存个性化设置数据的机制。In most cases, page and control developer code does not need to call this method, because it is primarily used by the Web Parts control set as its mechanism for saving personalization data.

span.para: 开发人员将在其中使用此方法的一种情况是如果他们正在开发一个自定义个性化设置框架来代替一个提供由 Web 部件控件集。在这种情况下，开发人员可以继承自类并重写方法返回的自定义实现对象。自定义对象将调用的实现在适当的时间来保存自定义个性化设置数据的方法。

One scenario in which developers would work with this method is if they are developing a custom personalization framework to use in place of the one provided by the Web Parts control set. In such cases, developers could inherit from the class and override the method to return a custom implementation of a object. The custom object would call the implementation of the method at the proper time to save the custom personalization data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件重写基属性始终返回值为`true`为属性。The control overrides the base property to always return a value of `true` for the property. 即使控件本身不可见，请属性应设置为`true`，以便所有子控件默认情况下可见。Even though the control itself is not visible, the property needs to be set to `true` so that all its child controls are visible by default. 如果您尝试设置的值属性，它始终能生成一个错误，因为控件已重写基属性行为，并且可防止将任何值分配给该属性。If you try to set the value of the property, it always generates an error because the control has overridden the base property behavior and prevents assigning any value to the property. 此属性不在可视化设计器，可绑定，而是在运行时可绑定。This property is not bindable in visual designers, but is bindable at runtime. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartAdded As WebPartEventHandler

summary.span: 在动态 或其他服务器控件已被添加到 区域之后发生，以指示已成功添加了控件。

span.span: Occurs after a dynamic or other server control has been added to a zone, to indicate that the control was added successfully.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件将非常有用，该值指示是否动态控件 （而不是页面标记中声明，以编程方式添加控件） 已成功添加到区域。The event is useful for indicating that a dynamic control (a control added programmatically, as opposed to being declared in page markup) was successfully added to a zone. 结合方法，该事件为开发人员提供一种方法来更新用户界面 (UI) 或通知用户已成功添加控件。In conjunction with the method, the event provides developers with a way to update the user interface (UI) or otherwise notify users that a control was successfully added.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartAdding As WebPartAddingEventHandler

summary.span: 在向 区域添加动态 或其他服务器控件的过程中发生。

span.span: Occurs during the process of adding a dynamic or other server control to a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件方法后将控件添加到区域的过程已开始。The event is raised by the method after the process of adding a control to a zone has begun. 此事件提供将取消该过程完成之前的机会。This event provides an opportunity to cancel the process before it is complete. 此事件添加过程是否成功后, 跟事件。If the adding process is successful, this event is followed by the event. 页面开发人员可以通过添加为事件提供自定义处理程序`OnWebPartAdding`属性为``页上，并为属性指定自定义方法名称中的元素。Page developers can provide custom handlers for the event by adding the `OnWebPartAdding` attribute to the `` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartClosed As WebPartEventHandler

summary.span: 当从页中移除 控件（或服务器控件，或用户控件）时发生。

span.span: Occurs when a control (or server or user control) is removed from a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件用于指示控件已成功关闭了，由用户或以编程方式。The event indicates that a control has been successfully closed, either by a user or programmatically. 若要关闭控件意味着若要删除从页面以便不呈现，并且还将其放在一个特殊持有对象调用页目录。To close a control means to remove it from a page so that it is not rendered, and also to place it in a special holding object called a page catalog. 对应于一个页目录控件中，会保留对已关闭的引用为每个页面的控件。A page catalog, which corresponds to the control, maintains references to closed controls for each page. 如果控件中的页面上声明区域，用户可以将页切换到目录显示模式，并将重新添加到一个页面之前关闭任何控件。If a control is declared on a page within a zone, users can switch a page into catalog display mode, and add back to a page any controls that were previously closed. 与事件关联方法，它同时引发事件，并为其提供一个处理程序。The event is associated with the method, which both raises the event and provides a handler for it. 页面开发人员可以通过添加添加事件的自定义处理程序`OnWebPartClosed`属性为``页上，然后将自定义方法名称分配给该属性中的元素。Page developers can add a custom handler for the event by adding an `OnWebPartClosed` attribute to the `` element in a page, and then assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartClosing As WebPartCancelEventHandler

summary.span: 在从页中移除 控件（或服务器控件，或用户控件）的过程中发生。

span.span: Occurs during the process of removing a control (or server or user control) from a page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件方法时控件的过程中关闭一个控件。The event is raised by the method when the control is in the process of closing a control. 如果控件移除成功，此事件后跟事件。If the removal of the control is successful, this event is followed by the event. 页面开发人员可以通过添加为事件提供自定义处理程序`OnWebPartClosed`属性为 <`asp:webpartmanager>`页上，并为属性指定自定义方法名称中的元素。Page developers can provide a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnWebPartClosed` attribute to the <`asp:webpartmanager>` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute. 通常情况下，当作为用户结束的直接结果引发事件控件，可以取消该事件。Normally, when the event is raised as a direct result of a user closing a control, the event can be cancelled. 但是，是不能在其中取消该事件的方案。However, there is a scenario in which the event cannot be cancelled. 如果控件中删除，它包含的控件必须全部关闭，否则它们将成为孤立。If a control is deleted, the controls it contains must all be closed, otherwise they would be orphaned. 在这种情况下控制关闭控件，不是用户。In this case the control closes the controls, not the user. 以及何时控件的过程中调用方法关闭每个控件，并引发事件，事件不能被取消 （按照设计），因为需要完成的清理任务所有区域的控件。And when the control is in the process of calling the method to close each control, and the event is raised, the event cannot be cancelled (by design) because the needs to complete the task of cleaning up all the zone's controls.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartDeleted As WebPartEventHandler

summary.span: 在 或其他服务器控件已从 区域删除之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after a or other server control has been deleted from a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件将非常有用，该值指示从区域已成功删除动态控件 （而不是页面标记中声明，以编程方式添加控件）。The event is useful for indicating that a dynamic control (a control added programmatically, as opposed to being declared in page markup) was successfully deleted from a zone. 结合方法，该事件为开发人员提供一种方法来更新用户界面 (UI) 或通知用户已成功删除控件。In conjunction with the method, the event provides developers with a way to update the user interface (UI) or otherwise notify users that a control was successfully deleted.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartDeleting As WebPartCancelEventHandler

summary.span: 在从 区域中永久删除动态 或其他服务器控件的实例的过程中发生。

span.span: Occurs during the process of permanently deleting an instance of a dynamic or other server control from a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件方法，在删除动态控件 （通过编程方式或通过 Web 部件用户界面的用户已添加的控件） 的过程。The event is raised by the method, during the process of deleting a dynamic control (one that has been added programmatically or by a user through the Web Parts user interface). 事件提供将在完成之前取消该过程的机会。The event provides an opportunity to cancel the process before it is finished. 如果已成功完成删除过程，此事件后跟事件。If the deletion process is successfully completed, this event is followed by the event. 页面开发人员可以通过添加为事件提供自定义处理程序`OnWebPartDeleting`属性为``页上，并为属性指定自定义方法名称中的元素。Page developers can provide custom handlers for the event by adding the `OnWebPartDeleting` attribute to the `` element in a page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartMoved As WebPartEventHandler

summary.span: 在 或服务器控件已被移动到网页上的不同位置之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after a or server control has been moved to a different location on a Web page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此事件适用于 （Web 页面的标记中声明） 的静态和动态控件。This event applies to both static (declared in the markup of a Web page) and dynamic controls. 与之关联方法。It is associated with the method. 由于移动完成后，引发该事件，开发人员可以包含事件处理程序来提供某些通知给用户、 一些验证或某些其他操作。Because the event is raised after a move is complete, developers can include an event handler to provide some notification to users, some validation, or some other actions. 若要添加的事件处理程序，可以添加`OnWebPartMoved`属性为``页上，并分配到的属性的自定义方法的名称中的元素。To add an event handler, you can add an `OnWebPartMoved` attribute to the `` element in a page, and assign the name of a custom method to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartMoving As WebPartMovingEventHandler

summary.span: 在移动 区域中包含的 或其他服务器控件的过程中发生。

span.span: Occurs during the process of moving a or other server control that is contained in a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时或其他服务器控件要移动其自己区域中或另一个区域。The event is raised when a or other server control is being moved within its own zone, or to another zone. 当用户拖动控件，或以编程方式移动时，可以发生此情况。This can occur both when a user drags a control, and when there is a programmatic move. 引发事件方法，并提供完成之前取消移动过程的机会。The event is raised by the method, and it provides an opportunity to cancel the moving process before it is complete. 如果移动已完成且控件放置在新的位置，此事件后跟事件。If the move is completed and the control placed in a new position, this event is followed by the event. 页面开发人员可以创建自定义事件的处理程序通过添加`OnWebPartMoving`属性为``元素，并为属性指定自定义方法名称。Page developers can create a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnWebPartMoving` attribute to the `` element, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property WebParts As WebPartCollection

summary.span: 获取对网页上的 控件所跟踪的所有 控件的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to all controls tracked by the control on a Web page.

value.span: 一个 ，包含对一组 控件的引用。

span.span: A that contains references to a set of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可供控件来跟踪所有中包含的控件页上的区域。The property is used by the control to track all controls that are contained within zones on the page. 尽管该集合是只读的您可以访问单个以编程方式控制通过对它们的集合并进行更改。Although the collection is read-only, you can access individual controls through the collection and make changes to them programmatically. > [!NOTE] > 可以具有之外的页面上放置控件区域，这会导致该控件不跟踪控制或在引用其集合。It is possible to have a control placed on a page outside of a zone, which results in the control not being tracked by the control or referenced in its collection. 但是，没有理由使用控制区域之外，因为它然后失去其 Web 部件的功能，并且可作为正常的服务器控件。However, there is little reason to use a control outside of a zone, because it then loses its Web Parts functionality and acts as a normal server control. 任何类型的可放置在区域中，无论是自定义控件控件、 标准的 ASP.NET 控件、 一个用户控件或自定义服务器控件，可将其视为控件在运行时。Any type of control that can be placed in a zone, whether a custom control, a standard ASP.NET control, a user control, or a custom server control, can be treated as a control at run time. 当控件不是控件放置在区域，在 ASP.NET 包装与控件的运行时对象，以便控件可以作真正控件。When a control that is not a control is placed in a zone, at run time ASP.NET wraps the control with a object, so that the control can behave as a true control. 因此，通过使用属性，控制可以跟踪服务器控件，而不考虑是否它派生的任何类型类。Therefore, by using the property, the control can track any type of server control, regardless of whether it derives from the class. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式来访问各控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property programmatically to access individual controls. 请注意，在网页上，在声明性标记内``有元素是两个标准的 ASP.NET 服务器控件。Notice that in the declarative markup for the Web page, within the `` element there are two standard ASP.NET server controls. 虽然这些不继承自类，因为它们是在它们将使用换行的区域中在运行时对象，并因此将包括在所引用的集合属性。Although these do not inherit from the class, because they are in a zone they will be wrapped with a object at run time, and thus will be included in the collection referenced by the property. 您还可以添加自定义控件、 用户控件或自定义服务器控制在此区域中，并能够得到处理相同的方式。You could also add custom controls, user controls, or custom server controls in this zone, and they would be handled the same way. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_WebPartManager_WebParts#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_WebParts/CS/wpmgrWebPartsCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_WebPartManager_WebParts#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_WebPartManager_WebParts/VB/wpmgrWebPartsVB.aspx#1)] 请注意，若要运行代码示例，必须添加的设置在 Web.config 文件，以使导出 Web 部件说明文件中。Note that for the code example to work, you must add a setting in the Web.config file to enable exporting Web Parts description files. 确保您有 Web 页所在的目录中为此代码示例的 Web.config 文件。Ensure that you have a Web.config file in the same directory as the Web page for this code example. 内``部分中，请确保有``具有元素`enableExport`属性设置为`true`，如以下标记。Within the `` section, make sure there is a `` element with an `enableExport` attribute set to `true`, as in the following markup. `` `...` `` 如果单击到浏览器中，加载页面后**WebPart 计数**按钮，该代码使用属性集合中返回控件的计数。After you load the page into a browser, if you click the **WebPart Count** button, the code uses the property to return the count of controls in the collection. 如果单击**隐藏日历标题**按钮，代码更改日历，以便它使用仅边框和标题不呈现。If you click the **Hide Calendar Title** button, the code changes the calendar so that it renders with only a border and not a title.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartsConnected As WebPartConnectionsEventHandler

summary.span: 当 控件（或者服务器或用户控件）之间已建立特定连接之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after a specific connection has been established between controls (or server or user controls).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与事件关联方法。The event is associated with the method. 此事件非常有用，因为连接已完成后，可能想要通知的这一事实，用户或甚至更改页面的用户界面 (UI)。The event is useful because after you know that a connection is complete, you might want to inform the user of the fact, or even change the user interface (UI) of the page. 例如，你可能想要显示某个建议两个控件之间的成功连接的图形图像或显示简要的消息，然后将更改页显示模式下重新浏览模式。For example, you might want to display some graphic image that suggests a successful connection between two controls, or display a brief message, and then change the page display mode back to browse mode. 页面开发人员可以通过添加与此事件关联的自定义事件处理程序`OnWebPartsConnected`属性为``页上，并为属性指定自定义方法名称中的元素。Page developers can associate a custom event handler with this event by adding the `OnWebPartsConnected` attribute to the `` element in the page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartsConnecting As WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler

summary.span: 在创建 控件（或放置在 区域中的服务器控件或用户控件）之间的连接的过程中发生。

span.span: Occurs during the process of creating a connection between controls (or server or user controls placed in a zone).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件方法，并且它表明连接过程已开始 （例如，用户已选择了某个控件并单击连接谓词），但尚未完成。The event is raised by the method, and it signals that the connection process has begun (for example, a user has selected a control and clicked a connect verb), but is not yet completed. 事件提供完成之前取消连接的机会。The event provides an opportunity to cancel a connection before it is complete. 如果连接成功完成，此事件后跟事件。If the connection is successfully completed, this event is followed by the event. 页面开发人员可以通过添加添加事件的自定义处理程序`OnWebPartsConnecting`属性为``元素，并为属性指定自定义方法名称。Page developers can add a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnWebPartsConnecting` attribute to the `` element, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartsDisconnected As WebPartConnectionsEventHandler

summary.span: 在两个 或服务器控件之间的连接已终止之后发生。

span.span: Occurs after a connection between two or server controls has been terminated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 与事件关联方法。The event is associated with the method. 此事件非常有用，因为您知道连接终止后，你可能想要通知用户，在代码中，执行某些清除操作或在用户界面 (UI) 中进行其他更改。The event is useful because after you know that a connection is terminated, you might want to inform the user, perform some cleanup actions in the code, or make other changes in the user interface (UI). 页面开发人员可以通过添加与此事件关联的自定义事件处理程序`OnWebPartsDisConnected`属性为``页上，并为属性指定自定义方法名称中的元素。Page developers can associate a custom event handler with this event by adding the `OnWebPartsDisConnected` attribute to the `` element in the page, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event WebPartsDisconnecting As WebPartConnectionsCancelEventHandler

summary.span: 在结束以前连接的 或服务器控件之间的连接的过程中发生。

span.span: Occurs during the process of ending the connection between previously connected or server controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件方法，并且它表明这一事实，用户已单击了断开连接的谓词，或方法已被调用。The event is raised by the method, and it signals the fact that a user has clicked a disconnect verb, or the method has otherwise been called. 事件提供的机会将取消该过程的完成之前结束连接。The event provides an opportunity to cancel the process of ending a connection before it is complete. 如果连接成功结束，此事件后跟事件。If the connection is ended successfully, this event is followed by the event. 页面开发人员可以通过添加添加事件的自定义处理程序`OnWebPartsDisconnecting`属性为``元素，并为属性指定自定义方法名称。Page developers can add a custom handler for the event by adding the `OnWebPartsDisconnecting` attribute to the `` element, and assigning a custom method name to the attribute. 通常情况下，当作为结束连接的用户的操作的直接结果引发事件，可以取消该事件。Normally, when the event is raised as a direct result of a user's action that ends a connection, the event can be cancelled. 但是，有几种方案不能在其中取消该事件。However, there are several scenarios in which the event cannot be cancelled. 第一个方案是，如果控件中删除，它包含的控件必须全部关闭，否则它们将成为孤立。The first scenario is, if a control is deleted, the controls it contains must all be closed, otherwise they would be orphaned. 在这种情况下控制关闭控件、 不用户，并已还必须能够终止任何连接的控件，而无需中断，任何可能的连接，以便它可以完成清理和关闭的过程所有控件。In this case the control closes the controls, not the user, and it must also be able to terminate the connections of any connected controls without any chance of interruption, so that it can complete the process of cleaning up and closing all the controls. 因此，根据设计不能在此情况下取消方法。Therefore, by design the method cannot be cancelled in this scenario. 可以取消的相关事件，请参阅事件。For a related event that can be cancelled, see the event. 第二个方案，其中事件不能被取消时调用方法时 （这称为到页中，每个请求过程），并且没有某种类型的页面上的现有连接中的冲突。The second scenario in which the event cannot be cancelled is when the method is called (this called during each request to a page, for example), and there is some type of conflict in the existing connections on a page. 例如，可能是用户在连接到控件 y，x 控件，但共享的用户连接控件 x 来控制 z，并尚未控件 x 不允许进行多个连接。For example, perhaps a user connects control x to control y, but a shared user connects control x to control z, and yet control x is not allowed to form multiple connections. 在这种情况下，连接的每个用户的设置优先，并控件通过调用来解决冲突方法和结束之间的连接 x 和 z 为特定的用户。In this case, the individual user's settings for the connection take precedence, and the control resolves the conflict by calling the method and ending the connection between x and z for the particular user. 由于此断开连接是至关重要的设计解决冲突，不能在此情况下取消事件。Because this disconnection is essential to resolving the conflict, by design the event cannot be cancelled in this scenario. 在其中的第三个方案方法不能被取消时或删除或关闭当前连接的服务器控件。The third scenario in which the method cannot be cancelled is when a or server control that is currently connected is either deleted or closed. 控件总是从页中删除，因为它是逻辑必须删除其连接。Because the control is definitely going to be removed from the page, it is a logical necessity to remove its connection. 因此，当控件调用方法，从而引发事件，根据设计不是可能，可取消事件。Therefore, when the control invokes the method, which in turn raises the event, by design there is no possibility of canceling the event.

summary.span: 获取对网页上所有 区域的集合的引用。

span.span: Gets a reference to a collection of all the zones on a Web page.

value.span: 引用一组 区域的 。

span.span: A that references a set of zones.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性可供控件跟踪在网页上的区域。The property is used by the control to track the zones on a Web page. 请注意，该属性不引用所有类型的区域;它引用了派生的区域类，其中包括区域。Note that the property does not reference all types of zones; it references only zones that derive from the class, including zones. 尽管该属性引用的集合是只读的但可以使用它来访问集合中的单个对象和以编程方式使用它们。Although the collection referenced by the property is read-only, you can use it to access the individual objects in the collection and work with them programmatically. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性以编程方式来访问各区域控件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property programmatically to access individual zone controls. 请注意，在 Web 页的声明性标记，有两个``元素，每个包含服务器控件。Notice that in the declarative markup for the Web page, there are two `` elements, each containing a server control. 在中`
